
1a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
1b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes kun bsdus ngo bo'i sku/ /dngos kun gcig bsdus rang bzhin te/ /rgyud kyi phyag can lhan skyes zhal/ /
1b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med shes rab phag mo dang/ /lhan cig bzhugs pa de la 'dud/ /mkhyen pa'i gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /snod
1b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan blo mun sel mdzad cing/ /don gyi bdud rtsis tshim mdzad pa/ /mtsho skyes la sogs bla ma'i tshogs/ /zla ba lta bu
2a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la 'dud/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho yi/ /bla ma'i man ngag mngon rtogs rim/ /ji bzhin rtogs pa'i
2a2(rgyud 'grel): nus med kyang/ /bdag nyid dran phyir bri bar bya// //de la thog mar dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dbang bskur ba'i rim pas dag
2a3(rgyud 'grel): par byas pa zab pa dang rgya che ba la lhag par mos pas rgyud kyi don khong du chud pa'i sgrub pa pos skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs dang/ ri bo
2a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ri'i phug dang/ bya skyibs dang/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang/ gdod ma nas grub pa'i dur khrod dang/ gang du yid dga' 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas su yang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ras ris dang/ gtor ma dang mchod yon la sogs pa'i nye bar spyad pa rnams dang ldan pa'i bsam
2b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyi gnas bstar ba/ bdud rtsis gtor zhing me tog gcal du bkram pas dga' bar byas par tho rangs sad pa dang/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams
2b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis glu dang cang te'u'i sgras bskul bar bsams te/ gdong gi gtsang sbra la sogs byas nas/ ro dngos kyi steng ngam mi'i pags pa sna tshogs rdo rje bris
2b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i steng du/ gcer bu khar bdud rtsi'i ri lu bcug pa lhor mngon par phyogs pas/ rdo rje'i skyil krung la sogs pas 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i
2b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dang mthe'u chung nas bzung ba'i sor mo rnams kyi rtsa ba la/ dpa' mo'i go cha rnams kyis sbyang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi go cha yang
3a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus dang sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo la dgod do/ /de nas pad+ma'i snod myos byed bzang pos bkang la lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/ g.yon
3a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i srin lag gis chos 'byung gi ri mo bya zhing/ yi ge gsum brjod pas bdud rtsir bsams te/ de nyid kyi mthe bong dang srin lag sbyar bas chang gtor te yan
3a3(rgyud 'grel): lag lnga la khrus dang/ 'thor 'thung dang/ mchod pa'i rdzas rnams la bsang gtor yang bya'o/ /de nas rang gi mdun du chang de nyid dang/ dri zhim po bsres pas
3a4(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal gru bzhi par byugs te me tog sil mas gtor la rdo rje'i phyag rgyas re gcing b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas sa 'og dang sa steng dang mtho ris ki rang bzhin
3a5(rgyud 'grel): du byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas oM A:s+thA nAM me rak+Sha hUM zhes brjod cing me tog gcig rang gi 'og tu bzhag pas gnas bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM A:a'at+ma nAM me
3b1(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha hUM zhes bya ba dang/ me tog gcig rang gi mgo bor bzhag ste bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o/ /'khyud pa'i phyag rgya dang oM A(rgyud 'grel): yo gaM me rak+Sha hUM zhes bya bas rnal 'byor bsrung bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su sems can 'khor
3b2(rgyud 'grel): ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor bying ba rnams phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la bzhag pa'i phyir bdag gi dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bsgom par bya'o zhes sems bskyed do/ /de nas tha mal pa'i lus nyid la
3b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo'i go cha'i sngags brjod cing gnas de dang der rdo rje'i phyag rgya reg pas go cha bya'o/ /de nas me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar la/ dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo
3b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum ste/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing/ /'jig rten bya ba rab 'jug ma/ /de snyed rnams la rtag
3b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor yongs bying ba/ /gang dag yongs su sgrol mkhas pa'i/ /bla ma dam pa'i drin gang gis/ /bdag la ye shes 'di bskyed 'dud/ /ces bya bas mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma rnamS
3b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams yid kyis gsal bar byas la/ /me tog gtor zhing phyag bya'o/ /de nas cho ga nas bshad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o//
4a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid skad cig gis bde mchog zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa sku mdog sngon po phag mo dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni lus dag par byed pa'o/ /rang gi snying gar paM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshoD pad+ma
4a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma brgyad pa/ de'i steng du raM yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM kha dog nag po ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'phro bzhin pa bsams la/ dag tu thog mar oM dang mthar hUM
4a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT dang ldan pa'i A li kla li brjod pas hUM gi nA da las yi ge'i phreng ba kha dog sna tshogs 'phro bzhin pa bton te g.yon gyi lus kyi stod du sngon po dang bar du dmar po dang smad du dkar po'i phreng bas dkris te de dag las khams
4a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha'i tshogs rim pa bzhin du stong dang bar dang/ smad rnams las gzugs med pa dang gzugs dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ris rnams spros te khams gsum gyi bgegs rnams med
4a5(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas/ rang rang gi gnas su bsdu ba ni/ dag dag par byed pa'o/ /de nas spyi bo dang/ dpral ba dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga'i thad kyi nam mkha' la sh+rli? he ru ka'i yi ge bzhi kha dog sngon po bsams la de rnamS
4a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi don dran par bya ste/ de yang sh+rI yig 'byung ba kun gyi don/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni/ /'jug med bde ba'i mdza' can gang/ /e baM la sogs gnyis med pa'ang sh+rI zheS bya
4b1(rgyud 'grel): ? yig des brjod/ /ha yig snying ga nas kun tu/ /he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro /bsgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las/ / 'dzin pa la sogs rnams bskyed 'gyur/ /da ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de/ /rgyu yi bdag nyid mi rtog pa'o/ /rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid/ /de ni stong pa'i rnal
4b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gnas/ /bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa/ /rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni/ /du yig rkyen gyis bdag nyid can/ /de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o/ /slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i/ /bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang/ /gang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa/ /de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod ces
4b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ dngos po mngon sum stong pa min/ /dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can/ /dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo/ /snga nas sgo kun 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba brjod cing don dran par bya ba ni yid dag par byed pa'o/ /de nas phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams lha'i nga rgyal bsgom par nga'o/ /de
4b4(rgyud 'grel): nas 'khrugs? kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug po/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni ? he ru
4b5(rgyud 'grel): ka rdo rje'o/ /mig dag ni gti mug rdo rje'o/ /nyan ba dag ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sna dag ni phrag dog rdo rje'o/ /kha dag ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /reg ni ser sna rdo rje'o/ /skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje'o/ /sa'i khams ni ltung? bar byed ma'o/ /chu'i khams ni gsod ma'o/ /me'i khams ni
4b6(rgyud 'grel): bkugs ma'o/ /rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha' i khams ni pad+ma 'bar ma'o/ /de rnams kyang slob dpon shes rab srungs kyi bkod pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/ /de nas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong brdabs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha kA yi kaM hUM
4b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na pA tsi kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM krih+NA? pa ya grih+NA pa ya tsa ra mi maM huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga nyan? badzra dz+nyA ni kaM huM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba brjod pas snying ga'i hUM las kha dog nag po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po'i mdog can rnams te tshangs pa'i mdza' 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la thug gi bar du sngags kyi gzugs chen po dang shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i phyogs rnams su kha phyir phyogs pa rim pas spros pa dgod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi 'og gi char raM yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i
5a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la hUM sngon po yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu chen po gser gyis gzhi la thug pa/ hUM gis byin gyis brlabs pa bsams la/ de'i 'od zer dang sum b+ha la sogs pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rab
5a3(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi pa kha dog sngar dang mthun pa dang/ rdo rje dang hUM gi 'od zer rnams kyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ljang gu'i mda'i dra ba dang/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i gur dang bla re yang bsam par bya'o/ /de nas sum b+ha la sogs pa'i sngags bzhi las grub pa'i khwa'i gdong
5a4(rgyud 'grel): can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang/ oM dang huM hUM phaT las grub pa'i gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas pas rdo rje thob bsnams shing/ g.yon pas rang 'dra ba'i lha mo lte ba man chad phur bu'i
5a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa can g.yas na gri gug g.yon na thod pa thogs pa bsnams pa rnams la/ sarba big+haM A na ya dza:zhes bya ba brjod pas/ phyogs mtshams su son pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs rnams ra ba'i phyi rol tu bkug pa'i dbus brgyad du/ hUM phyogs
5a6(rgyud 'grel): skyong gi kha dog dang mthun pa bsams te/ bgegs kyi tshogs rnams hUM la bsdus la/ de rnams gyur pa las phyogs skyong brgyad du bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas hUM gi sgra drag la ring ba bsgrags pas/ de nas rang rang gi mdun du me'i dong chen po dmigs te lha ma
5a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis de rnams su bcug ste phur bus mgo bo nas gdab cing/ oM g+ha:g+ha:g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI la a kI la a sarba pa paM phaT hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti big+h+naM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT ces bya ba lan gsum
5b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas mgrin pa dang snying gar yang gdab po/ /de nas oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra badzra kI la ko Ta ya hUM phaT ces bya ba lan gsum brjod pas rdo rje tho bas brdungs te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i srog dang phral nas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes thob par bsam par bya ste/ lha
5b2(rgyud 'grel): so rnams ra ba la thim pa dang/ phyi nas rim pa bzhin me dang/ rdo rje dang pad+ma dang/ 'khor lo'i ra ba zlum po ril po gcig pa bsam par bya'o/ /'og gi hUM zhu ba las rdo rje phra mo rnams par med par gtams te/ bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kun nas bgegs
5b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba'o zhes nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis/ bla ma dang dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te sngar gyi maN+Dal gyi dbus su bzhugs par bya'o/ /de nas oM A:hUM zhes lan gsum brjod pas
5b4(rgyud 'grel): bsang gtor bya'o/ /oM pra ba ra matkA ra pAM dyam pra tits+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis zhabs la zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o/ /oM pra ba ra satkA raM arg+haM pra tits+tsha swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lag pa g.yon pa mdza' nas phye ba'i phyag rgya mthe bong dang srin lag gis
5b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog dung gi chu la btags pa lan gsum gyis zhabs la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar rang rang gi sngags kyis man+d+ral?  du me tog dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas thams cad la oM A:badzra puShpe hUM oM A:badzra d+hA pe hUM/ oM A:badzra dI be hUM/ oM A:badzra
5b6(rgyud 'grel): gand+he hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra nai bi dye hUM/ zhes bya ba rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o/ /rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug rnams kyis slob dpon shes rab srungs kyi ltar mchod par bya'o/ /de nas rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i sngags kyi bdud
5b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dang bcas pa'i chang dbul bar bya'o/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/ /'gro don rab tu bsgrub pa po/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dir byung ba/ /dpal sdom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna tshogs ye shes chen pos g.yogs/ /thams cad bdag nyid rag tu bzhugs/ /
6a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes khro ba drag chen po/ /dpal sdom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya bas bstod par bya'o/ /bgyid dang bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang la sogs sdig pa ma lus pa ni skyon rnams ma lus nges par bcom pa yis/ /mdun du so sor
6a2(rgyud 'grel): bshags bya slar la yang ni mi byed pa yi sdom pa gzung ba nyid du bya/ /nyan thos dang ni bse? ru bla med rgyal brgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyis bsags pa'i dge ba la/ /rjes su yi ni rang zhing byang chub yang dag yongs su sngo bar bdag gis bya/ /rgyal ba rin chen
6a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gsum la ji snyed skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba thams cad du ni bsgom/ /byang chub sems ni rnam par gzung ngo bla na med pa'i lam ni de bzhin bsten/ /de nas oM A:badzra mu:hUM zhes brjod pas gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas snying rje dang byams pa dang
6a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang btang snyoms dran par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su oM sarba d+harmA:shU n+ya swa bA wa ShU n+yanyahaM/ oM sarba d+harmA:swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha:swa b+hA wa shud+d+honyahaM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma konyahaM/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha:sarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+honyahaM/ zhes bya ba brjod cing don dran
6a5(rgyud 'grel): par byas te chos thams cad nam mkha' i dkyil ltar bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyis sad pa'i sems nam mkha' la nA da la rim gyis rdzogs pa'i hUM blta'o/ /de dang dus mnyam du bsrung ba'i rab la sogs pa rnams kyang blta bar bya'o/ /de'i nang gi
6a6(rgyud 'grel): 'og char yaM sngon po yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu mdza' gnyis na g.yo bzhin pa'i ba dan yaM gis byin gyis brlab po/ /de'i stong du raM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar bzhin
6a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i grwa can raM yig gis byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de'i steng du baM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pa dang bcas pa la baM yig go /de'i steng du laM ser po yongs su gyur pa las/ sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa gra bar rdo rje rtse gsum pa
6b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa laM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge suM kha dog sna tshogs pa yongs su gyur pa las rin po che gzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri rab zur bzhi pa rtse mo brgyad dang ldan pa suM yig giS byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de'i steng du paM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma
6b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du hUM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ 'byung ba rnams zhu zhing sla ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas gcig tu 'dres pas ri rab 'og tu ltung bas 'byung ba zhu ba'i gong bu sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du chags pa yongs su gyur pa las/ /gzhal med khang sgo
6b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ dbus su ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa'i nang du'o/ /gnyis pa gru bzhi pa las gsum pa gru lnga pa dang bzhi par zur drug pa'i nang du ste/ mdog dmar po steng du bltas pa rnams so/ /dkyil 'khor gsum ni zlum po yin la kun gyi phyi
6b4(rgyud 'grel): ma ni gru bzhi pa ste/ kun kyang gzhal yas khang gi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa dur khrod dang bcas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor nang ma ni g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis rlung gnyis dbu mar 'dus pa'i rang bzhin gnag pa dang sngo ba'i rtsig pa gnyis pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni sku gsung thugs
6b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i rang bzhin sngo ba dang dmar po dang dkar bo'i rtsig pa gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /gsum pa ni dga' ba bzhi dag pa'i rang bzhin sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i ri mo bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /kun gyi phyi rol ni ye shes lnga dag pa ste phyi rol tu dkar po dang bcaS
6b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /kun gyi dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa lte ba la nyi ma'i steng du 'jigs byed chen po dang dus kyi mtshan mo'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu 'khor lo rim pa gsum dang ldan pa/ de'i phyi rol bskal pa bzang po'i snam bu dang
6b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'o/ /phyi ma rnams la yang dus kyis pad+ma ma gtogs pa'o/ /pad+ma'i phyi rol naS nang gi phyi ma'i 'khor lo'i bar gyi mtshams rnams kyi phreng ba ni rim pa bzhin du gri gug dang rin po che dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang thod pa dang mgo
7a1(rgyud 'grel): bo dang keng rus dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu'i phreng ba rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug go /'khor lo'i rtsibs re re'i steng duAng ro'i gdan re re'o/ /de bzhin du pad+ma'i 'dab ma lha'i gnas
7a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang sgo dang mtshams rnams su yang ngo/ /lha'i gnas ma yin pa mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams la ni rin po che'i bum pa re re'o/ /'khor lo'i kha dog rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur te/ de ltar rten gyi dkyil 'khor dmigs te rgyas par ni 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis kyang
7a3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ de nas 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi steng gi char A li nyis 'gyur g.yon bskor las de'i gzugs brnyan dang ldan pa'i zla ba bsgom pa ni me long lta bu'o/ /de'i steng du kA li ya ra la wa Da Dha dang bcas pa nyis 'gyur g.yon bskor las de'i gzugS
7a4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan dang bcas pa'i nyi ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo'o/ /de gnyis kyi dbus su steng gi hUM zhugs te 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi lha rnams spros te 'gro ba thams cad de'i bdag nyid can byas nas 'dus te de nyid du zhugs pas rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa/ lte ba la hUM gis byin gyis
7a5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa ni so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin no/ /hUM las kyang 'od zer sna tshogs dpag tu med pa byung ste sngar lha nyid du bsgrub pa ma lus pa dang gdong ma nas grub pa thams cad bkug ste/ de nyid du bzhug pa 'di ni bya ba grub pa'o/ /de rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las rgyu'i
7a6(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka bskyed pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo ste yang sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /shes rab kha sbyor sbyor bdag nyid/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /dkar dang ljang gu dmar ba dang/ /ser pa g.yon nas bskor
7a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ zhal gyi ral pa'i cod pan la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'dzin/ /'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par ma can/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje dril bu glang chen gyi/ /pags pa cang te'u gri gug dang/ /dgra sta rtse gsum de bzhin du/ /kha TwAM ga snod zhagS
7b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ mgo ste g.yon dang g.yas par ro/ /shes rab rang dang 'dra ba la/ /'on kyang bud med mtshan nyid ldan/ /de nas de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gi sa bon blta bar bya ste 'di ni bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas yang kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje mi dmigs pa la hUM? sngon po las rdo rje sngon
7b2(rgyud 'grel): po rtse lnga pa'o/ /yi ge bya dmar ser las nor bu ste de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ bu gang phaT ser po mgo phyir bstan pa'o/ /A dmar po las yum gyi pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa/ dyAM dkar ser las ze 'bru de nyid kyis mtshan pa/ bu gar phaT ser po mgo phyin bstan
7b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas rig ma la rdo rje phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po dang nye ba'i snying po rim pa ji lta bus lte ba dang snying kha dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar bkod de tsum pa na bya'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das mas kyang de nyid kyi snying po dang nye ba'i
7b4(rgyud 'grel): snying po mgrin pa dang dpral bar bkod de rang nyid kyi lte ba dang snying gar bkod la tsum+ba? na bya'o/ /de nas yi ge gsum brjod cing dga' ba brtsam par bya ste/ snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer dang/ rdo rje dang pad+ma'i dga' ba'i sgras phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
7b5(rgyud 'grel): bskul te/ zhal du zhugs nas lha mo'i pad+mar babs pa dang gnyis ka bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor zhu bar gyur pa dngul chu'i rdog ma lta bu ste 'di ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ma la
7b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi thig le de nyid las 'thon te rang rang gi gnas su pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams la 'dug nas bskul bar mdzad pa ste/ de yang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa drug gis mgrin gcig tu mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba 'gron 'bod na
7b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni ci'i phyir na stong ba nyid du bzhugs/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje'i 'dzin pa bde chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod/ /lA ma la sogs pa rnams kyis/ /gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub/ /'jig rten phyugs gang
8a1(rgyud 'grel): shi ba bzhin du gyur/ /bdag gi pad ma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun bder gyur par byos/ /dum skyes ma la sogs pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la rol cig rol/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa thob/ /sems can
8a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gzhan ni rmongs gyur pas/ /ji ltar khyod ni stong pa don med gyur/ /gzugs can ma la sogs pas kyang/ /khyod ni chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste/ /ci phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin 'gro med bzhugs/ /bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod/ /ji ltar khyod ni 'jig
8a3(rgyud 'grel): rten rnams mthun bzhud/ /de nas de rnams thig le de nyid la zhugs par blta'o/ /de nas thig le de nyid yongs su gyur pa las hUM gi yi ge sngon po'o/ /de las rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa lte bar hUM ljang sngon dang bcas pa'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor ba dang
8a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa skad cig gis rdzogs par blta ba ni gsang sngags 'di 'don bzhin pa'o/ /de yang glu 'dis rjes su bskul ba yis/ /rang nyid he ru kar rab sang/ /oM A:kA ya bIk+tsit+ta badzra hUM phaT ho:gsang sngags 'di ni 'don ba na/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/
8a5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig sngags pas byung bdag nyid/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'jigs byed mchan mo nag mo dang/ /lte ba nyi ma me mchog la/ /gar du mdzad pa yi ni sku/ /gnag dang ljang gu phyed phyed do/ /bdun cu rtsa drug phyag dang ni/ /zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum pa/ /
8a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ? bzhal? pa'i cod pan 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can/ /mche ba chen po gtsigs pa'o zhal/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni/ /ser ba dang ni ljang khur grags/ /nub ni dmar po de bzhin te/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigS
8a7(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /rim pa ji lta'i mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya/ /glang chen pags pa phyag gnyis kyis/ /skye gnas phyag rgya de bzhin gzhan/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang/ /rtse gsuM ji lta'i rim pas g.yas/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /
8b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal shing phug dang tho ba dang/ /'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang/ /dbyug tho dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /dung dang zangs dung dbyig gu dang/ /rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin du/ /bya rog sgro dang por? dang ni/ /me yi thab dang ri bo dang/ /dbyug pa me long pi wang dang/ /rkang mgo lag pa
8b2(rgyud 'grel): glo ba dang/ /sgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang/ /gdongs dang dum bu ba nya rgya/ /mgo med 'bar ba'i mar nag dang/ /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon par dril bu phub rings mche/ /gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang/ /gzhu dang kha TwAM ka po ti/ /phub chung yu
8b3(rgyud 'grel): can sdigs mdzub dang/ /g.yer kha'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang/ /brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /b+ho kam rnga dang pags rlon dang/ /skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang/ /ro bsregs bskul ba'i shing bu dang/ /'phongs dang phu rings mgo bo dang/ /keng rus zong bde bzhin du/ /mig dang
8b4(rgyud 'grel): mkhal ma gnye ma dang/ /spen pa dang ni phur bu dang/ /sa bon gang ba sog le dang/ /kha dang slud bshud bags pa dang/ /sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu/ /phyag gi mtshon cha bdun cu gnyis/ /de lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /mgo bo lnga yis brgyan du byas/ /phyag rgya drug dang
8b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas klubs/ /de bzhin mgo brgya'i phreng ba dang/ /dpung rgyan zhabs gdub sgra sgrogs dang/ /sku la ba spu'i phreng bar ldan/ /sku yi tshigs rnams thams cad la/ /shes rab thabs kyi bde bas brlan/ /sna tshogs he ru ka 'bar bas/ /rnam par 'phros bcas rnam
8b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya/ /dbu rnams kun la dar dbyangs kyis/ /phreng ba btul shugs can gyis bya zhes bya ba ni gtso bo bsgom pa ste 'di ni sgrub pa'o// //de yi mdun du lha mo che/ /rdo rje phag mo mdog dmar mo/ /zhal gcig
8b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni gnyis ma ste/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug dang/ /sdigs mdzub phyogs rnams kun tu mdzad/ /g.yon pas gdug pa'i khrag bkang ba'i/ /thong bcas yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud/ /gcer bu spyan gsuM sla? grol ma/ /spyan gsuM drag mo'i gsuM drag mo'i gzuD can ma/ /zhal gyi
9a1(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs ma ste/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa mo/ /sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan/ /dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /yan lag lha rdzas dris nyer byugs/ /zhabs gdub? dbung rgyan rnams dang ldan/ /lha rdzas me tog
9a2(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas klu bas/ /rtse phran zlar gnas rdo rje ni/ /dpral bar rtag tu 'dzin pa mo/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /'jigs dus me lha'i 'od zer can/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mdun du/ /sku la 'bar ba'i phreng ba spro/ /zhes bya ba ni yum bsgom pa ste/ /sgrub pa
9a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po'o/ /dang po gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba la sogs pa nas 'di dag gi bar du ni/ /dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lus kyi rang bzhin can no/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma shar sogs kyi/ /bar bar du ni rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i
9a4(rgyud 'grel): grangs nyid ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug drug go /shar la sogs nas byang gi mthar/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug de bzhin/ /dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar/ /slar yang lA ma la sogs drug /nub la sogs nas lho yi mthar/ /du ma skyes
9a5(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa'i rigs/ /dang po lho nas shar gyi mthar/ /de nas gzugs can ma sogs drug /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid/ /'o byed ma dang gzhan bsgyur ma/ /byis bcas ma dang rjes 'jug ma/ /phyed nag phyed
9a6(rgyud 'grel): sdo can rnams so/ /lhag ma rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang/ /zab mo thod pa can nag mo/ /rgyal po bskor ma phyed ljang gu/ /gang phyir phyed dmar rim pas so/ /du ma skyes ma dang dur khrod ma/ /rnam par zhu ma ku ru ku le ma/ /
9a7(rgyud 'grel): dU ma kar mar grags ma rnams/ /phyed dmar ba la phyed ser mo/ /gzugs can 'jigs byed gtsug phud ma/ /thor tshugs ral pa can drag mo/ /lha mo phyed ser phyed nag mo/ /phyag mtshan la sogs phag mo bzhin/ /mtshams
9b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi snod rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis de bzhin du/ /thod pa'i phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma/ /g.yon bskor du ni shes bya ste/ /ri rab steng gi char skyes ma'o/ /'di ni thig le'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ de'i rgyab rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni//
9b2(rgyud 'grel): sngo nag 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams kyis/ /g.yon bskor rim pas bsam bya ba/ /shes rab thabs dang mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /de dag kyang mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro'o/ /lA ma dang sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'o/ /dum skyes ma dang pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'o/ /gzugs can ma dang rin chen mkha' 'gro'o/ /rab tu gtuM?
9b3(rgyud 'grel): mo dang thod pa'i dum bu can no/ /gtum pa'i mig can ma dang keng rus chen po'o/ /'od ldan ma dang keng rus so/ /sna chen mo dang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o/ /dpa' ba' i blo gros ma dang dgra'i lha'o/ /mi'u thung ma dang 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma dang rdo rje'o 'od/? /shing grib ma dang rdo rje'i sku'o/ /sa
9b4(rgyud 'grel): spungs ma dang myu gu can no/ /'jigs byed ma dang rdo rje'i ral pa can no/ /rlung shugs can ma dang dpa' bo chen po'o/ /chang zam dang rdo rje hUM mdzad do/ /sngo bsangs lha ma dang shin tu bzang po'o/ /rab tu bzang mo dang rdo rje bzang po'o/ /rta rnam dang 'jigs byed chen po'o/ /bya gdong ma dang mig mi bzang ngo/ /'khor lo'i
9b5(rgyud 'grel): shugs can ma dang stobs po che'o/ /dum skyes ma dang rin chen rdo rje'o/ /chang 'tshong ma dang rta mgrin no/ /'khor lo'i go cham dang nam mkha' i snying po'o/ /shin tu dpa' mo dang he ru ka'o/ /stobs chen ma dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go /'khor lo sgyur ma dang rnam par snang mdzad do/ /brtson
9b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grus chen mo dang rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /gshin rje mo'i bu mo dang stobs po che'o/ /gshin rje ma dang ye shes mkha' 'gro'o/ /g.yo byed ma dang blo brtan ma'o/ /skrag byed ma dang brtan pa'o/ /gtum mo dang thar pa'o/ /dbyang can ma dang ye shes so/ /'dod 'grub ma dang thabs so/ /'bar ba chen
9b7(rgyud 'grel): mo dang thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o/ /phyag bzhi ma la zhal gcig ma/ /thod pa dang ni kha TwAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug de bzhin no/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can ma/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs te/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dags gdan can drag chen mo/ /
10a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa dang/ /de bzhin shes rab thabs ldan pa'o/ /thabs rnams dpa' bo'i rgyan ldan zhing/ /dpa' mo'i pang na gnas pa'o/ /lhag ma'i ming ni dpa' mo bzhin/ /skyes bu'i rtags rnams su bya'o/ /'khor lo
10a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gcig rnams kyis ni/ /sgo la sogs pa'i yang de bzhin no/ /snying po'i pad+ma'i lha mo rnams/ /gtso bos bdag po bzhin du bya/ /'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor/ /ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni/ /bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig /de rnams thams cad
10a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam bsgom bya/ /mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye/ /sprul pa'i sku can bdag nyid do/ /gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar byung/ /de yis bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o/ /lhag mas? ni bcu gsum pa/ /sgo dang gral gnas
10a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ mchod dang bstod sogs dus su ni/ /thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya/ /dpa' bo rnams la yang de bzhin no/ /de ltar gzugs med khams dang ni/ /de yang gnas su nges par brjod/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sar grags pa'o/ /slar yang gnas dang nye gnas ?/ /da
10a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar sa yi dbus su yang/ /sa bcu gnyis su 'dod pa yin/ /de ltar thams cad du shes bya/ /khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad med/ /sum cu rtsa drug bshad pa rnams/ /gtso bo yon tan kun rang bzhin/ /de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rang bzhin can//
10a6(rgyud 'grel): khor yug tu ni sems can rnams/ /rdzus skyes rigs kyi rim pas so/ /de yang sum cu rtsa drug gi /yul dang yul rim pas phye ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo// //de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /slar yang snying po'i 'khor lo 'di/ /dmar ser ? la
10a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma/ /rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang/ /pad+ma gar dbang don yod ma/ /spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI/ /gos dkar sgrol ma gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra dang dri dang ro de bzhin/ /reg dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma/ /sa snying ma dang
10b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' snying mo/ /phyag ma 'jig rten mgon po ma/ /sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo/ /rin chen sgrol ma bdag med ma/ /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can/ /gshin mthar byed ma shes mdza' ma/ /pad mdza' ma bgegs mthar byed ma/ /mi g.yo ma dang dbyug sngon ma/ /'dod rgyal mo dang stobs
10b2(rgyud 'grel): chen mo/ /gtsug tor ma dang gnod mdzes mo/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te/ /zhal la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kun/ /lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /nye ba'i gnas su lha mo rnams/ /rang 'dra'i thabs dang bsam par bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis kyang/ /gzugs kyi khamS
10b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sa dri med/ /zla ba'i gling du 'dod pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni snying po'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o/ /de nas de'i rgyab yon tan kun/ /zhes bya'i 'khor lo dkar dmar pa/ /rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa/ /pho nya ma mchog sum cu drug /bla ma ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs ma/ /dmangs mo
10b4(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo khyi 'tshong ma/ /g.yung mo gar ma thod pa can/ /nya ba mo dang smyig gar ma/ /dung mkhan ma dang tha ga mo/ /khur ba mkhan mo shing bzo ma/ /phreng ba kha ba chos ma dang/ /srin bal byed ma pho nya mo/ /rus zos ma dang rtsis mkhan ma/ /chang 'chor ldum ra'i gnyer pa mo//
10b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pos bkrabs ma shen pa mo// so rtsi 'chod bar byed ma dang/ /gseg mgar mo dang lcags mgar mo/ /nor bu brgyud ma nags pa mo/ /kla klo o Di tshod ba mo/ /rdo bzo ma dang zhing las ma/ /ko lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma/ /'di rnams 'khor lo'i kha dog ?
10b6(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma thams cad snying po yi/ /'khor lo ji bzhin shes par bya/ /'dir ni zhing du shes bya ste/ /'dod khams rigs kun bdag nyid dang/ /dkar po'i gling zhes bya bar bshad/ /rang gi shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'o byed pa yis de bzhin/ /de yi phyi rol ?
10b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ /bskal ba bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /stong du bzhi yis nyung ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhi pa bzhi po la/ /nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu dgu /bskal pa bzang po'i mdo nyid na/ /stong tshang ba bzhugs te/ 'khor ba 'jigs dang gser thub dang 'od srungs rnams ni
11a1(rgyud 'grel): sngar gshegs pas 'khor du mi 'os pa'i phyir dang/ shAkya thub pa ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rang nyid yin pa'i phyir/ bzhi po ma gtogs pa'o/ /lha'i snam bu'i shar nas g.yon bskor du rim pas thams cad kyang pad+ma dang/ zla ba la bzhugS
11a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dka' thub kyi cha byang can sku mdog sna tshogs pa rnams te/ de yang mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byams pa dang/ seng+ge dang/ rab gsal dang/ thub pa dang/ me tog dang/ me tog gnyis pa dang/ spyan legs dang/ ded dpon dang/ lag chen dang/ stengs
11a3(rgyud 'grel): chen dang/ rgyu skar rgyal po dang/ rtsi sman dang/ snyan pa'i tog dang/ 'od chen dang/ grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ nyi ma'i snying po dang/ zla ba dang/ 'od 'phro dang/ 'od bzang dang/ mya ngan med dang/ skar rgyal dang/ rab gsal dang/ phreng
11a4(rgyud 'grel): thogs dang/ yon tan 'od dang/ don gzigs dang/ mar me dang/ mthu ldan dang/ sman pa dang/ des pa dang/ mdzad spu dang/ brtan ldan dang/ lha'i dpal dang/ gdul dga' dang/ yon tan rgyal mtshan dang/ sgra gcan dang/ tshogs ldan dang/ tshangs
11a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyangs dang/ chig ldan dang/ mi 'gying ba dang/ 'od mdzad dang/ lhun chen dang/ rdo rje dang/ sdom pa can dang/ mi snyems pa dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma'i spyan dang/ stobs kyi sde dang/ me tog 'od zer dang/ ye shes rgyas dang/ gzi chen dang/
11a6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ klu sbyin dang/ brtan gshegs dang/ don yod mthod dang/ brtson 'grus sbyin dang/ bzang skyong dang/ dga' bo dang/ 'chi med dang/ seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rgyal ba dang/ chos ldan dang/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang
11a7(rgyud 'grel): kha lo sgyur ba dang/ dgyes gshegs dang/ chu lha dang/ ston lag dang/ spos kyi glang po dang/ rnam par gzigs dang/ 'brug sgra dang/ legs sems dang/ yid bzang dang/ dri med dang/ zla ba dang/ grags chen dang/ gtsug na nor bu dang/ drag shul dang
11b1(rgyud 'grel): seng+ge'i stobs dang/ ljon pa dang/ rnam par rgyal ba chen po dang/ shes rab brtsegs pa dang/ legs gnas dang/ blo gros dang/ yan lag skyes dang/ blo mdza' yas dang/ gzugs bzang dang/ mkhyen ldan dang/ 'od zer dang/ brtul zhugs brtan dang/ bkra
11b2(rgyud 'grel): shis dang/ bden pa'i tog dang/ pad+ma dang/ sred med kyi bu dang/ lag bzang dang/ ye shes 'byung gnas dang/ yon tan 'od 'phro dang/ tshangs sbyin dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ lha'i me tog dang/ don legs sems dpa' dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/
11b3(rgyud 'grel): blo gros grags pa dang/ spobs pa brtsegs dang/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ phan par bzhed pa dang/ rnam par rol par ldan pa dang/ mun pa dang bral ba dang/ sgra gcan lha dang/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang/ tshogs chen 'od dang/ rin chen snying po dang/ shin tu mthong
11b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs dang/ skar rgyal dang/ du rings dang/ yon tan grags dang/ 'od ldan nyi zla dang/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ skar mkhan dang/ seng+ge tog dang/ dus mkhyen rgyal po dang/ dpal gyi snying po dang/ sring mthar gzigs pa dang/ glog gi 'od dang/ gser gyi ri bo
11b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ seng+ges byin pa dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ mchog dga' grags pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang/ grags rdzogs dang/ bsnyengs pa bral dang/ mched 'os lha dang/ sgron ma chen po dang/ 'jig rten 'od dang/ spos dri zhim pa dang/
11b6(rgyud 'grel): yon mchog dang 'dzin dang/ mun pa dang bral ba dang/ seng ge'i 'gram pa dang/ rin chen grags pa dang/ skyon rab tu zhi ba dang/ bdud rtsi 'chang dang/ mi'i zla ba dang/ shin tu gzigs dang/ rab tu brgyan pa dang/ nor bu'i 'od dang/ ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog
11b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ don nges ldan dang/ tshe sbyin dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ skye dbang mtshungs dang/ stobs kyis gshegs pa dang/ blo gnas pa dang/ gdugs mdzes dang/ gtso bo dang/ shin tu 'phags pa dpal dang/ seng+ge'i sgra dang/ rnam par rol ldan dang/
12a1(rgyud 'grel): klu'i 'od dang/ me tog gi ri bo dang/ klu dga' dang spos kyi dbang phyug dang/ shin tu grags pa dang/ stobs lha dang/ yon tan phreng par ldan pa dang/ klu'i lag pa dang/ mig brgyan pa dang/ legs par sbyangs pa'i blo dang/ zil gyis
12a2(rgyud 'grel): gnon pa'i ye shes dang/ mdza' yas spyan dang/ bden par gsungs pa dang/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ nges pa'i blo dang/ mdza' yas pa'i gzugs dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen tog dang/ the tshom spangs pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ don yod
12a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnon pa dang/ rtogs mdzad dang/ me tog rgyal mtshan dang/ ri dbang rgyal po dang/ gzi brjid che dang/ don mdzad gzigs dang/ grags pa mdza' yis dang/ rin chen lha khang/ don gnas mkhyen dang/ dman min grags pa dang/ mya ngan med pa dang
12a4(rgyud 'grel): dri ma bral ba dang/ tshangs lha dang/ sa'i dbang phyug dang/ me tog spyan dang/ rnam par 'byed pa'i sku dang/ chos kyi 'od dang/ kun rnam gzigs dang/ yon tan 'od gsal dang/ zla ba ? dang/ rin chen 'od dang/ rin chen tog dang/ grags pa'i bla ma
12a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'od byed dang/ gzi brjid dpag med dang/ dus mkhyen dang/ seng ge'i sku dang/ mkhas blo dang/ rgyal bar dka' dang/ yon tan phung po dang/ zla ba'i tog dang/ mthu thob pa dang/ mthu rtsal mdza' yas pa dang/ zla ba dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ don
12a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad gzigs pa dang/ dpa' bo dang/ 'byor par ldan pa dang/ bsod nams dang/ sgron ma dang/ yon tan 'phro dang/ blo yangs pa dang/ legs skyes dang/ nor lha dang/ yid gnyis spod pa dang/ 'dzin pa dpag med dang/ mchog sred
12a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ tshams med dang/ mi gnas pa dang/ bder gnas dang/ tshogs can gtso bo dang/ 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang/ phal chen dang/ rgyal ba dang/ gzi brjid mdza' yas dang/ don gyi blo gros dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po dang/ thab spangs dang/ rims nad med pa dang//
12b1(rgyud 'grel): leD sbyin dang/ graD byin dang/ me tog byin dang/ skyes bus byin dang/ rdo rje'i sde dang/ phal chen phyin pa dang/ zhi ba'i blo gros dang/ spobs pa'i glang po dang/ sred med kyi bu dang/ nges pa dang/ mi tshugs pa dang/ nyi zla dang/ glog gi tog rnams so/ /de yi phyi rol zlum por sbyin//
12b2(rgyud 'grel): ri mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo/ sgo dang rta babs kha khyer dang/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas mdzes/ /shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang/ /mkha' 'gro ma 'dra'i khwa gdod ma/ /byang du 'ug pa'i gdong can ma/ /nub tu khyi gdong can mdang/ /lto ru phag gi gdong can te/ /kha dog lnga ma sogs
12b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra mchog/ me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa mo/ /gshin rje mche ba pho nya mo/ mche gtsigs 'joms pa rim ji bzhin/ /kha dog gnyis gnyis mnyam par bya/ /zhal ni rjes su mthun rim pas/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ba zhi sogs? ?
12b4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sa gzhi rtag pa ru/ /gnag dang sngo dang ljang rang dmar/ /ser po yi ni mdog tu bya/ /lhan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du/ /gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhin/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /mthug?
12b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bya'o rim ji bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis po ri mo gsum/ /gsum pa la ni ri mo bzhi/ /bzhi par ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /dur khrod kun nas rim pas te/ /phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni/ /zlum po'i dbyings su bya bar 'dod/ /'khor lo ri mo pa lnga'i bde?
12b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /gra bzhi pa la kun tu 'bar/ /'dod pa'i yon tan snam bu la/ /brgyad gnyis lha mos mchod byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams la'o/ /de la lhan skyes 'khor lo yi/ /dur khrod gnas rnams bshad bya ste/ /gtum drag tshar ming? de bzhin du 'gro?
12b7(rgyud 'grel): bas 'khrigs pa keng rus can/ /'jigs sde shar la sogs pa yi/ /phyogs su g.yon bskor yongs su gnas/ /a Da Da Da Da Da rgod dbang ldan du/ /dpal gyi nags ni sreg zar te/ /mun pa drag po bden dral du/ /rlung du ki li ki li sgrogs/ /dur khrod?
13a1(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i gzugs rnams ni/ /ro langs 'byung po ci spyang sgra/ /rim pa 'di yis gnas pa ste/ /dur khrod brgyad po rnams su yang/ /shing dang phogs skyod klu dbang ste/ /sher shing khyab nas kang ke li/ /tsU ta'i shing dang n+yA gro d+ha/ /de bzhin
13a2(rgyud 'grel): ka rany+dza ka nyid/ /la ta parSha pArthi pa/ /dbang po nor sbyin de bzhin du/ /klu dbang dang ni gshin rje'i bdag /dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang/ /srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po/ /nor rgyas 'dzag po de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma nyid/ /pad tshon hu lu hu lu dang
13a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong dang/ /sgrogs pa dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang/ /drag po 'khyil ba 'thug de bzhin/ /gdab char 'bebs gtum po ste/ /'di rnams sbyin gyi bdag po'o/ /'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la/ /rdo rje phreng ba rnam pa byin/ /thams cad
13a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'dir de bzhin bya/ /phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o/ /de nas de'i phyi nam mkha' yis/ /'khor lo 'dam skyes sngon po mtshungs/ /sum cu drug rtsibs dbus su yang/ /mkha' spyod rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams/ /ma
13a5(rgyud 'grel): 'am ci mo dri za mo/ /hUM ru kA ma pA Da ba ma de bzhin du/ /pi wang gling bu mu kun da ma dang/ /rdza rnga ma dang nges par gag+ga ri ma dang/ /cha lang ma dang shI la ni dri ki ma/ /glu ma ka ra Da dang ta ma Da mchog dang/ /gar ma sgeg mo Dhak+ka ma dang ni/ /tA li sha ra Na mi rngam ma rnam
13a6(rgyud 'grel): mau dri ma dang rgyud can ma dang mA tu ma/ /nA la bA mo de bzhin Dham ba ki/ Da ma ru ma da du Da Na ru ka ma dang de bzhin du/ /zangs dung ma dang rwa dud ma de bzhin/ /b+hu ki ma dang dril bu ma dang dril chung ma/ /g.yer ka ma dang de bzhin Da ko yim dang/ /dung ma dang ni
13a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs lnga ni ma de bzhin/ /'khor ma mchog gi dbang phyug ma/ /kha dog sna tshogs bkra ba 'am/ /yang na 'khor lo'i kha dog go /nye ba'i zhing na gnas pa mo/ /ku sha'i gling na gnas ma mchog /mdza' la spyod pa'i rigs su byon/ /gling 'di la ni yang dag gan?
13b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ni 'od 'phro can de dang/ /rang rang gnas sogs zhing can mgo yang na Da ma ru kha TwAM ga /'di ni slar yang spangs nas su/ /rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ /ji ltar 'dod par bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la/ /rang gi bdag pos bya ba yin/ /'dir ni
13b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o/ /ji ltar rgyan la sogs mang po/ /lhag ma sngon bzhin bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu spyan gsum dang/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chad rje 'gro ma'o/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' i 'khor lo ste
13b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gnyis pa'i dang po'o// //de'i phyi rol rlung 'khor lo/ /sngon po sna tshogs pa yi mdog /rdo rje'i rtsibs dbus sbyin bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /nam mkha' i snying po las gzhan ming/ /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /mkha' 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): lding dang mo bkra ba mo/ /bya rog bya dkar sreg pa mo/ /rma bya zangs kyi gtsug phud ma/ /gu dbu mi 'jam pa mo/ /phug ron bya rog chen po dang/ /ga di ni dang go ma sreg /ne tso sags ma bzhad ma dang/ /bya rgod 'ug pa mchil pa med/ /shing de'i mo dang tu ? ?
13b5(rgyud 'grel): mo/ brik+Sha ri NI kak+ka bi/ /so bya mo dang byi la mo/ /lcug ma'i mgrin dang sA ri mo/ /khra mo gur gum lce can ma/ /bA Di ri kA dza g+ha mo/ /hor? mo ka ka mo de bzhin/ /dang dA ri mo re dags dgra /de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo/ /'khor lo'i sa gzhi gang 'phrag?
13b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog /yang na rang rang la shes bya/ /phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshungs/ /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'dun pa la ni gnas ma mchog /spyad dka' i sar ni shes bya ste/ /mi 'am ci'i gling mar 'dod/ /'khor lo 'di ni sgang
13b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang/ /yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba can/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum sa yi/ /'khor lo drod gsher skyes gzugs can/ /bzhi pa mngal skyes zhes bya ba/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid 'dod ces bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste/ 'khor lo
14a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i gnyis pa'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya/ /'khor lo sa yi ming can mchog /kha dog ser bo'i rang bzhin la/ /sum cu drug rtsibs rnams kyis spras/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sum cu drug /sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin
14a2(rgyud 'grel): seng ge stag mo b+hAm+b+hi ri bong ma/ /glang chen ri dags byi la mo/ /ba dang ba he mo rnga mo/ /ce spyang mo dang bse mo 'bri/ /byil bong mo b+hi Di ma/ /ra mo lug mo rim pa bzhin/ /khyi mo phag mo dod mo dang/ /DaN+Di ra maudz+nya ma de bzhin no/ /dre mo dang ni sgeg mo dang?
14a3(rgyud 'grel): nags ma dang ni khyim chen mo/ /bya rog chen mo khwa sgo ma/ /sprul mo bkra mo rnga mo dang/ /sre mo rtsangs mo phug pa mo/ /grong nag nas pa ma mchog gi /de ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin nam/ /yang na rang rang kha dog go /lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid
14a4(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i mdun sar gnas pa mo/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid dang/ /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /krung krung gling du gnas pa mo/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /lus ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs/ /gdong pa rang gi dngos por 'dod/ /de'i phyi
14a5(rgyud 'grel): bskal bzang sangs rgyas rnams/ /sngar gyi rim pas bsam par bya/ /mchod pa dang dpal sbas dang/ ye shes nyi ma dang/ don grub dang/ lhun po brtsegs pa dang/ dgra 'dul dang/ pad+ma dang/ dgra bcom grags pa dang/ ye shes 'gros dang/
14a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs bral dang/ 'dum bu dang/ spos bzangs dang/ yul 'khor rangs dang/ lha grags dang/ srid mdza' gzigs dang/ zla ba dang/ sgra gcan dang/ rin chen zla ba dang/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang/ bsam gtan dgyes dang/ rdzogs
14a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ yon tan rin chen dang/ dgra bcom grags pa dang/ pad+ma'i ngos dang/ mdzod spu ldan dang/ spongs pa grags pa dang/ rdo rje nor bu dang/ tshe dpag med dang/ nor bu bkod pa dang/ dbang chen dang/ yon tan
14b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas dang/ lhun po grags dang/ 'od zer bcu pa dang/ ma smad pa dang/ glang po'i 'gros dang/ yid du 'thad pa dang/ rin chen zla ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ rab gsal rgyal po dang/ kha lo sgyu dang/ dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang/ gtsug na rin po che dang/ bsnyengs
14b2(rgyud 'grel): bral dang/ rin chen snying po dang/ zla ba'i zhal dang/ dri ma med par grags pa dang/ zhi ba'i gzi brjid dang/ dga' ba'i tog dang/ sgra gcan lha dang/ na chod bzang po dang/ lha dag dga' dang/ rin chen phung po dang/ mdzes par gshegs pa dang/ seng ge'i
14b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs pa dang/ shin tu mthor gshegs dang/ skye ba'i dbang po dang/ blo gros bzang po dang/ 'jig rten 'od dang/ rin chen gzi brjid dang/ skal ldan shing rta dang/ kun tu rgyal ba dang/ dga' ba bkod pa dang/ stegs mdzad dang/ spos kyi glang po dang/
14b4(rgyud 'grel): blo gros 'od 'phro dang/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang/ spos bzang dang/ chos brtan dang/ gzi brjid drag shul can dang/ chos kyi nor bu dang/ bzang po byin dang/ bde gshegs zla ba dang/ tshangs dbyangs dang/ seng ge'i zla ba dang/ dpal dang/ legs par
14b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang/ thub pa med pa'i tshogs dang/ grags pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ bden pa dang/ dka' thub chen po dang/ lhun po'i 'od zer dang/ yon tan brtsegs pa dang/ mchod pa grags pa dang/ chos grags pa dang/ sbyin pa'i 'od dang/ glog 'byin
14b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bden par gsung dang/ 'tsho byed dang/ na tshod bzang po dang/ legs pa'i tshogs can dang/ rnam par nges pa'i blo gros dang/ srid mdza' nor bu'i spos dang/ rgyal bas dgyes dang/ seng ge'i 'od zer dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ grags
14b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang/ thugs rab gzhungs dang/ nor bu zla ba dang/ drag shul 'od zer dang/ brtul zhugs thub med dang/ 'gro bas mchod pa dang/ nor bu'i tshogs dang/ 'jig rten bla ma dang/ glang chen dang/ seng+ge dang/ zla ba dang/ rin chen 'od zer dang/
15a1(rgyud 'grel): sgra gcan sbed dang/ yon tan rgya mtsho dang/ 'od zer ldan pa dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i stobs dang/ 'jig rten bzang po dang/ mya ngan med pa dang/ shugs bcu pa dang/ stobs la dgyes pa dang/ mthu'i dpal dang/ mthu thob dang/
15a2(rgyud 'grel): mthu chen dang/ yon tan snying po dang/ bden par spyod pa dang/ dge mchog rgyal po dang/ skar rgyal dang/ 'od zer chen po dang/ glog gi 'od dang/ yon tan rgya chen dang/ rin po che dang/ dpal 'od dang/ bdud 'dul dang/ go cha bgos pa dang/ seng
15a3(rgyud 'grel): ge'i phyag dang/ me tog bzang po dang/ rin chen mthong po dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ sa 'dzin dang/ don gyi blo mda' ba dang/ yon tan brtsegs pa dang/ yon tan gyi tshogs dang/ rin po che'i me dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi zla ba dang
15a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs snyan dang/ tshangs pa'i tog dang/ tshogs chen gtso bo dang/ seng+ge'i stobs dang/ drag can gyi byin pa dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/ gzi brjid 'od dang/ 'od zer chen po dang/ rin chen grags pa dang/ tshogs can gsal ba dang/
15a5(rgyud 'grel): grags pa mnga' yas dang/ 'od zer don yod pa dang/ lha'i drang srong dang/ skye ba'i dbang po dang/ dge 'dun brtan pa dang/ phyogs bzang dang/ rtog dang/ yul 'khor me tog dang/ chos kyi blo gros dang/ rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa dang/
15a6(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i grags pa dang/ snang ldan dang/ lha'i tshogs dang/ yon tan srungs dang/ don gyi blo gros dang/ bsnyengs pa med pa dang/ grags pa brtan pa dang/ 'od gnas mtshungs pa dang/ nor bu'i zhabs dang/ thar pa'i gzi brjid dang/ ngos bzang
15a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ blo bzangs dang/ kun tu gzi brjid dang/ ye shes mchog dang/ tshangs par gnas dang/ bden par gsungs dang/ blo bzang dang/ stobs byin dang/ seng+ge'i stabs dang/ me tog gi tog dang/ ye shes 'byung gnas dang/ me tog byin dang/ yon
15b1(rgyud 'grel): tan snying po dang/ rin chen grags pa dang/ grags pa rmad du byung ba dang/ mi chugs pa dang/ bsnyengs pa med pa dang/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ tshangs par gshegs pa dang/ lha'i mthu rtsal dang/ ye shes dgyes dang/ lha'i bden pa dang/ nor bu'i snying po dang/ yon tan
15b2(rgyud 'grel): grags pa dang/ ye shes dpal dang/ bcings pa med pa dang/ brtul zhugs brtan pa dang/ lha'i gzi brjid dang/ tshangs thug dang/ brtul shugs dka' thub dang/ 'od zer phung po dang/ gzi brjid che dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ dga' mdzad dang/ tshogs can bzang po
15b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dgyes pa chen po dang/ sna ma'i me tog 'od dang/ tshogs can 'od dang/ skrun mdzad dang/ mdangs 'gro dang/ don legs nges pa dang/ khyu mchog dang/ lag bzang dang/ 'od zer chen po dang/ bsam pas byin dang/ bsod nams
15b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang/ rin chen dbyangs dang/ rdo rje'i sde dang/ 'byor ldan dang/ seng ge'i stobs dang/ dri med spyan dang/ 'od srungs dang/ blo gsal dang/ ye shes 'gros dang/ gzi brjid drag shul can dang/ 'od zer chen po dang/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ dri ma med pa'i 'od dang/ gzi
15b5(rgyud 'grel): brjid rnam par 'byed pa dang/ khengs pa med pa dang/ sbrang rtsi zhal dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ glog 'byin dang/ rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa dang/ mi 'khrugs pa dang/ dgra bcom grags pa dang/ chos kyi yon tan dang/ zhing bzang po dang/ bkod pa'i rgyal po dang/ mngon
15b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'phags pa dang/ sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang/ pad+ma'i dpal dang/ rin chen bkod pa dang/ shin tu bzang po dang/ rin chen mchog dang/ thugs shin tu gzhugs pa dang/ rgya mtshos byin dang/ tshangs pa'i tog rnams so/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sgo
15b7(rgyud 'grel): ru shes bya ba/ /tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po ma/ /gzhon nu khyab 'jug ma de bzhin/ /phag mo dbang mo gtum mo dang/ /dpal chen mo ni grwa rnams su/ /sgo ru gzugs dang mtshan ma ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhin du grags/ /grwa ru brtan ma la sogS
16a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /shes bya 'dir ni ri mo gsum/ /sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu mdzes/ /dur khrod rnams ni brjod bya ste/ /me yi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /gsod dang kun tu skrag byed dang/ /'jigs pa che
16a2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jigs byed de/ /drag po'i dur khrod de bzhin du/ /g.yon bskor du ni rnam par dgong/ /skrag byed dang ni sdang byed dang/ /lkugs byed dang ni rengs byed slar/ /dbang ldan la sogs grwa la'o/ /shing ni rim pas sbyin bya ste/ /go yu starka nA li ra/ /se 'bru
16a3(rgyud 'grel): bil pa'i shing de nas/ /skyu ru bi dz+nya rag sha'i shing/ /rim pa ji bzhin rnam par dgong/ /dbang mo gshin rje ma chu mo/ /gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma/ /srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste/ /'jig rten skyong ma sbyin par byed/ /klu mo srin mo thams cad ni/ /'dir
16a4(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam pa kun tu sbyin/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor bshad la/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin/ /las kyi rjes mthun sku mdog can/ /der ni gtso bo bsgom par bya/ /ces bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gnyis dad bcas
16a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir/ /me yi 'khor lo dag gis bshad/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar chen po/ /sum cu drug rtsibs rnams mchog la/ /rnal 'byor ma slar dgod bya ba/ /lha sogs rigs las byung ma ste/ /lha mo klu mo gnod
16a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mo/ /'byung po ngo bo tsam po'o/ /de kun gsungs pa 'di ni ci/ /lha yi rigs 'byung bshad par bya/ /ma dang chung ma sring mo dang/ /bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang/ /pha yi sring mo de dang ni/ /zhing po yi ni chung ma dang/ /chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni/ /de nyid kyi ni
16a7(rgyud 'grel): pha yi ma/ /chung ma yi ni phyi ma dang/ /ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang/ /ma yi spun zla spun zla'i bu mo dang/ /rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang/ /spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo/ /pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang/ /khu bo yi ni chung ma dang/ /bu mo'i bu'i sa chung ma dang/ /slar yang
16b1(rgyud 'grel): chung ma'i spun zla dang/ /rang pa'i sring mo bu mo dang/ /de nyid kyis ni rang rigs skyes/ /spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang/ /bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang/ /bu mo'i khyo yi ma i ni/ /bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo dang/ /bu mo'i bu mod yang dag bshad/ /pha nya sum cu drug rnams so/ /gdog dmar
16b2(rgyud 'grel): por yang dag grags/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngar dang mtshungs/ /sa ni ring du spong nyid dang/ /grag po'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste/ /shes rab thabs pa dag ngo bo can/ /nus pa'i 'khor lor 'dir rtag tu/ /shes bya rang 'dra'i mdzes pa mo//
16b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rdo rje'i phreng la sogs/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis/ /'dir ni ma phod byed pa yin/ /phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams cad/ /kun tu san nas dbul bar bya/ /btud pa rnam pa sna tshogs gbul//
16b4(rgyud 'grel): bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de bzhin/ /rang rang sten la lang nas ni/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/ /slar yang 'ongs nas 'khor lo yi/ /mchod pa bcu gnyis rnams la'o/ /zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i me'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o// //de nas de
16b5(rgyud 'grel): yi phyi rol bshad/ /chu yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog dkar sum cu drug rtsibs la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas bsgom/ /ma ka ra mo ru sbal nya/ /sbal mo ru sbal chu sras? mo/ /sdig nag g+g+a ri maSh+Ti li ma/ /chu yi phugs srin bu'i gdong ma dang/ /cha ga ba mo
16b6(rgyud 'grel): ka ka ru mo su sa mo/ /chu byi mo dang grogs mo'i gdong ma dang/ /chu yi maM mo dang ni rgod ma dang/ /glang chen mo dang stag mo ce spyad mo/ /chu sbrul mo dang dung mo mgron bu mo/ /nya phyis ma dang nor bu dzi gu ra ma dang/ /lI sa mo dang dung du ram kar+NoDa/ /phaT ka mo
16b7(rgyud 'grel): dA ba ka ma krim mo/ /ju Shi dzu shI ma dang sha sbrang ma ka lA ma/ /lha yi gtso mo mchog rnams so/ /de ltar la dog rang bzhin ni/ /dkar mo 'am rang rang rigs skyes pa'o/ /gdong pa rang rang gzugs kyis te/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rim ji bzhin no/ /nye ba'i 'du ba
17a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang ni/ /sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog go /dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par ni/ /shes bya mtshon cha sngon bzhin no/ /yang na gang ba'i rigs sogs kyis/ /mi rnams sum cu drug lta'o/ /gnas sogs rim pa de rnams su/ /mi mo dngos su yang dag bya//
17a2(rgyud 'grel): dzam+bu'i gling 'di de yis ni/ /dum bu bcu gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o/ /ba tshwa zhes bya'i rgya mtshor ni/ /de ru gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams/ /drod gsher skyes dang 'du 'phrod las/ /skyes pa mngal nas skye bar bsam/ /'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher skyes/ /me yi 'khor
17a3(rgyud 'grel): lo mngal skyes so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid rang ngo zhes bya ba ni chu'i 'khor lo'i ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /kun nas ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /sum cu drug rtsibs sna tshogs
17a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog/ lha min mo'i rigs rim pa dang/ /til mchog ma dang phul du bde/ /lha yi bu mo dga' chen mo/ /dga' dang dgar grags pad chen ma/ /dum can sna tshogs glang chen ma/ /gzugs chen ma dang gzugs mdzes ma/ /'dod chags rnams sgeg bde ba mo//
17a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog 'dod ma utpal dkar/ /utpal sngo dang mdzes ma dang/ /'dod chags ma dang 'dod chags che/ /rol grags ma dang rol chen ma/ /myos ma dang ni myos dga' ma/ /'dod pa mo dang 'don chen mo/ /de las byung dang bde ldan pa/ /mthun mchog ma dang
17a6(rgyud 'grel): byams pa mo/ /skal bzang ldan ma bskal bzang mo/ /dma' ba mo dang zhum pa mo/ /skyes gzugs mar ni grags pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gtso mo mchog /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin/ /phyag dang mtshon
17a7(rgyud 'grel): cha sngon bzhin shes/ /legs pa'i blo gros sa de bzhin/ /dur khrod rin po cher snad pa/ /rang 'byung bde ba byed pa po/ /de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku'o/ /de nas de yi phyi rol tu/ zla gdugs dang/ 'od 'phro ba dang/ dri med rgyal po dang/ ye shes grags pa
17b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ kun tu rgyal ba dang/ yon tan 'od dang/ sgra grags dang/ zla ba rgyas pa dang/ pad+ma'i 'od zer dang/ brtul zhugs bzang po dang/ sgron ma'i rgyal po dang/ glog gtog dang/ 'od zer rgyal po dang/ skar mkhan dang/ grags pa rdzogs ldan dang/ pad+ma'i snying po dang/
17b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang/ spyan mdzes dang/ rnyog pa med pa'i don dang/ drag shul bde ba dang/ bsod nams gzi brjid dang/ mthu rtsal can dang/ thogs pa med pa'i blo dang/ sgra gcan lha dang/ ye shes phung po dang/ kha lo sgyur dang/ skye dbang mtshungs dang/ me tog gi tog dang skra
17b3(rgyud 'grel): gcan 'dzin dang/ rtsi sman chen po dang/ rgyu skar rgyal po dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po dang/ bsod nams glang po dang/ cod par mdzad pa dang/ rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po dang/ nyi ma'i 'od zer dang/ chos kyi mdzod dang/ blo gros bzang po dang/ yon tan mtshungs
17b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje'i sde dang/ shes rab brtsegs dang/ legs par gnas pa dang/ blo sbyangs dang/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ yon tan mchog dang/ 'brug sgra dbyangs dang/ mngon par shes pa'i tog dang/ tog gi 'od dang/ dge ba dang/ tshangs pa dang/ skyes
17b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang/ spyan sdug pa dang/ klus byin pa dang/ bden pa'i tog dang/ rgyan pa dang/ zhum pa med pa'i dbyangs dang/ rin chen 'od dang/ dbyangs byin dang/ seng ge dang/ 'od zer sna tshogs dang/ ye shes dpa' bo dang/ pad+ma'i phung po dang/ me tog rgyas pa
17b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mthu rtsal stobs dang/ bsod nams phung po dang/ gzugs mchog dang/ skar mkhan dang/ zla ba'i sgron ma dang/ gzi brjid phung po dang/ byang chub rgyal po dang/ mi bzad pa dang/ mngon rtogs spyan dang/ yan lag rgyas pa dang/ yul 'khor dang
17b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang/ mchog dang/ gzi brjid tshim mdzad dang/ shes rab 'byin dang/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang/ chags pa med pa'i mdzod dang/ gtso bos byin dang/ gtso bo dang/ ye shes mthu rtsal dang/ 'od 'phro can dang/ dbang po dang/ shugs 'chad
18a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ skar rgyal dang/ 'od bzang dang/ grags pa byin dang/ gzugs bzang po dang/ rgyal po dang/ don grub pa dang/ seng ge'i sde dang/ nor bu'i lha dang/ grags pa dang/ rgyal ba dang/ rgyal chen snying po dang/ bsod nams 'od zer
18a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ smrad 'dod pa dang/ sgron ma'i rgyal po dang/ ye shes brtsegs pa dang/ lha mchog dang/ sa bdag dang/ rnam grol brnyes dang/ gtsug gi gser dang/ sgra gcan bzang po dang/ thub dka' dang/ thub gsal dang/ zla ba'i 'od zer dang/ gser gyi 'od
18a3(rgyud 'grel): zer dang/ legs byin dang/ lha'i yon tan dbang po dang/ chos kyi gdugs dang/ bsod nams lag dang/ chags med dang/ ye shes gya nom dang/ blo zhib mo dang/ gzi byin thams cad dang/ rtsi sman dang/ rnam grol tog dang/ 'od kyi mdzod dang/
18a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgyal po dang/ 'jigs mdzad dang/ chu bo spong ba dang/ thogs med grags pa dang/ bden pa'i phung po dang/ dbyangs snyan dang/ ri dbang mtshungs dang/ chos brtsegs dang/ thar pa'i gzi byin dang/ legs 'dzin dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang/
18a5(rgyud 'grel): yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dang/ blo sbyangs pa dang/ chu lha dang/ 'gro bas mchod dang/ seng ge'i logs dang/ chos kyi mthu rtsal dang/ bskal pa bzang po dang/ mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog dang/ gzi brjid rgyal po dang/ rtogs mdzad dang/ spyan
18a6(rgyud 'grel): legs pa dang/ don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba dang/ snang ba'i 'od zer dang/ spos kyi gzi brjid dang/ kun tu dga' bar mdzad pa dang/ don yod par gshegs pa dang/ khro ba bcom dang/ gzugs mchog dang/ legs gshegs dang/
18a7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu sbyin par grags dang/ 'od gtsang dang/ lha yi nyi ma dang/ shes rab byin pa dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid dang/ gzi mdangs dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ skal ldan shing rta dang/ gser mchog dang/ rnam par grol ba'i
18b1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug lag dang/ chos ldan dang/ spos gnas dang/ dregS spangs dang/ ye shes mdzod dang/ tshangs par gshegs dang/ tsan dan dang/ mya ngan med dang/ seng+ge'i 'od zer dang yul 'khor tog dang/ pad+ma'i snying po dang/ gzi brjid mdza' yas dang/ lha'i 'od zer dang
18b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab tog dang/ mkhas pa dang/ ye shes 'byor ldan dang/ tshangs pa'i dbyig dang/ phyag na rin chen dang/ dbang ldan dang/ rdzogs par gsungs dang/ mchog tu gsungs dang/ mchod 'os dang/ skar rgyal dang/ nyi ma dang/ 'dam las rgal ba dang/ ye
18b3(rgyud 'grel): shes brnyes pa dang/ grub pa dang/ rma bya dang/ chos byin dang/ phan par bzhed pa dang/ ye shes ldan pa dang/ grags pa dang/ 'od zer gyi dra ba dang/ rnam pa bcom pa dang/ baiDUrya'i snying po dang/ me tog dang/ lha'i rgyal po dang/ zla ba dang/ dran pa'i 'od
18b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dge ba'i 'od dang/ yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od dang/ rin po che'i dpal dang/ skyes bu zla ba dang/ sgra gcan dang/ bdud rtsi'i 'od dang/ 'jig rten gyi mchog dang/ skar ma'i 'od dang/ zhi ba'i stobs dang/ ye shes rgya mtsho dang/ ri bo'i dbang po
18b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rab tu zhi ba dang/ yon tan mdza' yas pa'i stobs dang/ lha'i dbang po dang/ dbyangs snyan dang/ ngos bzang dang/ don la gnas pa dang/ yon tan gzi brjid dpal dang/ mkhyen ldan zla med dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ 'od bzang dang/ shin tu thugs
18b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhungs dang/ don dgongs gti mug bral ba dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags dang/ mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa dang/ zhi ba'i don dang/ skyon med dang/ blo sbyangs dge ba dang/ pad+ma'i mdzod dang/ 'od zer bzang po dang/ spobs pa'i mdog dang/
18b7(rgyud 'grel): stegs bzang po dang/ tshogs kyi dbang po dang/ bsnyengs pa dang bral ba dang/ ye shes bzhed pa dang/ spobs pa'i spyan dang/ blo'i mchog dang/ zla ba dang/ rin chen zla 'od dang/ bsnyengs pa med pa dang/ gzigs pa med pa dang/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ dbyangs
19a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang/ shes rab chen po'i stegs dang/ blo gros zla med dang/ rdo rje mkhegs dang/ byang chub blo gros dang/ ljon shing dbang po dang/ gdangs snyan pa dang/ bsod nams kyi stobs dang/ mthu'i dpal rnams so/ /shar la sogs
19a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim bzhin du/ /dkar po chom rkun ro langs ma/ /za bong ma yang rnam par dgod/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /spos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin/ /gtum mo dang ni g.yung mo sde/ /rim pas ljon bzhin brtag ces bya/ /dkyil
19a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'khor lo gsum pa la/ /dga' ba bzhi ni dag pa yis/ /kun nas ri mo bzhin can no/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'khor lo ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /byis pa gsod dang lhag ma za/ /g.yul grags po dang mche ba kun/ /shar la sogs pa g.yon
19a4(rgyud 'grel): skor du/ /de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam/ /dub mun nag nang gi me/ /hA hA'i sgra dang sgra chen no/ /shing ni tsan dan ga bur dang/ /dzA ti phal dang e la/ /nA ga ge sar tsam pa dang/ /kun tu ru dang lha yi shing/ /phyogs skyong rnams ni mtshon bya ba/ /nyi ma bsil ba sa
19a5(rgyud 'grel): ri? bu/ /ri bong can skyes bla ma nyid/ /ngan spong nyi ma'i bu de bzhin/ /lha min mgo bor shes bya ste/ /drag po'i gdong rnams su bya'o/ /'bar ba ral gri chu gri dang/ /mdud rings spu gri brag de bzhin/ /glog dang sna tshogs mtshon 'bebs par/ /dur khrod kyis ni
19a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bya/ /ral gri mig sman ri lu dang/ rkang pa byug dang bcud len dang/ /mchil lha ma dngul chu sa 'og gi/ dngos grub bsgrub pa mkhas pas bya zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum gyi
19a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid ngo// /de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di gsal ba'o/ /mdog rnams sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs/ /thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog /klu mo gnod sbyin mo'i byung mo/ /yi dwags dmyal mo mnar med mo/ /ltung
19b1(rgyud 'grel): ba mo dang bar med ma/ /bum mo gshin rje ma de bzhin/ /thig nag ma dang me mdag ma/ /tshab mo dang rab tsha mo/ /du 'bod ma dang du 'bod che/ /mang nag dug 'tshong ri gnyis 'tshir/ /sdang ma rmongs ma phrag dog ma/ /chags myos ser sna skud pa ma/ /grang maN+Dal
19b2(rgyud 'grel): grib nags ma nyid/ /du ma dang ni mu ge ma/ /nad dgon ma dang mtshon gyi dang/ /chu yi dgon pa ma dang ni/ /ral gri sen mo rab med ma/ /spu gri'i se ma 'khor lo ma/ /grul bum mo ste lha mo che/ /mdog ni 'khor lo ji 'dra ba'o/ /phyag na mtshon cha sngon bzhin
19b3(rgyud 'grel): du/ /shes bya rang gi gzugs can no/ /de la nye ba'i dur khrod dang/ /de nas sa ni chos kyi sprin/ /sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid/ /kun 'gro 'khor lo can du 'dod/ /rang bzhin spangs pas bdag med pa/ /'khor lo can sar zhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo rnams
19b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rim ji bzhin/ /thams cad de ltar shes par bya/ /gnas bzhi rnams la bcu gnyis so/ /de ltar bcu drug ces bya ba/ /stong pa nyid du mkhas pa yi/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir/ /dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni//
19b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bdag nyid ming gis so/ /phyi nas gzhan ni thams cad ni/ /'khor lo gnyis su shes par bya/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo dang po'o// //de nas phyi rol du gzhan pa/ /gsung gi 'khor lo de bshad bya/ /dmar po btsod kyi kha dog ste/
19b6(rgyud 'grel): sum cu drug rtsibs bdag nyid gtso/ /mchod pa zam gnyis mdang/ /le lo mchos sems sgom mo/ /khyim sems bud med sems ma dang/ /don sems ma dang sbyor bral ma/ /bu sems rnams dang mya ngan ma/ /bsam gtan ma dang sngags zlos ma//
19b7(rgyud 'grel): ngo tsha nga rgyal gdungs pa mo/ /sems can don byed brtson ma dang/ /rgyal po sems ma gzhan gnod ma/ /ye shes thob ma dka' thub ma/ /rgas ma 'chi ba'i bsam pa can/ /bde ba sdug ma mi dge ma/ /yod dang med dang gnyis dang ni/ /bla ma
20a1(rgyud 'grel): sems la 'gro ba mo/ /bzod ma mi bzod ma ngal ma/ /ngal sos ma dang bkres pa mchog/ las ni thams cad byed lha mo/ /rang bzhin 'khor lo 'di che ba'o/ /kha dog rang bzhin 'khor lor grags/ /lhag ma 'dir ni sngon bzhin no/ /shes
20a2(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud stong phrag ni/ /bcu gnyis pa las bshad pa ste/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi/ /mchod sogs lha mor 'dod pa yin/ /grong mdza' i gnas ni 'di lta bu/ /kun
20a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'od kyis yin no/ /de ltar ye shes sogs sku'i mdza' / /rlung me chu dang nam mkha' i yi/ /bskor ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya bar/ /rdo rje mchog mang shes par bya zhes bya ba ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnyis pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o// //de nas sku yi
20a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdog can/ /sum cu rtsa drug dbyibs 'dra ba/ /rnal 'byor ma 'khor sgyur ma'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi rigs ma dang/ /sum cu rtsa gsum 'khor sgyur ma/ /'thab bral dga' ldan 'khor sgyur ma/ /'phrul dga' ma dang
20a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ma dang ni/ /tshangs ris ma yi 'khor lo ma/ /tshangs pa mdun 'don ma de bzhin/ /tshangs pa chen po 'khor sgyur ma/ /'od chung tshad med 'od ma dang/ /'od gsal ma dang dge chung ma/ /tshad med dge ba'i 'khor sgyur
20a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /dge rgyas ma dang sprin med ma/ /bsod nams skyes pa'i 'khor lo dang/ /'bras bu chen po'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /mi tshe mi gdung 'khor sgyur ma/ /shin tu mtho ma bzang snang ma/ /'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched ma//
20a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam/ shes mdza' yas skye mched ma/ /ci'ang med skye mched ma de nas/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min ma/ /dmyal mo yi dags ma de bzhin/ /dud 'gro mi mo lha min mo/ /gzhal med mkha' spyod ma de bzhin/ /zla mo nyi mo gshin rje mo/ /dbang
20b1(rgyud 'grel): mo 'khor sgyur mar shes bya/ /rang gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngar bzhin no/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te/ /nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas/ /sa ni mos pas spyod pa'o/ /de nas de yi phyi khyams la/ /'phags pa
20b2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa dang/ mthu stobs dang/ skar ma la dgyes pa dang/ sprin gyi rnga sgra dang/ spyan sdug zhal dang/ ye shes bzang ldan dang/ 'byor ldan dang/ yon tan phung po dang/ gsal ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ ye shes nga ro dang/ nam mkha' dang/
20b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin pa ro dang/ shes rab rnam dgod nga ro dang/ yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid dang/ /drang srong dbang po dang/ blo ldan dang/ spobs pa'i tshogs dang/ mchod sbyin bzang po dang/ zla ba'i zhal dang/ shin tu gzigs dang/ rdul bral dang/ yon
20b4(rgyud 'grel): tan tshogs dang/ tog ldan dang/ bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang/ yul 'khor spobs pa dang/ rin chen rab sbyin dang/ zla dgyes dang/ seng ge'i stobs dang/ dbang skyur rgyal po dang/ bdud rtsi gsal pa dang/ bsam gtan snyams dang/ 'khrul
20b5(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa dang/ dri ma rab tu zhi ba dang/ phyogs ma slad dang/ mdzes pa dang/ zhal bzang dang/ shugs gnas ye shes ldan dang/ gsung gi dbang po dang/ gzi brjid chen po dang/ blo gros zab mo dang/ bdud rtsi dang/ chos kyi stobs dang/ mchod
20b6(rgyud 'grel): par ldan pa dang/ me tog 'od dang/ khams gsum dag gi mchod pa'i gnas dang/ sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po dang/ lha'i mchod pa dang/ thar pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dge ba'i gtsug dang/ bdud rtsi'i 'od dang/ rdo rje dang/ brtan pa dang/ rin chen phung
20b7(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ mdzes par gshegs dang/ nyi ma lta bur gshegs pa dang/ dag pa'i 'od dang/ yon tan gtsug dang/ dpal rdzogs pa dang/ seng sge'i stobs dang/ gyen du 'phags pa dang/ me tog phyin dang/ 'od 'gyed pa dang/ pad+ma dang/ ye shes
21a1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa dang/ bkod pa mdzes dang/ gti mug med par gnas pa dang/ rma med pa dang/ tog gi rgyal mtshan dang/ bde bar dgongs dang/ gti mug med pa'i rgyal po dang/ cho ga mkhyen pa dang/ ngag pa'i rgya mtsho dang/ rin chen mnga' 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ mi mnga' ba dang/ skye bo dga' mdzad dang/ rma bya'i nga ro dang/ ma zhum pa dang/ srid pa'i sred pa'i dri ma spangs pa dang/ spyod pa'i stegs dang/ lha mo dag gi snyan par bsgrags pa dang/ rin po che'i stabs dang/ phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa dang/ dpal
21a3(rgyud 'grel): dag dgra las rgyal ba dang/ 'byor ldan grags pa dang/ yul 'khor bzang po dang/ me tog 'od dang/ seng ge'i nga ro dang/ zla ba ltor shar dang/ 'joms pa'i mchog dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pa dang/ bsod nams sgron ma'i
21a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dang/ dbyangs kyis bskul ba dang/ gau ta mi dang/ mdangs stobs dang/ blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang/ zla ba bzang po dang/ byang chub yan lag me tog spos dang/ bkra shis dang/ legs ston dang/ ye shes gzi brjid stobs dang/ mthu rtsal
21a5(rgyud 'grel): brtan po dang/ lha'i sgra dang/ rab tu zhi ba dang/ nyi ma'i zhal dang/ thar pa'i brtul zhugs dang/ tshul khrims 'od dang/ brtul zhugs gnas pa dang/ rdul med pa dang/ snying po 'phags pa dang/ mig sman dang/ 'phel bar mdzad pa dang/ spos
21a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od dang/ dus gsum mkhyen pa'i 'od dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ thogs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ byang chub mchog tu bgrod pa dang/ spyod pa gsal ba dang/ rin chen dgyes dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang /lha thams cad dang/ bsheS gnyen chen?
21a7(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen bzang po dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i stabs dang/ bdud rtsi'i bdag po dang/ lhun po'i 'od dang/ 'phags pas bstod dang/ snang ldan dang/ gzi brjid 'bar ba dang/ snang ba gzigs dang/ legs spyad rnam par smin dang/ legs
21b1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes dang/ mya ngan bral dang/ rin chen 'od dang/ spyod par ldan dang/ bsod nams stobs dang/ yon tan rgya mtsho dang/ rmad du byung ba dang/ nga rgyal spong ba dang/ bdud brlag mdzad dang/ bag chags las rgal ba'i stobs dang/ mi phyed pa'i blo
21b2(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ dag par mdzad pa dang/ tshogs can sgrol ba'i rgyal po dang/ dga' ba'i 'od dang/ byang chub rgyal mtshan dang/ ye shes rin chen dang/ shin tu bsil ba dang/ tshangs pa rgyal ba dang/ ye shes dgyes dang/ rdzu 'phrul tog dang
21b3(rgyud 'grel): skye dbang mtshungs dang/ sa'i dbang phyug dang/ nyi ma dgyes dang/ sgra gcan zla ba dang/ me tog 'od dang/ sman pa'i bdag dang/ mdangs mnga' ba dang/ bsod nams dgyes dang/ dga' ba'i stobs dang/ dbyangs snyan pa dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/
21b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ spyod bzangs dang/ 'khrul pa med pa'i blo dang/ dbyangs chen po dang/ snyan par grags pa dang /tog ldan dang/ gzi brjid rnam par grags pa dang/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang/ ljon pa dang/ gti mug rab tu zad pa dang/
21b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa dang/ zla ba bzang po dang/ spobs pa mdza' yas tog dang/ brtul zhugs brtan pa dang/ mchod pa'i gnas dang/ mya ngan rgal ba dang/ dge ba dgyes dang/ 'gro ba'i blo gros dang/ dgyes par gshegs dang/ zhabs mdzes pa
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ utpal dang/ dul gnas me tog dang/ spobs pa mdza' yas 'od zer dang/ drang srong gsal ba dang/ yon tan brtson 'grus dang/ snying po dang /lha'i bdag po dang/ rin chen mthon po dang/ gsal ba dang/ skal ldan shing rta can dang /bsod
21b7(rgyud 'grel): nams blo gros dang/ sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang/ yon tan mdza' yas gzi brjid phung po dang/ seng ge'i stabs dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ rab gsal dang/ 'od spyod dang/ glu dbyangs dang/ 'khor lo 'dzin dang/ dbyig gi mchog dang/ 'jig rten las
22a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang/ chos zla dang/ dga' ba mdza' yas grags pa dang/ sprin gyi tog dang/ shes rab 'gros dang/ spos bzang dang /nam mkha' i dbyangs dang /lha dang /lha'i rgyal ba dang/ nor bu gsal ba dang/ nor bzangs dang/ sgron
22a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs dang/ skye dbang rgyal po dang/ sgra gcan sbed dang/ dge ba mdzad pa dang/ seng+ge'i blo gros dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ rin chen grags pa dang/ don mdzad dang/ mdzad pa mdza' yas gzigs pa dang/ srid pa'i me tog
22a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mdzod spu ldan dang/ spobs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po dang/ ye shes rnam par 'byed pa'i nga ro dang/ seng ge'i mche ba dang/ mdzes par gshegs pa dang /bsod nams sgron ma dang/ bkra shis ldan dang/ yul 'khor mya ngan med pa
22a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ blo gros sems dpa' dang/ blo dang ldan pa dang/ chos kyi sgron ma'i spyan dang/ shin tu gzigs dang/ shugs kyi 'od 'dor ba dang/ stobs can dang/ shes rab me tog dang/ brtan pa'i dbyangs dang/ bde ldan dang/ don gsungs dang/
22a5(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par gsal ba dang/ seng ge'i zhal dang/ gtsug ? dang/ snang mdzad rnams te/ phyag rgya sna tshogs mdzad pa'o/ /'khor lo 'di ni gru bzhi ste/ /sprul pa'i sku ni 'du shes so/ /ri mo lnga ni me long sogs/ /thams cad mtshan nyid kyi mtshan
22a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yis/ /mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o/ /phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnams te/ /sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin/ /shar du chu skyes dkar mo sgom/ /byang du gand+ha ri ma'o/ /nub tu rdo rje gar ma ste/ /lho ru rta
22a7(rgyud 'grel): rgod ma yi kha/ /gru yi char ni lha mo bzhi/ /dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin/ /lha mo rdo rje 'bar zhal ma/ /rdo rje khro gnyer ma yi zhal/ /rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste/ /kha dog la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /drag mo chen mo gtsigs pa'i zhal//
22b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes ma'o/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o/ /kun la mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /dpa' bo nams la dar phreng can/ /ral pa'i cod pan dpa' de rnams/ /yan lag kun la thal bas
22b2(rgyud 'grel): bskus/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyi/ /nu ma mkhrang zhing mtho ba ste/ /lag gdub spyi gtsug brgyan pa dang/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba/ /dang por tshig bar shes bya
22b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gnyis pa yang ni ma tshig par/ /gsum par dum bur gyur pa nyid/ /bzhi pa yang ni ma gtubs pa/ /lnga pa 'jigs su rung ba bshad/ /drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa/ /bdun pa gsal shing phug pa ste/ /steng nas btags pa'o/ /dur khrod brgyad por
22b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu ni/ /dmyal bsrungs chen po brgyad rnams so/ /shA ma li shing mya ngan med/ /yongs su u 'bar de bzhin no/ /Dom pa ri dang ma b+ha ri/ /rgya shugs dang ni ba ru rA'o/ /sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs//
22b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan/ /gang yin de yang rdzu 'phrul che/ /mgo med brgyug dang gzhan yang ni/ /mgo bo med par gar byed dang/ /nyal ba dang ni rkang med dang/ /mgo bo lus sogs gtub pa ste/ /ting 'dzin chen po rgyu yis ni/ /de ltar gar
22b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas gar byed pa'o/ /de ltar de'i dbus su ni/ /rgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin/ /kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste/ /bzhon pa gang gi yin pa'o/ /de ltar dur khrod kun la bya/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid/ /yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgom
22b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /'di ni sku'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dang sprul pa dang lhan cig pa ste gsum pa'o// //gtso bo'i thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gis sa bon ljang sngon bsam par bya'o/ /mgo bor zla ba dang 'khor la
23a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i oM dkar po'o/ /mgrin par zla ba dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'o/ /snying gar zla ba dang rdo rje la gnas pa'i hUM sngon po'o/ /dkyil 'khor pa thams cad la yang snying kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM rang rang gi kha dog
23a2(rgyud 'grel): can yod par bsam par mos par bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka'i hUM gnyis kyi bar du raM dmar po las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du oM ha baM hA baM/ hi bi hI bI/ hu bu hU bU/ he be hai bai/ ho bo haM bau/ haM baM ha(rgyud 'grel): ba(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT
23a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA swAhA/ zhes bya ba kha dog dkar dmar g.yon bskor du sprul 'khyil ba ltar gnas pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang phag mo ngo bo /mgo bor de bzhin du nyi ma la/ oM na haM nA hA ni hi nI hI nu huM nU hUM ne heM nai haiM naM haM na(rgyud 'grel): ha(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT
23a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA swAhA/ ser zhing sngo bas rnam par snang mdzad do/ /gshin rje mi'i rang bzhin no/ /spyi gtsug tu nyi ma la/ oM swa h+raM swA h+rAM swi h+riM swI h+rI swU h+ruM swe h+re swe h+rEeM swo h+roM swau h+raM swa:h+rA(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA swAhA zhes bya ba dmar zhing dkar ba
23a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang rmongs byed ma'i ngo bo'o/ /dpung pa gnyis kyi nang du nyi ma la oM ba h+raM bA h+rAM bi h+raM bI h+rI bu h+rA bU h+rUM be h+rEM bai h+raiM ba h+reM bau h+rau baM h+raM bA(rgyud 'grel): h+ra(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA swAhA/ zhes bya ba gnag cing ser ba he ru ka dang
23a6(rgyud 'grel): bskrod byed ma'o/ /spyan gnyis pa la nyi ma'i steng du /oM huM h+rUM haM haM hAM hAM/ hiM hiM hIM hIM/ hUM hUM heM heM haiM haiM ho ho hau hau haM haM ha:ha(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA swAhA zhes bya ba rnams dmar zhing ljang ba rdo rje nyi ma dang skrag byed ma'o//
23a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzod spu'i thad ka'i nang du nyi ma la oM pha pha phA phA phi phi phI phI phu phu phU phU phe phe phai phai pho pho phau phau phaM phaM pha:pha(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA swAhA zhes bya ba ljang zhing dud kha rta mchog dang gtum mo ste 'di las yi ge'i tshogs 'phros
23b1(rgyud 'grel): pas rkang mthil nas spyi bo'i bar de'i rdul phra rab bo/ /lus kyi phyi rol tu oM ha dkar po snying ga dang/ na ma hi ser po mgo bo la dang/ swAhA hu dmar po spyi gtsug tu dang/ bau Sha Da he nag po dpung pa gnyis la dang/ hUM hUM ho dmar ser mig gnyis la dang/
23b2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag thams cad la phaT haM ljang gu'o/ /rdo rje phag mo'i lte bar oM baM dmar po dang/ haM yo sngon mo snying gar ro/ /h+riM moM dkar mo kha la'o/ /h+reM h+riM ser mo mgo bo la'o/ /hUM hUM ljang gu spyi gtsug tu'o/ /phaT phaT dud kha smin mtshams su bkod de/ de
23b3(rgyud 'grel): las 'phros pa'i lus thams cad dgang ba'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par bya ste/ de yang 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dpral bar bskor ba dang/ rkang pa g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan pa dang/ snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis grub
23b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mdun du spyan drangs te sa bon las spros pa'i pi wang ma la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas rang rang gi steng du dgug pa dang/ hUM gis chul chu zhugs pa bzhin du gzhug pa dang/ bam gyis bcing ba
23b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ho(rgyud 'grel): yis dgyes par bya'o/ /de nas yang rang gi snying kha'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nas byung ba'i cha lugs can/ rigs lnga dpag tu med pa spyan drangs pa rnams la yang pi wang ma la sogs pa yis mchod de
