39b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'ching bar byed pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ mgo so? 'khrigs ngas? reg pa'i sku can/ gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang/ sngags 'joms pa po/ bsrung ba chen po byed pa/ sdang ba rnams kyi rnam par 'joms pa po/ chos
39b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar mdzed pa/ khro bo sngo zhing spro bar byed du 'jug pa/ dbang po'i dra ba sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid can/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ rab tu rtsod pa'i blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa'o// //sh+rI dza ya se na dang/
39b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur ro/ /dge ba 'di yis nye bar mtshon nas ni/ /sems can rnams kyi dus gsum bsags pa yi/ /brag bcas zag med zung 'jug dge ba rnams/ /bla med byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi/ /'gro kun thams cad mkhyen pa thob par shog//
40a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa gsum ma lus stobs rang bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rig mar bcas/ /bla ma rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal nas/ /gtor ma'i de nyid brjod par bya/ /de la mtshan byed
40a2(rgyud 'grel): dam ji ltar khom pa'i dus su rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ gtor ma shin tu chen po nya dang sha la soga pa dang/ zan dang chang dang nye bar spyad pa lnga dang bdud rtsi dang bcas pa mdun du bzhag ste/ de yang ma dmigs pa las 'og tu yaM sngo skya
40a3(rgyud 'grel): de yongs su gyur pas las/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can mdza' gnyis na ba dan gyis mtshan pa/ de'i steng du raM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las/ me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng gi gru gsum laS
40a4(rgyud 'grel): mdun nas g.yon bskor du dkar ba dang/ dmar pa dang/ gnag pa'i oM A:hUM gsum yongs su gyur pa las keng rus kyi mgo gsum gyi sgyed pa dang/ de'i steng du a dkar po yongs su gyur pa las thod pa'i snod chen po bsams te/ de'i sha
40a5(rgyud 'grel): du bi dkar po dang/ byang du mu ljang gu dang/ nub du ma dmar po dang/ lhor ra ser po dang/ dbus su a dkar po yongs su gyur pa las dri chen dri chu dang/ sha chen po dang/ rang byung dang byang chub kyi sems rnams su gyur te rang rang gi yi ges mtshan
40a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ bden bral dang/ rlung dang dbang ldan dang dbus rnams rim pa bzhin du/ go ku da ha na dkar ba dang sngo ba dang dmar ba dang ljang ba dang/ sngo pa rnams yongs su gyur pa las ba lang khyi dang glang po che dang rta dang mi'i sha
40a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la rang rang gi yi ges mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du hUM dkar po kha 'og tu bltas pa yongs su gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi keng rus kyi kha NwE ga 'og tu bltas pa hUM gis mtshan pa bsams te/ de g.yon du 'khor bas rlung g.yos
40b1(rgyud 'grel): pas me sbar te thams cad zhu nas ser po bla ba'i dngos por gyur te rlangs pa nam mkha' la chags pa rnams g.yon bskor dang g.yas bskor du A li dang kA li'i phreng bar gyur te de rnams 'dres shing yongs su gyur pa las kha dog gsum dang ldan pa'i yi ge gsum du gyur te de
40b2(rgyud 'grel): dag las khams gsum gyi ngo bo'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi lha'i tshogs spros te sems can thams cad kyang bde ba dang ldan par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gnas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi
40b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bkug pa snyoms par zhugs pas yi ge gsum la gzhug par bya'o/ /de dag kyang rim gyis 'og tu lhung bas gtor ma la thim ste/ kha TwAM ga ya zhu bas kha dog dkar po bsil ba phun sum tshogs par bltas te/ yi ge gsum ji tsam 'dod par
40b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer dang skye gnas kyi phyag rgya dpral bar bskor ba dang/ mig steng du blta ba dang/ phaT kyi sgra dang rkang pa mnan pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mdun gyi
40b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkhar chos 'byung chen po'i nang du spyan drangs te pad+ma'i lag pa bskor nas snying gar se gol brdab par bya'o/ /de nas zhabs bsil la sogs pa dang/ me tog la sogs pa lnga dang/ pi wang ma la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzis mchod par bya'o/ /lag pa
40b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon par A li las zla ba dang/ g.yas par kA li las nyi ma dang kha sbyar ba'i dbus hUM kha dog sngon po bsams te/ oM u n+yo n+tA nu ga ta:sarba d+harmA hUM oM spa ra spa rA nu pra piSh+Ta sarba d+harmA hUM/ oM a tyan+tA nu pra piSh+Ta:sarba d+harmA hUM zhes brjod pas/ lag pa rdo rje rtse
40b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga par bsgoms te thal mo kha phye la lag par gtor ma bzhag la rnam pa gsum dbyer med pa'i ngo bor lhag par dmigs te/ lha mo tshang ma'i dam tshig tshang ma de /nges gsung dag kyang mchog tu tshang ma'o/ /nges ni bden par gyur cig 'di ru ni/ /lha 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): mos bdag la rjes 'dzin rgyur gyur cig ces brjod de lha rnams kyis ljags hUM dkar po las rdo rje bsams la/ oM a ral+li ho(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:badzra DA ki ni sa ma ya stwaM dri sh+ya ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas lan ldar brjod pas dur khrod na gnas pa
41a2(rgyud 'grel): ma gtogs pas rdo rje'i spu gus drangs nas gsol bar bsam mo/ /de nas yang zhal bsil la sogs pa thams cad dang/ so rtsi yang phul te rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rkang pa brgyad pa dang bcas pas bstod pa dang/ 'dod pa'i don la bslang ba
41a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bkra shis brjod pa dang/ yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dur khrod pa rnams kyi lce phyin gyis brlabs te oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hu ha pre ta pi shA tsa unTa da/ a basmA ra DA ka DA ki n+ya da ya i maM ba laiM? grih+Nan tu sarba sid+hi
41a4(rgyud 'grel): me pra yats+tshan tu ya thai baM ya thaiSh+TaM b+huny+dza tha pi wa tha mA tikra ma tha ma ma sarba ka ri ta ya/ satshu kha bi brid+dA ye ma ma sa hA yi ka b+ha wan+tu hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod pas thams cad kyis 'thungs par bsam mo/ /de nas de rnams la yang
41a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la sogs pa thams cad sngar bzhin byas la/ srid dang zhi ba mnyam pas zhon pa bcom zhing kun tu rtog pa bcom/ /dngos dang dngos po ma yin thams cad mkha' bzhin rnam par/ /zigs pa rnams/ /bla ma mchog gi thugs rje'i chu spro
41a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs ni chu'i mgon po rnams/ /mdzod cig mdzod cig lha mos bdag la rjes su thugs ni brtse bar mdzod/ /ces brjod la mig gi phyag rgya bstan la pad+ma'i lag pas bskor lte bar 'khyud pas se gol gtogs te/ oM badzra maN+Dal mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod
41a7(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor bdag nyid mdzod spu nas gzhug par bya ste/ rol mo dang mar me'i snang ba dang bcas pas bskyal bar bya'o/ /gtor ma'i chog byas pa las/ /byung ba'i dge bas 'gro ba kun/ /lus sems bde bas gnas gyur cig/ stobs bcu
41b1(rgyud 'grel): dang yang ldan par shog/ dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi gtor ma'i cho ga rin po che asma garb+ha mkhas pa dza ya se na'i gsung dpal ye shes rdo rjes bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma yongs su
41b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa las/ /dngos grub ma lus 'byung ba'i phyir/ /rgya mtsho nyid nas gsungs pa yi/ /bla ma'i maN+Dal bshad par bya/ /de la thog mar bla ma'i mdun duAm gzhan du yang rung ste chu dang me tog la sogs pa tshogs par byas la rkang pa bkrus te/
41b3(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI:swAhA/ zhes bya bas lag pa bkru ba dang/ kha bshal bar bya'o/ /oM hUM zhes bya bas bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyis stan byin gyis brlabs pa yang bya'o/ /oM badzra b+hU mi hUM zhes bya bas sa gzung bar bya'o/ /oM sarba
41b4(rgyud 'grel): big+h+nan ut? ra ya hUM swAhA zhes bya bas chu dang lci ba srog chags med pas byug par bya'o/ /oM A:badzra re khe hUM zhes bya bas lag pa g.yas pas me tog g.yon pa'i rgyab tu bzhag la maN+Dal du dor ro/ /oM su re khe sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi taSh+Than+tu swAhA zhes bya
41b5(rgyud 'grel): bas lag pa bkru bar bya'o/ /oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni ma hA pra ti sa ri rak+Sha rak+Sha maM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA zhes bya bas rang gi mgo bo la me tog bzhag pas bdag nyid bsrung par bya'o/ /de nas maN+Dal de nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dbye bas nyi ma dang zla bar bsams te
41b6(rgyud 'grel): oM tsan+d+ra ra ka bi ma le swAhA zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /de nas sngar gyi me tog de bsal te oM badzra ku ru swAhA zhes bya bas dbus su me tog gcig bzhag go /de bzhin du shar dang byang dang nub dang/ lho rnams su oM sarba sun+ta ri swAhA/
41b7(rgyud 'grel): oM pri ya nga? ut+ta maM swAhA/ oM ra mi kA tA rA swAhA/ oM bi mA sa badzra swAhA zhes bya bas so/ /me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan rnams su oM bud+d+ha lo tsa ni swAhA/ oM mA ma kI swAhA/ oM paN+Da ra bA sI swAhA/ oM tA rA swAhA zhes bya bas me tog dgon do/ /
42a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas skad cig gi sbyor bas dbus kyi me tog gi steng du rdo rje sems dpa' i rol pas bzhugs pa'i bla ma bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhir rim pa bzhin du sngo ba dang ljang ba dang dmar ba dang ser ba'i kha dog can thams cad
42a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes ma dga' ba'i mchog ma dang/ shin tu brtse ma dang rol pa'i rdo rje ma ste thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa lang tshol bab pa ki ka'i 'bras pa phyed mar bkas pa lta bu'i nu ma can chags pa'i sems kyi
42a3(rgyud 'grel): zur mig tu blta ba lag na rin po che dang sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i snyim pas gtso bo la stobs par byed pa dang/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su dkar ba dang sngo ba dang dmar ba dang ljang ba'i kha dog can gyi sangs rgyas spyan ma dang/ mA ma ki dal/
42a4(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar mo dang /sgrol ma rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ utpal thogs pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis mchod pa sna tshogs 'dzin pas gtso bo la ster ba ste rgyan la
42a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa thams cad sngar dang 'dra ba/ thams cad kyang sgeg cing rol pa'i 'dug stangs can gsal bar bsams la/ oM badzra satwa gu ru pA de b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba satwo pa ka ra NA ya swAhA zhes bya bas phyag byas te dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas lha mo rnams slob dpon la/
42a6(rgyud 'grel): thim pas thugs dgyes par bsams te/ oM A:hUM mu:zhes brjod pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog bsdus te rang gi mgo bor gzhag la ji ltar bde par gnas par bya'o/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho yi/ /rgyud las man
42a7(rgyud 'grel): dag gis bsrubs nas/ /maN+Dal rin chen phul gang des/ /'gro kun chos rgyal 'khor sgyur shog /rin po che ma rgad mkhas pa ji? ya se na'i gsung/ dpal ye shes rdo rjes bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bzhugs so/ /bcom
42b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdong nas dag pa dri ma med/ /spros pa med cing brjod du med/ /thams cad g.yogs nas rnam par 'phrul/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtshol phyag 'tshal/ /de nyid ngo bo dbyer med pa/ /'khor ba la? yi
42b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzung nas/ /rang gi gdul bya'i don mdzad pa/ /bla ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje thog pa'i tshul chen la/ /rang rang dkyil 'khor ma bzhugs na/ /bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin phyir/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho yi/ /dbang bskur
42b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa skyon med pa/ /bla ma'i man ngag bri bar bya/ /gang zhig rang gi rgyud rnams su/ /chog rdzogs par ma gsungs pa/ /de ni rgyun mchog gzhan rnams las/ /rdzogs mdzad mkhas pa rnams kyang bzhed// //de la slob ma gtsang ba brtson
42b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grus dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa spangs pa/ /gzhan gyi rig pa sun mi 'don pa/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i slob mas/ slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid kyang/ sems can kun la phan pa nyid/ /mi 'jigs
42b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi spobs nyid dang/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor pa shes/ /sbyor pa bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs/ /mthun pa'i dag dang thams cad la/ /bu gcig pa ltar mthun pa dang/ /gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga' / /bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde mchog gzhol/ /
42b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed/ /'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i ngag /sems can kun la thugs brtse dang/ /lam du 'jug pa de mthar phyin/ /kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang/ /bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol son/ /mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma/ phyag
42b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya bde ni byed pa po /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan bcos mang du thos pa/ sngags dang rgyud kyi chog shes pa/ bzod pa dang ldan pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shes pa/ dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob
43a1(rgyud 'grel): pa de nyid kyi rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i bla ma la maN+Dal la sogs pa'i sgo nas ji srid du mnyes par ma gyur pa de srid 'bad pas mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas bla mas bu khyod ci 'dod ces dris te des kyang rang gi bsam pa smra bar
43a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas slob mas bla ma la mchod pa'i sprin gyis rab tu mchod de/ oM sarba ta thA ? ka ya bak+tsit+ta pra NA me na badzra bandA naM ka ro mi zhes bya ba 'am/ oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA gi ni dzA la sham+bar swAhA/ zhes bya bas phyag bya'o/ /de
43a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag
43a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i mchog chos la byung ba'i/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzad po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems
43a5(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi sems chen po/ /de bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba'i bstod pas bla ma la lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /gang phyir gsol
43a6(rgyud 'grel): btab bla ma yis/ /yid kyis 'di ltar rim par bya/ /dpal sdom 'khor lor gsungs pa yi/ /chog yi ni skye bo kun/ /bdag gis 'bad pas drang bya ba/ /bde ba mchog kyang thob 'gyur bya/ /'dis ni bla med yang dag rdzogs/ /byang chub
43a7(rgyud 'grel): nges par ster bar 'gyur zhes sems bskyed de/ slob ma la 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor byad pa ni/ /de rnams nyan mongs 'dam gyis gos/ /rgal bar mi nus pa yi sems/ /shin tu sdug bsngal tshogs rnams la/ /
43b1(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos la sogs bsgral ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i sras/ /dpa' rnams bde chen thob pa yis/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis dri ma spangs/ /bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rab tu 'jug par khyod spro 'am/ /zhes lan gsum du'?//
43b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba drang ba'i bsam pas tshigs su bcad pa gong ma'i rjes su bdag spro'o zhes lan gsum du slob mas brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bla mas khyed kyis nye bar 'kho ba thams cad tshogs sam zhes lan gsum du dri bar bya'o/ /de nas slob mas cung
43b3(rgyud 'grel): zad mtshogs zhes gsol bar bya'o/ /de rnams ni gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas gsol ba gdab pa'i bla mas yid legs par mnyam par bzhag pas 'og nas 'chad pa'i dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga legs par
43b4(rgyud 'grel): khong du chung par byas te slob ma legs par mnyam par gzhag pa la dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnal 'byor sngon du song ba'i bla mas de'i spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying gar rim pa bzhin he ru ka'i ye ge bsams te/ he ni rgyu sogs stong pa
43b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /ru ni tshogs dang bral ba ste/ /ka ni gang du 'ang mi gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don dran pas slob ma rang bzhin med par byas la/ chog gsum gyis dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor bskyed la/ /rang gi snying gnas phyung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma la
43b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhis dbang bskur bar byas te bdud rtsis khrus bya'o/ /de la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'di nyid kyi tshul gyis chog bya'o zer pa'ang 'dug pas brtags la blang dor bya'o/ /go cha bya'o/ /de dag ni slob
43b7(rgyud 'grel): ma yongs su bzung pa'o/ /de nas bsnyen pa brtsam bya ste/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yi sngags dang rnal 'byor rigs/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta ba/ /rab tu bstan par su yis nus/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/
44a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dag ni brtags na 'grub/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /mngon par rtogs pa bshad pa yi/ /rim pa legs par bsgom ldan pas/ /bdag po'i rim pa 'bum phrag gcig/ yum gyi de phyed
44a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi khri/ /gsang sngags rgyal po ma nyams bzla/ /de dag ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar rung ba yi/ /'dir ni phyogs kyis bshad de/ /lha gang dag ni skyed tshal grang/ /grong khyer dang ni tshong dus kyi/ /shar gyi phyogS
44a3(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid byang phyogs la sogs pa'i/ /phyogs bdun dag ni spang bar bya/ /shar phyogs dkyil 'khor bris gyur na/ /bzod ldan pa yang bzod med 'gyur/ /lho phyogs char ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /skye bo 'chi dang
44a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i/ /nye bar 'tshe ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /slob ma de ni 'chi 'gyur te/ /lung rigs ngag 'di gzhan du min/ /nub kyi phyogs su slob dpon 'chi/ /byang gi phyogs su zhugs pa 'chi/ /de bzhin me yi phyogs cha ru/ /char chen
44a5(rgyud 'grel): ? ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /lho dang nub kyi mtshams la ni/ /mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nub kyi phyogs su bris pa yis/ /de yis rlung dang char pa 'byung/ /mchod rten gdan duAng 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig klu yis byin brlabs chu/ /
44a6(rgyud 'grel): shin grib rtsa ba 'phrigs de bzhin/ /de phyir dbang ldan bla na med/ /de yi gnas kyi sa yi ni/ /kha dog rim par shes par bya/ /bra ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang/ /dmangs rigs dang ni rnam bzhi'o/ /bram ze dkar por shes byas te//
44a7(rgyud 'grel): ser po rgyal po'i rigs su 'dod/ /rje rigs dmar por shes par bya/ /nag po dmang rigs su rab grags/ /dkar pos yi phyogs su ni/ /de la gdan ni spyi blugs dang/ /dbyug pa bgrang phreng rtag tu ni/ /rig pa dang ni blo 'grub 'gyur/ /
44b1(rgyud 'grel): tshad dang ldan zhing snum pa dang/ /mtho dang dma' ba' i skyon spang ba'i/ /shar dang byang du gzhol nyams dga' / /sa yi cha yis sbyang bya/ /thod pa rtsa ba rus pa skra?/ /phub ma rdo ba gseg ma dang/ /thal ba sol ba srin bu ni/ /khru do tsam du brkos la yang/ /srog
44b2(rgyud 'grel): chags bcas na rlung chen 'byung/ /rus par bcas la zug rdu 'byung/ /gsog mar bcas na lkugs par 'gyur/ /phub ma sol ba la ni rims/ /skra dang rtsa ba shing sogs bcas/ /gnod pa phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir shes pa 'dod pa yis/ /
44b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas sa yi cha sbyang bya/ /dkyil 'khor khru ni brgyad par 'dod/ /gzhan dag rgyal po la khru brgya/ /mdza' skyes rnams kyi de yi phyed/ /gtso bo rnams kyi de'i phyed gsungs/ /tshong dpon rnams kyi khru bcu gnyis/ /sgrub po rnams kyi khru drug pa/ /dkyil
44b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rim pa 'di gsungs pa/ /ji lta'i lung gi don gsungs pa'i/ /rang gi ji ltar nus pa bri/ /de la re zhig thog ma ru/ /mkhas pas mngon 'dod sa yi char/ /slob dpon rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du song bas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bgegs kyi tshogs
44b5(rgyud 'grel): bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ji tsam byed pa'i sa bus mo nub tsam du brkos te rus pa la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad bsal te/ sa de nyid kyis bkang la 'thas par bcags te/ de'i dbus su zabs dang rgyar mtho gang ba'i khung bu byas te chus
44b6(rgyud 'grel): bkang la rtsa ba'i sngags zlos pas shar phyogs su gom pa brgyar phyin nas log pa na chung ma zad na shis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i dbus su drag po'i thabs byas te rus pa'i phye ma dang dug dang khrag dang ske tshe la sogs pa bcas pas drag po'i sbyin
44b7(rgyud 'grel): bsreg? bya'o/ /de nas yang de nyid du zhi ba'i thab byas te de'i sa'i bdag po'i ched du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor byed pa'i sa'i cha de sa gzhan gyis kyang bstod la bcag par bya'o/ /de nas de'i phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor gyi khang ba gru
45a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi la sogs pas brgyan par byas la/ der yang lugs ma dang thang ka dang po ti dang bla re dang me tog gi phreng ba dang dri zhim po dang bdug spos dang mar me dang me dang shing rnams dang me tog dzA ti dang
45a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam pa dang pu nA ga dang ke sar dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ a'u thi ka dang ma ling ka dang kun da dang pA Ta la dang pad+ma dang utpal dang kar+Ni ka la sogs pa rnams kyiS gcal du bkram pa dang sna tshogs pa'i gos rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /phyi rol
45a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan ba dan rnams/ /chu shing sdong pos rnam par mdzes/ /dung dang zangs dung rol mo dang/ /sna tshogs sil snyan gyis brgyan byas/ /nye bar byug pa sogs phyi nas/ /'di rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya/ /de nas sa la gsol ba 'debs
45a4(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa byas te/ de nas yang rang gi lta'i rnal 'byor sngon du song bas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags sam dum skyes ma'i sngags bzlas pa'i dri zhim po'i chus bsang gtor bya'o/ /de nas tsandan gyis legs par byugs par byas te/ lag
45a5(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pa sa la reg nas yi ge hUM zhes bya ba lan brgyar brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du yi ge brgya pa lan bdun du'o/ /de nas chos ni bcu gsum la/ /bsgom pa'i yid ni brtan gyur cing/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bsgrubs pa yis/ /sngags rig pa ni
45a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes gnang thob/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis nam mkha' la/ /mngon sum bzhin du nges par ro/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byung nas ni/ /phyi nas dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /blo ldan slob ma yon tan ldan/ /de bzhin yo byad yongs su rdzogs/ /sngon du
45a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dus byas sa'i dbus su/ /sa la reg pas nyer gnas pa'i/ /'dod pa'i yan lag can ma bskul/ /kun nas sa la gsol ba gdab/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i 'byor ldan pas/ /lag pa g.yas pas zla dkyil la/ /'od zer bzang pos khrigs
45b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phro bas/ /hUM zhes bya ba gsum dgod bya/ /sor mo'i rtse mos sa de la/ /mkhas pas lan gsum bsnun par byas/ /de'i sgra rnams kyis bskul ba dang/ /hUM 'od rnams kyi de bzhin no/ /bkug pa'i lha mo zhi ba yis/ /kha dog ser po na bza' dkar/ /bum
45b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni mi 'jigs phyag /de ni rgyan thams cad kyis klubs/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa mo/ /mdun du bzhugs pa rnams bsams nas/ /mchod yon sbyin sogs byas nas ni/ /tshigs bcad gnyis po 'di brjod bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas
45b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /spyod tshul khyad par rnams su ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes
45b4(rgyud 'grel): pa lan gsum brjod par bya/ /de nas so so mchod byas nas/ /mngon par dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/ /zhal gyi pad+ma rab bzhad cing/ /sku phyed 'thon nas lha mo ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas nges bltas nas/ /de ltar bgyi zhes brjod nas ni/ /de la thim par
45b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya/ /rdo rje bcing ba brkyang byas nas/ /sa la de yis gdab par bya/ /oM badzri b+ha ba hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /yang/ /oM badzra dri b+hi tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa de ni/ /rung bar gyur ba'i sa yin no// //sa la
45b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas phyi nas slob dpon ni/ /phyag rgya'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ /gtsug tor dang ni gos dkar bgos/ /tsandan sogs pas thig le gsum/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung ba gang/ /slob ma legs par bslabs pa rnams/ /
45b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnam 'byor gyis/ /slob ma rnams kyang dpa' rnam pa/ /khaN+Da ro ha'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog sprul par bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga slar byas nas/ /blo dang ldan pas bgegs bsal bya/ /de la slob dpon rim shes
46a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rkang pa gnyis su a:las ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya/ /ma Ta mig gnyis las bltas nas/ /de la nyi ma zla ba gnyis/ /lag pa g.yas pas nyi ma'i mig /rdo rje 'od zer
46a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phro de bzhin/ /mig 'bras hUM yig bskal pa'i me/ /rdo rje gsor bar byed brtson pas/ /rkang pa'i 'gros kyis 'od zer tshogs/ /rdo rje me yi tsha tsha 'dras/ /gdug pa can rnams 'bros bltas nas/ /g.yon pa'i zla ba dri med la/ /oM las byung ba'i 'od zer
46a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bdud rtsi'i tshogs ldan pa rnams kyis/ /rang gi 'khor tshogs 'thung byed cing/ /tshim par byed pa chen po'o/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i rol bcas pas/ /gtso bo slob ma bcas rnams kyis/ /rdo rje'i rkang
46a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bor zhing bskor/ /gser gyis gzhi'i mthar thug par/ /sa ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin bya/ /lag pa g.yon pas dril dkrol zhing/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gsor ba na/ /hUM zhes bya ba brjod bzhin du/ /rdo rje lta bas kun bltas nas/ /sa der gnas pa'i
46a5(rgyud 'grel): sdang ba rnams/ /mkhas pas rab tu bskrad par bya/ /rgya che ba yi dang 'di ni/ /sngags dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas gsungs/ /dengs shig yod par gyur pa gang su dag /lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang srin bu dang yi dags dang sha za dang/ rjed
46a6(rgyud 'grel): byed dang 'byung po dang gnon po dang rgan po dang rgan mo dang rjes su spyod pa'i 'khor dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang skyes bu sngags grub pa rnams sa'i phyogs 'dir slob mche ge mo zhes bya ba yang dag pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs
46a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i don dang/ sems can gyis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i rgyur dpal he ru ka mkha' 'gro lo bcu gnyis su mngon par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor bdag gis bya'o/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i bka' 'di thos nas
46b1(rgyud 'grel): myur du 'gro bar gyis shig /gang zhig mi 'gro na de la bdag dpal he ru ka rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i hUM zhes brjod pas rab tu khros pa'i zhal can kun nas 'bar bas ye shes chen po'i rdo rjes spyi bo brgyar 'gas par bya'o zhes brjod cing sngags pas g.yas
46b2(rgyud 'grel): su lan gsum bskor bar bya'o/ /bgegs thams cad 'bros par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas gom pa lngas gnas lnga'i mngon bzhin no/ /gzhan yang rgyas pa ni stang stabs drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas shes par bya'o/ /'di ni bgegs bskrad
46b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas phur bus gdab par bya ste/ bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad 'bar ba'i me dang 'dra bar bsgoms te hUM zhes brjod pa dang/ snying gnas he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang thod pa thogs pa dpag tu med
46b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mdun du phyung la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa byas nas/ oM sum+b+ha ni la sogs pa brjod pas bgegs kyi bdag po thams cad bkug ste me lha la sogs pa'i grwa bzhir bzhag nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i phur bu/ nam
46b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i snying po dang/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' i ngo bo bzhi byas te/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te me la sogs pa nas rim pas/ oM g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha(rgyud 'grel): zhes
46b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pas bgegs kyi bdag po'i spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du phur bus gdab bo/ /phur bu de rnams kyi steng du a las nyi ma bsgoms te de'i 'od zer gyis bgegs thams cad thal bar gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas he ru ka
46b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams thugs kar bsdus te/ yang bgegs du byang? ba'i dgos pa la stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol tu rta mgrin byung ste de rnams yongs su gyur pa la mtshon cha sna tshogs rdo rjer bsam par bya'o/ /
47a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje'i lta bas kun tu blta bar bya zhing hUM zhes bya ba lan brgyar brjod par bya'o/ /sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas sa bzung ba ni legs par bslab pa'i rig ma dang/ sa'i dbus su 'dug pa/ mngon par
47a2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa nas 'byung ba bzhin du thig le dang phra mo'i mthar thug par bsgoms te/ de nas phyogs bzhir khaN+Da ro ha'i nga rgyal 'dzin pa bzhis/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba la sogs pas gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas lha'i
47a3(rgyud 'grel): ? rgyal brtan po dang ldan pas sems dga' ba skyed do/ /deng 'dir bdag skyes 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba 'bras bur bcas/ /dam tshig lha rnams thams cad dang/ /bdag ni mnyam gyur the tshom med/ /bdag ni nyi ma deng
47a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog yin/ /deng bdag mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas kyi rjes brtse ba yis/ /bka' lud thob par bdag gis shes/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis snying gnas spros pa'i pi wang ma
47a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dang/ gau rI la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa bya ste/ he ru ka dpal ye shes che/ /rnal 'byor chen po thub chen po/ /mgon po chen po byed pa che/ /theg pa chen po shing rta che
47a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung ba chen po shes rab che/ /dpa' bo chen po don chen mdzad/ /'dzin pa chen po nga rgyal che/ /rgyal po chen po mchod pa che/ /srid pa chen po sim pa che/ /rol pa chen po gnas chen po/ /mtshon cha chen po drag po che/ /bzhad
47a7(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po dka' thub che/ /zhe sdang chen po 'dod chags che/ /gti mug chen po stobs chen po/ /bum pa chen po sgra chen po/ /snyems pa chen po stobs chen po/ /sku gsum lam gsum cha byad can/ /'khor lo gsum dang
47b1(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum mchog /dri ma gsum spangs dge ba gsum/ /spyan gsum sum cu gsum dbang phyug /srid pa gnon pa srid rtsa'i mchog /srid pa ldan pa srid las 'das/ /srid pa dangs med srid snang ba'i/ /srid pa'i steng ma srid gtso bo/ /
47b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sbyong pas rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rnal 'byor brtson/ /sbyor shes rnal 'byor pa yongs 'byung/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mngon 'joms po/ /rdo rje dpal dbang phyug dgyes pa/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /
47b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje kha TwAM phrad pa'i lus/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i phyag chen po/ /rdo rje'i gang ni brtan pa che/ /rdo rje'i glu ni sgra chen po/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i ting 'dzin bzhugs/ /rdo rje gdan ni dga' bar dgyes/ /bde ba'i bzhed pa thob pa ste/ /'od kyi skye bo skyong ba po/ /lus
47b4(rgyud 'grel): dag yid kyis thams cad du/ /khyod la gus pas bdag 'dud do/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba la phyag 'tshal/ /phyag 'tshal mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la/ /stong nyid ye shes phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba
47b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ e ma'o chos e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba/ /chos pa yi don bdag med pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sku gsung thugs ni shin tu dag /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas/ /rnam par 'gyur med snang ba
47b6(rgyud 'grel): med?/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs kyi gtso/ /dus gsum lam la gnas pa ste/ /go skabs chen po dbyings 'gyud ba/ /nam mkha' la ni phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nam mkha' i sku ni yang dag byung/ /nam
47b7(rgyud 'grel): ? gsang ni rab 'jug pa/ /nam mkha' i thugs ni chos kyi mchog /spyong pa'i go 'phang phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che/ /nam mkha' i spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po mchod pa'i mchog /rgyal ba mchog
48a1(rgyud 'grel): gi mchod pa gsungs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /rdo rje theg pa nyer ston pa/ /nam mkha' i khams dang mnyam pa'i mchog /rgyal ba mchog gi mchod pa gsungs/ /thar pa'i lam gyi rab sgrol ba/ /theg gsum
48a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog lam gnas pa po/ /sangs rgyas bskal bzang pa yi bdag /don yod mchod pa mi yi mchog /byang chub sems ni yangs pa'i spyan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /sku gsung thugs ni yongs su dag /rdo rje theg pa phyag
48a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya bas bstod pa bya ste/ rang nyid la bsdu bar bya'o/ /sngar gyi nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dmigs te/ rang gi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la blos bteg la de dang bsre bar bya'o/ /rang nyid gtso bo'i nga rgyal
48a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa byas nas/ langs te sngar bzhin zhabs dang spyan byin gyis brlabs te rig ma dang bcas pa rol pa'i tshul gyis phyogs kun tu blta zhing gser gyis gzhi la thug pa rdo rje'i sa gzhir byin gyis brlab cing hUM zhes brjod pas sngar
48a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bskor bar bya'o/ /yang de'i dbus su bsdad nas mig g.yas pa a las byung ba'i nyi ma la hUM gi mig 'bras bsams te de las me'i tshogs 'khrugs pa chen po byung bas me'i rab ji tsam 'dod pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i nang
48a6(rgyud 'grel): du hUM sngon po 'khrigs pas mig gi hUM las 'od 'phros la de rnams gyur pas zhe sdang rdo rje'i ra ba'o/ /de bzhin du A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po spros pa las 'dod chags pad+ma'i rab bya'o/ /de bzhin du oM dkar po 'phros pa las gti mug 'khor
48a7(rgyud 'grel): lo'i ra ba'o/ /de nas mig g.yas nyi ma g.yon zla ba dang sna'i rtse mor aM bsams te g.yas pa bar snang la blta bas de'i phyi rol tu 'dar ba gsum bya'o/ /mtshon cha'i rang bzhin du steng du gur bya'o/ /de nas de'i steng du khro bo rta
48b1(rgyud 'grel): mgrin bskal ba'i me ltar glog gi mdog can ljags 'dril ba drag po chen po bsams te bgegs lhag ma 'joms par bsgom mo/ /de nas sa'i dbus de nyid du nyal bar bya'o/ /sa gzhi yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas
48b2(rgyud 'grel): tshes ni bcu bzhi la/ /gzung byas rang bzhin dag pa phyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i sa yi char/ /slob ma la sogs lhag gnas bya/ /de la re zhig thog mar ni/ /don legs byed pa'i don rig pa/ /gru bzhir byas pa dag pa la/ /
48b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor las ni nyis 'gyur ring/ /de nas skud pa dkar pos bya/ /rang dang sgrub pa'i grogs dag gis/ /tsan dan dkar po dang bsres pa'i/ /sA lu btab pas spang bar bya/ /thig gnyis kyang ni gdab par bya/ /tshangs pa'i
48b4(rgyud 'grel): thig gi logs gnyis su/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gdab par bya/ /slar yang de yi dbus gdab pas/ /thig rnams drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de rnams dbus su de mnyam pa/ /slar yang de rnams su gdab bya/ /mdor na 'khor lo
48b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po la/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug go /kun nas dum bu bcu drug las/ /tshon rtsi yi ni ri mo bya/ /lhag ma sgo yi tshad du ni/ /dbus ma'i pad+ma la sogs bya/ /'on kyang dbus kyi pad+ma der/ /sor ni bcu gnyis bya ba yi/ /
48b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gsum ni bzhi po la/ /dum bu gsum gsum bya ba yin/ /dum bu re re la ni khru/ /gnyis gnyis mkhas pa rnams kyis bya/ /gzhan yang phra mo gdab pa rnams/ /'di ru brjod kyang mi rtogs pas/ /lag
48b7(rgyud 'grel): tu blang rim las shes bya/ /de nas rgongs ka'i dus su rang nyid mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rnal 'byor sngon du song bas dkyil 'khor la bdud rtsi dang ldan pa'i dri zhim po gtor zhing yi ge gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha thaMs cad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i dri zhim
49a1(rgyud 'grel): pos thig le bya'o/ /de nas rang rang gi sngags brjod cing me tog gi tshom bu dgod par bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i gnas su raM yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hUM sngon po de yongs su gyur pa
49a2(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa lte ba la nyi ma la hUM bsams de las 'khor lo bcu gnyis spros te/ 'gro ba dag pa byas te de nyid kyi rnam par byas pa dang/ gdod ma nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bkug ste zhugs pa yongs su gyur pa
49a3(rgyud 'grel): las lha thams cad dus gcig tu bskyed do/ /go cha yang byas te de nas de nyid kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer dang bdag nyid kyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sbyor bas oM badzra maN+Da la hUM dza:ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya'o/ /oM badzra kA li kI
49a4(rgyud 'grel): la gu hya maN+Dal hUM zhes bya bas gzhug par bya'o/ /oM badzra tsakra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+hya hUM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas lha thams cad kyi sngags ma lus pa brjod la yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba dang rigs kyi bdag pos
49a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab par bya ste/ mchod yon lnga la sogs pa nas phyi'i mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad dang/ lha mo brgyad dang/ bcu drug spros la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas bstod pa ma lus par bya'o/ /chang dang bdud rtsi bcas
49a6(rgyud 'grel): pa pad+ma'i snod bzang po la gnas pa la gtor ma sbyong ba'i chogs sbyangs te lha thams cad kyi sngags brjod cing tshim par bya'o/ /de ni lha lhag par gnas pa'o// //de nas bum pa skyen thams cad dang bral zhing yon tan thams cad
49a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa la slob ma'i rim pas rgyud kyi bye brag kyang shes par byas te lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa 'am ji ltar bsdus pa yang rung ste thams cad dkar por phyugs la gtso bo rnam par rgyal ba la pad+ma dang/ nyi ma la rdo rje dang gri gug go /
49b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan lhag ma rnams la pad+ma dang ro'i steng du gri gug go /bskal pa bzang po pa rnams la pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sa ha de ba dang/ 'bri ha ti dang/ kaN+Da ka ri dang/ daN+Do tpal? dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dkar po ste sman
49b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang gro dang/ 'bras so ba dang/ til dang/ ma sha dang/ nas te 'bru lnga dang/ gser dang dngul dang byi ru dang mu men dang/ mu tig ste rin po che lnga dang/ dri chen dang dri chu dang byang chub kyi sems dang/ khrag dang sha chen po ste bdud rtsi lnga la sogs
49b3(rgyud 'grel): pa de rnams nang du bcug ste dri zhim po'i chus bkang la/ mya ngan med pa dang byang chub shing dang a mra dang n+ya gro d+ha dang u dum pa ra'i yal gas kha brgyan te ras bzang po zung cig gis mgul pa bcings pa/ ku sha'i stegs la rnam par rgyal ba'i
49b4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa ni gtso bo'i mdun du'o/ /lhag ma dkyil 'khor la bskor la bzhag go /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa mi dmigs pa las baM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las rin po che'i bum pa'o/ /de'i nang du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i mdog can yongs su
49b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /de'i lte ba la nyi ma la chog gsum gyis lha thams cad bskyed de/ ye shes sems dpa' bstims la snyoms par zhugs pas chu'i ngo bor gyur pa las dri zhim po dang ldan pa me tog dang bcas pa'i dung steng du
49b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa las chu cung zhig nang du blugs te gtso bo'i snying po stong phrag gcig dang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /lha rnams kyi brgya rtsa brgyad kyang bzlas te de yang rdo rje me tog gi phreng ba btags pa steng du bzhag nas so/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstong pa dang
49b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi myang ba yang bya'o/ /bum pa lhag ma thams cad ming gi yi ge dang po las chog gsum gyis bskyed pa la sogs pa gong bzhin du bya'o/ /las thams cad pas ro langs la gri gug bris te dum skyes ma skyes la de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
50a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngags te/ mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba byas la phyi'i shar sgo'i byang du bzhag ste 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /ji srid dkyil 'khor byas pa yis/ /de srid bya ba ma rdzogs par/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyis ni/ /
50a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi bdug pa bskrad par mdzod ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor gtor ma shin tu rgya chen po btang bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su rgyas pa'i thab tu me lha tshim pa'i rjes su lha rnams rang rang gi sngags
50a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas dkyil 'khor nas me tog gi spyan drangs la tshim par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sngags brjod pas me tog gis dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o/ /lhag ma sbyin sreg gi chog las rgyas par shes par bya'o/ /de ni bum pa lhag par gnas
50a4(rgyud 'grel): par zhar la byung ba dang bcas pa'o/ /slob ma dad cing gus ldan pa/ /bsnyen gnas legs par bzung ba yis/ /yan lag dri yi chus bkrus la/ /maN+Dal byas nas phyag byas te/ /me tog bcas pa'i thal sbyar bas/ /pus mo g.yas pa sar
50a5(rgyud 'grel): btsugs la/ /bla mas 'di skad brjod par bya/ /kha cig gsang sngags grub don gnyer/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par byed/ /bsod nams 'dod pas de las gzhan/ /gzhan dag 'jig rten mchog don gnyer/ /'jig rten mchog don gnyer
50a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /dad pa mang du byed pa yis/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod mi byed/ /tshe 'di 'dod par gyur pa la/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer bskyed/ /'jig rten 'di yi 'bras bu rgyas/ /de nas slob ma gus ldan pas/ /
50a7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la ni 'di skad brjod/ /khyod ni ston pa dpa' chen po/ /rdo rje phag mo bdag sbyor ba/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub po'i tshul ston pa/ /de nyid dam tshig bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas
50b1(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma mi dmigs par byas te chog gsum gyis gtso bo'i gzugs su
50b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab la mdun du bzhag la 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /bu tshur shog cig theg chen gyi/ /chog sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya'o/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
50b3(rgyud 'grel): gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po gang/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa ste/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /chog? bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med
50b4(rgyud 'grel): brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzang pa/ /stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /'jig rten rjes mthun rtogs nas ni/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen
50b5(rgyud 'grel): thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yi blo gros 'di gyis shig /rtog pa dag ni spangs nas su/ /bzang po brtson pa'i yid kyis nyon/ /ma lus brjed med blo gros la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kyi/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs zhes spro ba bskyed
50b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags sogs bya// //slob dpon dgongs su gsol bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku gsum du
50b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bzhugs la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bla na med pa nges par 'byung ba chen po can gyi chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bla na med pa phyir mi ldog pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs la skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /slob
51a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas ji srid thog ma med pa 'khor ba nas 'khor ba na sdig pa can gyi las bgyis pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de
51a2(rgyud 'grel): dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du so sor bshags par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang nor bu dang pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su
51a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ bdag ming che ge mo zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang nor bu dang pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig pa'i lha thams cad kyi mdun du sdig pa thams cad
51a4(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i bshags pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du so sor bshags par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang mnyam par son pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /
51a5(rgyud 'grel): gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de rnams bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab par bgyi'o/ /gang yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de rnams sems can
51a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams de srid du mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab par bgyi'o/ /bdag gi dge pa'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten 'dir ni myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid de/ /sems can sdug
51a7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal mang pos gzir las grol zhes brjod par bya'o// //de nas snying po'i sngags byin brlabs/ /ba yi dri chus yongs brlan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas phyag /snying gar sngags rig pas bzhag nas/ /byin gyis
51b1(rgyud 'grel): brlabs dang de nas phyis/ /sngon bzhin du ni cho ga bya/ /ji ltar nyer spyod lnga rnams kyis/ /de rnams so sor mchod byas na/ /khaN+Da ro has mngon sngags pa'i/ /dri zhim chu yis lus byugs la/ /me tog dkar po rtse mor bcing/ /'o ma dang bcas
51b2(rgyud 'grel): u dum sogs/ /mngar po so yi shing bu ni/ /ji srid song bcu gnyis tshad can/ /de rnams lag tu byin te gnas/ /shar du phyogs pas bskur bar bya/ /dum skyes ma yi mngon bsngags pas/ /chu yis kha bshal byin nas ni/ /so shing
51b3(rgyud 'grel): ltung ba rnams kyis ni/ /dngos grub rgyu rnams shes par bya/ /de nas sngon bshad gnas bzhag nas/ /de rnams lag pa'i lo ma ru/ /yi ge gsum gyis sngon bsngags pa'i/ /yang dag mchod nas ku sha sbyin/ /de nas phyis ni bsngags 'di
51b4(rgyud 'grel): yes/ /dri zhim po la bsngags nas ni/ /'thungs pas sdig pa zhi don du/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu sbyin bya/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin no/ /oM h+rI:pi shud+d+ha d+harmma(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA pa ni tsA sya bi sho d+ha ya bi kalpAn a pa na ya hUM lan gsum du'o/ /de rnams
51b5(rgyud 'grel): slar yang bsrung don du/ /yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa yis/ /skud pa mdud pa gsum byas nas/ /dpung? pa g.yon par bcing bar bya/ /go cha drug ni byas nas su/ /de bzhin slar yang gnas gsum du/ /de rnams bsrung ba mchag? byas
51b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /'di lta'i chos kyang bstan par bya/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum pa ra'i me tog ltar/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon
51b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /gang gis sems can mnyam med don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas byang bar 'gyur yin na/ /grags pa mdza' yas
52a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcas/ /bdag nyid chen po
52a2(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pas/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la//
52a3(rgyud 'grel): san ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams 'dir ni dang bas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /rang 'byung skal pa chen po pa/ 'jig rten kun
52a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'dren pa yi/ /yod dang med pa rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /zab mo? rtog ge thams cad kyis/ /rab tu brtan med rnyog? pa med/ /spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ /spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa/ /
52a5(rgyud 'grel): bya dang las la sogs dang bral/ /bden pa gnyis la brten pa yi/ /ye shes mchog dang gtso 'di yi/ /tshul la gnas par gyur pa yin/ /zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /de nas yang slob ma rnams kyis 'di skad brjod par bya ste//
52a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i dbang/ /byin nas mgon pos bdag la gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyis ni las rnams dang/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig dang/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med/ /
52a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon gyur zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis brjod par bya ba/ 'khor lo bcu gnyis 'khor lo che/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho kun bzhengs pa/ /dpal he
52b1(rgyud 'grel): ru? ka'i drin gyis gsungs/ /zhes bya de nas smra ba ni/ /rmi lam ji ltar rnyed pa yang/ /bdag gi mdun du smra bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni yang brjod nas/ /slob ma nyal sa bzang por btang/ /slob ma yon tan ldan pa de/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sar bzhugs
52b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /bsgom pa sogs dang bzlas byas nas/ /lce la zla ba'i steng gsal ba/ /A(rgyud 'grel): las 'od dpag med pa ni/ /rang gi lha mo rang phyag 'khyud/ /'di dmigs byas nas de'i snying gar/ /A(rgyud 'grel): yi ge mdzes pa dgod/ /sgrub pa po yi sngags
52b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis/ /legs par byin brlabs lce de la/ /oM pad+ma sa rAt+tha ti sarya mA ba d+ha ya h+rI:zhes pa bya'o/ /ga bur a rur bsres pa yi/ /de nas bdug spos blangs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor pa dang sangs rgyas ni/ /de rnams la nyer snyan gsan
52b4(rgyud 'grel): dbab/ /phyogs bcu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /sras bcas 'jig rten la grags dang/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs dang ni/ /pad+ma las kyi rigs de bzhin/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pas/ /gang zhig lha yi tshogs thams cad/ /chos kyi
52b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings la bzhugs pa ni/ /de rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dang/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dpa' mchog gi /ji ltar nus pa'i nyer spyad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o kyi/ /slob ma rnams la brtse don? dang/ /
52b6(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /rjes su brtse bas nyer dgongs la/ /nye ba nyid du mdzad par rigs/ /zhes bya brjod pas legs mchod do/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad ma lus pa/ /sngon bzhin
52b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la bzhag nas/ /dkyil 'khor pa de rnams kyang ni/ /dag pa'i shel dang 'dra ba la/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba rnams/ /dkar po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams/ /khad pa brtsegs par legs dmigs nas/ /zla ba'i zer
53a1(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lha mo rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /zhi ba'i dpal khrag 'thung de bzhin/ /rang snying hUM gi 'od rnams kyis/ /legs bltas yang dag bkug byas nas/ /rang gis lus la gzhug byas te/ /de yi
53a2(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyar gyur nas pa/ /bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dpa' bo sogs kyang sngon bzhin du/ /rang gi lus la gnas byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor sa la nyal bar bya/ /de bzhin du ni yang gsungs pa/ /gtso bo'i slob ma dang bcas pa/ /yon
53a3(rgyud 'grel): tan rgya mtsho'i bye brag shes/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor la bltas nas/ /dkyil 'khor sa dang nye bar nyal zhes so/ /de rnams ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de'i rjes su slob dpon ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni rab bskul nas/ /
53a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyid las sad par gyur nas ni/ /rang la bcug pa'i dkyil 'khor yang/ /phye nas nam mkha' la dmigs te/ /de bzhin glu dang sgra la sogs/ /spos la sogs pas mchod byas nas/ /slob ma bos la rmi lam dris/ /ngan na sbyin sreg la
53a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya/ /de nas ye shes thig gdab ste/ /gzhon nu mas byas skud pa'am/ /de bzhin dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos/ /skra shad sogs med legs dag pa/ /dkar po la sogs kha dog lnga/ /gtso bor byas la yang dag par/ /thig skud lnga
53a6(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgril bar bya/ /sboms su sgo las nyi shur ni/ /gcig gi ma tshang tshang can no/ /de ni mdud par mi 'gyur phyir/ /shing la sogs pa dkri byas te/ /gser la sogs pa'i snod bzhag nas/ /dri dang me tog yang dag brgyan/ /rigs lnga'i sa
53a7(rgyud 'grel): bon yi ge gsum/ /swA hAr? spel la thig skud ni/ /so so rang rang la bsams nas/ /ye shes pa yi tshul gyis ni/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /dpal he ru ka de bzhin dpal/ /rang gi lha mo rnams dang ldan/ /hUM gi yi ge
53b1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha zhig las/ /thig skud la bsams blo ldan pas/ /sku gsung thugs ni gzugs nyid phyir/ /thams cad kyi 'dir cho ga gsum/ /mthun mong du ni mnyam don du/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin bya/ /mig dag la ni dza:yig gis/ /ser po nyi zla
53b2(rgyud 'grel): dag bkod nas/ /oM dIpta driSh+TAM? ku shi dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis/ /spros pa'i 'od zer sprin tshogs dang/ /de nyid slar? yang brjod par bya/ /dpal he ru ka sogs kun de/ /'bar pa'i lta bas bltas pa yis/ /lha la mchod pa
53b3(rgyud 'grel): byed bzhin pas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'di ltar bskul/ /'khor los skud pas rab tu gsol/ /bdag gi rdo rje skud par shog /'bar lha'i lcags kyus drangs rnams kyis/ /dpal he ru ka sogs rjes gnang bas/ /rang snying sgyud? pa rang
53b4(rgyud 'grel): lag gis/ /sgrub pos skud pa kun dag bya/ /oM a n+yo n+yA nu ga tA sarba d+harma:aoM spa ra nu pra paSh+Ti sarbba d+harmma(rgyud 'grel): oM a tyanNA? nu pra biSh+Ta(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod nas ni de la don/ /dngos po bzhin du mngon byas nas/ /g.yog dang bcas pa'i
53b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa pos/ /sngags 'di bzlas shing bsgril bar bya/ /sngags ni oM? h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha huM hUM phaT/ bsgril nas de nas yang dag par/ /de la gser la sogs snod du/ /me tog spos sogs kyi yang dag /sngon bzhin legs par mchod byas nas/ /
53b6(rgyud 'grel): mig gnyis ma Da dag gis ni/ /sngon bzhin nyi zlar bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur ba 'dis pa nyid/ /brtan par byas la sngags bzlas bya/ /sngags ni oM badzra sa ma ya sU trAM mA tikra ma hUM brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /yi ge gsum gyi stod
53b7(rgyud 'grel): phrag gcig /slar yang dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la/ /kun nas nye bar byugs byas nas/ /me tog rnams kyis legs brgyan te/ /mkhar gnas rdo rje mchod yon dbul/ /lha mo rnams kyis legs mchod de/ /gtor ma chen po byin nas ni//
54a1(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de nas yi ge bdun pa'i sngags/ /rang gi yid kyis bzlas par bya/ /rang dpal he ru kar gyur nas/ /lhan cig byed pa bskul bya ba/ /du ma skyes rang bzhin du byas te/ /mngon
54a2(rgyud 'grel): sum yang dag byin brlabs nas/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur bteg bzhag nas/ /skud pa de ni g.yon pas bzung/ /grogs pa'i lag par brkyang byin nas/ /phyogs kun dag ni mnyam par bya/ /oM dza(rgyud 'grel): dza:dza:ni brjod bzhin du/ /de nas grogs pos
54a3(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bya/ /des kyang lag g.yon khu tshur gyis/ /legs pa bzung nas de bzhin brjod/ /rgyab kyis 'gro bas skud drangs te/ /ji lta'i rim pas drang bar bya/ /dang po nub dang lho yi ni/ /lho ru sgrub pa po gnas bya/ /shar dang byang du
54a4(rgyud 'grel): kha phyogs nas/ /lte ba'i phyogs su bzung bar bya/ /sngags pa lan ni gang byed pa/ /de bzhin sgrub pa'i grog mchog gis/ /yang ni g.yon nas bskor nas su/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod bzhin pas/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU trAM ma
54a5(rgyud 'grel): ti kra ma hUM de bzhin shar du kha bltas nas/ /de yi sa la brgyangs nas ni/ /tshangs pa'i thig gnyis yang dag par/ /mnyam par bzhag pas rab brkyang bya/ /sngags pas thig ni 'debs pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams de yi sgras//
54a6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus nam mkha' khyab pa ni/ /de ltar lan cig tu ni bskul/ /'dir ni sems can don dus la/ /bab ces rnam par bsam par bya/ /bskor ba yis ni der 'gro ste/ /slob dpon dang ni grogs po dang/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pas gtso ba'i
54a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /g.yon pa'i cho ga thams cad du'o/ /de ltar na yang bltos pa yis/ /rtogs par dka' bas g.yas bskor bya/ /rlung dang dbang ldan grwar gnas nas/ /me dang bden bral kha bltas nas/ /sngags pas gru yi thig gnyis ni/ /ji
54b1(rgyud 'grel): lta'i rim pa song? ba drang bya/ /de nas me ru gnas pa nyid/ /de byang kha bltas de bzhin du/ /lte ba'i phyogs su bltas nas ni/ /de la dbang po'i phyogs gdab bya/ /de nas rang nyid rlung gis ni/ /phyogs su gnas nas sngon bzhin du/ /sngags pas lho ru
54b2(rgyud 'grel): mngon 'phags pas/ /chu lha'i phyogs ni gdab par bya/ /de nas de nyid gnas pa de/ /shar du mngon phyogs yang dag gnas/ /bskor ba yis ni 'gro byas te/ /mkhas pas lus ngan du gdab bya/ /me yi phyogs su gnas pa ni/ /nub tu mngon
54b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs de bzhin du/ /gshin rje ru ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas gru bzhi par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mkhas pas mchod la bzhag /ye shes thig skud gshegs su gsol/ /de nas sngon po la sogs chen/ /gser la sogs pa'i snod bzhag ste/ bkang
54b4(rgyud 'grel): nas tshogs brtsam par bya/ /tshon lnga'i rang nyid skud pa la/ /hUM las dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po/ /kun tu 'khor lo logs ldan pa/ /bsams nas de nas thim par bsgom/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam bar bya/ /gzhan du oM yig gis sbar
54b5(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs dag gis ni/ /ji srid rdul chen rnams 'bar bya/ /rdul tshon mang po gang gis ni/ /bden pas sems can rjes chags pas/ /bden pa de yis rdul? tshon ni/ /mngon par 'bar bar 'gyur bar shog /rab tu sbyor ba'i
54b6(rgyud 'grel): stobs goms pa'i/ /stobs kyis gang 'bar zhes byar zhog /de nas yi ge gsum gyis kyang/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes bya brgya rtsa brgyad du'o/ /yang dag mchod nas de nas phyis/ /legs mchod bdag
54b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'byor ldan pas/ /bla med shes rab blangs nas ni/ /rang gi dril bu'i sgra rnams kyis/ /mtshan ma ngan sogs gang yin te/ /bsal nas de nas rim pa yis/ /tshon rtsi 'gyed pa'i dus su ni/ /ye shes thig ni nam mkha' la/ /rtsa ba'i
55a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags brjod nas btag ste/ /bri ba zin nas phab la bstim/ /dbus su tshon rtsi thig le dkar/ /dkar po'i cig shos shar 'dab tu/ /ljang gu g.yon pa'i 'dab ma la/ /de bzhin dmar po rgyab 'dab la'o/ /
55a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi 'dab mar ser po dgod/ /de ltar thig le lnga po'o/ /lag pa g.yon pas reg nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM badzra raM ga sa ma ya oM A:hUM/ khu tshur g.yon pas dbang ldan nas/ /ri mo rab tu dbab par bya//
55a3(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas ji ltar bde ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor na gnas slob rnams kyis/ /dkar po dmar po ljang gu dang/ /ser po nag po de bzhin mchog /phyi la sogs pa'i tshon rtsi rnams/ /ra ba rnams su rab tu grags/ /ji ltar phye ba'i de'i tshad
55a4(rgyud 'grel): las/ /sbom min phra ba min de bzhin/ /'khyog min yongs su 'khor bar ni/ /mkhas pas ri mo dbab par bya/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ /sbom po yis ni nang du 'gyur/ /phra ba yis ni nor 'dzad byed/ /yon pos sdang bar rab tu
55a5(rgyud 'grel): grags/ /chang pa yis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang gsungs pa/ /sbom po yi ni pho ba'i nad/ /phra ba yis ni zad par 'gro/ /de la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams su/ /bla ma slob ma dag la 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor khru ni drug pa la/ /sboms su
55a6(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chud? tshad du 'dod/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi thun mong du/ /sgo yi nyi shu cha nyid do/ /tshon 'byed pa yi dbye ba rnams/ /mngon rtogs rim pa las shes bya/ /'on kyang dbus kyi mtshan ma ni/ /rdo rje dang ni gri gug go /thod pa rnams
55a7(rgyud 'grel): la thod pa ste/ /lhag ma rnams la gri gug go /chos 'chad phyag rgya bskal bzang po'o/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su ni/ /rlung la sogs pa byung ba ni/ /de phyir don dam pa can gyi/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /yang na ral gri'i
55b1(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo'i char/ /bse shing 'bras bu las byung ba'i/ /snying po'i sa bon phaT bris nas/ /sngags rig pa yi phyi rol du/ /stobs po che yi 'gyeng pas sam/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i 'byor ldan pas/ /ral gri de yis sbrin la sogs/ /rlung la mngon par
55b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs pas ni/ /phaT ces bya ba brjod bzhin du/ /lan cig khro bo'i lus kyi ni/ /mtshon cha'i tshul du mngon par bya/ /sangs rgyas yin yang nyams par byed/ /'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba na/ /gtor ma byin la bcag par bya/ /de nas tshon gyi phye ma ni/ /
55b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas min pa du ltung ba rnams/ /ras la sogs pas phyis nas ni/ /yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa yis/ /dri zhim chu yis dbang ldan nas/ /brtsams la phyin nas bsang gtor bya/ /de nas tshon gyi lhag ma rnams/ /ye shes pa gshegs gzhan
55b4(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag /de nas dkyil 'khor kun 'khor bar/ /bdug spos rnam pa mang po dang/ /mar me'i phreng dang mchod pa gzhan/ /sna tshogs me tog phreng ba rnams/ /bla re'i steng nas sbyang bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /lag g.yon
55b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag reg byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis/ /lan bdun du ni bzlas par bya/ /nyi ma dgongs ka de nyid la/ /rang nyid lha bsgom sngon song bas/ /gar shes bud med rnam ldan pa'i/ /glu dang sgra la sogs kun gyis/ /
55b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing du rnam gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun dang 'khor thams cad/ /nam mkha' phyogs su bzhugs rnams dang/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams legs mchod de/ /'di ltar bskul zhing spyan drangs bya/ /phyogs ma lus kun rnams bzhugs
55b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs gsol/ /rdo rje bdag che ge mo/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gi brtag par bya/ /de phyir sangs rgyas kun gshegs la/ /deng bdag dngos grub rab tu gsol/ /de ltar brjod nas phyag byas te/ /thugs ka'i ye shes
56a1(rgyud 'grel): rdor hUM las/ /lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od tshogs kyis/ /bcom ldan dpa' bo'i gtso bo ni/ /sprul pa gzugs kyis bzhugs pa la/ /kha sbyar gyur pa yang dag gnas/ /de phyir yang dag bskul bkug la/ /hUM gi
56a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge la bzhugs bya/ /nam mkhar gnas rnams dang lhan cig /dkyil 'khor pa kun rnams bsams nas/ /ji lta'i gnas su gcig byas pa/ /hUM gis byas par lan cig bsgom/ /ri mo la sogs rnams bkod la/ /de ltar
56a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi dkyil 'khor gzhug /dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa ni/ /mngon rtogs las ni shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bkod nas su/ /sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ yang na yi ge gsum dran
56a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ gal te rdul tshon ma nus na/ /dkyil 'khor dang mnyam ras la ni/ /sngar nas tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /gal te de yang ma nus na/ /de dang de gnas sngags bsgom bya/ /nges par he ru ka mgon po /phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa bri/ /cung
56a5(rgyud 'grel): zhig dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs par/ /de yi dus na yongs rdzogs 'gyur/ /lha yi 'khor lo rnam bkod nas/ /'di ltar spos la sogs pas kyang/ /dkyil 'khor pa kun so sor ni/ /mngon du byas nas yang dag mchod/ /gtso bo'i
56a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dmigs byas nas/ /khro bo hUM zhes brjod pa yis/ /me tog phreng ba legs bzung nas/ /hUM zhes yang dag brjod bzhin du/ /sngags pas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /blta zhing dril
56a7(rgyud 'grel): bu bskyong byas nas/ /lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya/ /bskur ba'i me tog phreng blangs nas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis slar la yang/ /rang gi mgol bcing bar bya/ /khro bo'i lta stangs yongs ldan pas/ /nub la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /
56b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas yi ge gsum brjod bya/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ni/ /mos pas yid kyis dbye bar bya/ /sgo 'byed pa'i sngags ni/ /oM badzro da g+ha Da ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas bdud rtsi lnga ldan pa/ /dri yi chu dang yang dag ldan//
56b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka'i mdun du ni/ /dung por bzhag nas de nas yang/ /sngags pas rig ma dang bcas pa/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas/ /de nas rjes gnang blangs nas ni/ /rang nyid byin gyis yang dag brlabs/ /rang gi ming ni brjod
56b3(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /yang ni spyi bos phyag bya'o/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga 'dis/ /ji bzhin lha rnams yang dag bskul/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mngon du mdzad pa rnams/ /rang nyid byung ba mdza' yas srid pa'i rang bzhin rnams/ /ma lus
56b4(rgyud 'grel): pas btung snod kyi snying po rnams/ /sa kun ma lus snying po gcig rnams 'dir sbyon cig /de ltar sngags bdag nyid kyis bskul/ /blo dang ldan pas yang dag dgug /hUM bzhi pa yi gsar sngags kyis/ /dpa' bo kun gyi sngags kyis kyang
56b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ oM grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ oM grih+Na pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ oM A na ya ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga wan badzra rA dza hUM phaT/ sngags pa gsang sngags zlos bzhin pas/ /rang nyid hUM las des 'thon pa'i/ /'od zer rnams kyis bkug pa
56b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /nam mkha' i phyogs nas byon pa ni/ /de rnams rab tu bzhad zhal rnams/ /rang gi dngos grub grub byin nas/ /sems can kun la bde rab gsol/ /'khor lo'i mngon phyogs byon nas ni/ /steng du yang dag bzhugs bsam bya/ /
56b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu legs blangs nas/ /de nas sngon gsungs bstong pa'o/ /bcom ldan brtan par byon pa ni/ /bshes gnyen gyis ni nye bar gnas/ /bsgom pa'i de nas thams cad ni/ /rang rang gzugs la rab gzhug bya/ /phyag rgya bzhis
57a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon rgyas gdab par/ /lha yi 'khor lo la bya'o/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing/ /rang rang mdog dang phyag mtshon cha/ /sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs kyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen por rab tu grags/ /de yi dbang
57a2(rgyud 'grel): ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /bsgom don de yi bdag nyid can/ /ma mo'i gzugs ni bzung ba yis/ /shes rab dam tshig tu ni dran/ /byang chub sa bon rdzogs pa gang/ /zhing dang byed rgyu'i bdag nyid can/ /de nyid mdza' i legs dag pa/
57a3(rgyud 'grel): chos? kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do/ /sems can phung po ma lus pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed ma/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i brtse ba yis/ /las kyi phyag rgya zhes grags so/ /'on kyang lha mo rnams de bzhin/ /dga' rol dam tshig tu ni dran/
57a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gis 'bod rtsol skad cig rgya/ /las kyi phyag rgyar de bzhin 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bzhes mngon rgyas btab nas/ /rim pas rgyas btab de bzhin du/ /rang gi lha mos dpa' dbang la/ /dpa' bo rnams la gtso bo yis/ /dbang bskur
57a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par sbyin par bya/ /bsam gtan legs mnyam gzhag rnams kyis/ /sems can don byed la brtson pas/ /spros nas de nyid la gzhug bya/ /phan tshun shin tu dbyer med pa'i/ /gzugs ni thams cad du dmigs nas//
57a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gsang sngags ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor grub par ni/ /'gyur ba la ni the tshom med/ /gtso bo'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yi/ /rnam rgyal bum pa de nas ni/ /de nyid kyi ni
57a7(rgyud 'grel): mdun bzhag nas/ /lhag ma sngags kyis bsngags pa rnams/ /de rnams khyer nas 'khor lo yis/ /mkhas pas tshon gyi phyi rol tu/ /grwa bzhir ji ltar 'dod pa yis/ /mtshan ma ldan de rnams dgong bya/ /de nas mchod yon
57b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs byin nas/ /g.yas pa'i pus mos gnas nas ni/ /spos la sogs pa legs? mchod nas/ /slar yang yig gsum byin brlabs pa'i/ /lus kun byed pa'i bum pa yis/ /snod gcig tu ni bsang gtor bya/ /dam tshig btung ba la
57b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang/ /bldag dang bzhib pa zas rnams kyis/ /de nas yi ge gsum gyis ni/ /mngon par bsngags te 'di yis kyang/ /oM sarba bid sU ra sU ra A barta ya ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas kyang ngo/ /dpa' bo rnams la so sor ni/ /bum pa la ni
57b3(rgyud 'grel): gos zung dbul/ /rnam par bkra ba'i gos zung ni/ /bzang po gtso bo la dbul bya/ /de nas ji ltar nus pa de/ /lnga las nyung ba mi bya'o/ /sngags pas lha rnams so so la/ /nyer spyod lnga rnams kyis mchod bya/ /de'i sngags ni 'di rnams so/ /
57b4(rgyud 'grel): oM puShpaM pratIts+tsha swAhA/ oM d+hu paM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ oM dI paM pratIts+tsha swAhA/ oM gand+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ oM b+hak+taM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ lha dang dbyer med pa gzugs kyis/ /pi wang ma sogs tshul gyis ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod bzhin du/ /blo dang
57b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas sngon bzhin mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ha syA ra ti kri DA sa khya a nut+ta ra pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /gal te 'byor na mchod rnams kyis/ /glu dang rol mo gang sogs bcas//
57b6(rgyud 'grel): rgod dang sgeg dga' spro rnams kyis/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i bye brag gam/ /mchod pa'i rigs kyi tshogs rnams kyis/ /lus kun dri yis byugs rnams kyi/ /brtul zhugs can gyis yang dag mchod/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ni/ /
57b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni mchog gi mchod pa ste/ /yid kyi dga' bas 'gugs par byed/ /de phyir kun brtags rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang nyid kyang ni mchod par bya zhes so/ /'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags 'di ni/ /lan gsum du ni mchod de gnas/ mchod
58a1(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom/ /sngags ni/ oM a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mudb+ha we spha ra hi maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT swAhA de nas dman dang chad pa yi/ /skyon ni gsal bar
58a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ste/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan bstong? byas nas/ /ji ltar de bzhin mkhyen par gsol/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi byin brlabs dang/ /dam tshig kyang ni dran pa yis/ /snying rje yis ni sems can don/ /dngos grub thams cad
58a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol zhes so/ /de yi sgo las phyir 'thon nas/ /bcom ldan lhan cig 'ongs pa yi/ /phyogs bdag dbang po sogs kun la/ /ngag gis nye bar snyan gsan gdab/ /de la dag ni 'di yin te/ /gang du bcom ldan
58a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das lhan cig 'ongs pa'i phyogs kyi bdag po rnams/ /gang yang rjes su 'breng bcas 'dir/ /gnas pa thams cad rnams/ /bdag ni rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar rig par gyur 'di/ /dri dang me tog sogs gtor ma/ /
58a5(rgyud 'grel): so sor bzhes te sems can la/ /byams pa'i sems dang slob ma la/ /bgegs med par ni mdzad du gsol/ /zhes so/ /de nas der gnas la 'di ltar/ /chu khyor? gsum gyis mchod yon sbyin/ /nye bar spyad pa lnga blangs la/ /
58a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan gtor ma/ /yig gsum mngon par bzlas pa yi/ /de nyid brjod pas sbyin par bya/ /mchod pa sbyin par byas nas ni/ /phyogs kyi gtor ma byin de nas/ /de nas dri zhim yan lag bkrus/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
58a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan nas/ /dang po lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir/ /zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de la 'di yi cho ga 'di/ /ji ltar dam shes btsun mo blang/ /rang gi lha mo'i dbyings su bsam/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du/ /gnas na dbang ldan snyoms 'jug nyid/
58b1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar ye shes kyi ni lha/ /gnyis ka la yang legs bsams nas/ /thab khung ha las skyes de bzhin/ /me 'bar lta bu'i dbus su ni/ /lce ni hUM las skye de bzhin/ /rnam par bsams nas mar bsres pa 'am/ /mar khu chen pos
58b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa ste/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs ldan pa/ /blo ldan ston mo'i sbyin sreg bza' / /phan tshun 'khor lo'i thab khung 'dir/ /bde bas ma tshim bar du bsreg /gang gis 'di ltar mi bzod pa/ /de tshe phyi rol sbyin sreg 'dong/ /zhi ba'i sbyin
58b3(rgyud 'grel): sreg chog yis/ /byas nas de ni legs par bsdu/ /'on kyang gsang ba'i cho ga yis/ /mthun pas nye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin lha rnams phyi rol gyis/ /sbyin sreg gis ni 'gro ba yin/ /de nas phyi dang gsang rnams kyi/ /mchod pa
58b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /de nas rang sems brtan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor ba rnams so so ru/ /bdag la mngon sum du byas nas/ /slob ma rnams la rjes brtse'i phyir/ /thams cad mnyes nas gzigs par bsam/ /de
58b5(rgyud 'grel): yi rjes su slob dpon ni/ /rang gi rig ma dang bcas rang/ /mdor bsdus pa yi legs blangs te/ /thog mar gsum la skyabs 'gro sogs/ /byang chub sems ni legs bskyed nas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug bya/ /de yi
58b6(rgyud 'grel): rim ji lta 'di shes bya/ /blo ldan gsung ba'i tshogs so/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis
58b7(rgyud 'grel): gzung/ /oM sarba yo ga kA ya bak+tsi t+ta? mutpA da yA mi sha ShA na A ba she Sha satwa d+hA tu hi ta su khot+ta ma sid+d+hi ma he shwa ra yA ra tsa/ me tog phreng ba legs blangs te/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar
59a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya ste/ /sngags 'di brjod bzhin pa yis so/ /A(rgyud 'grel): khaM bI ra hUM dam/ oM sh+rI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la shamda ra zhes bya bas so/ /gtso bo slob dpon dag gis
59a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug gzugs bzang nas/ /de phyir 'jug pa'i dus su ni/ /de tshe slob mas 'di ltar brjod/ /oM pra pi sh+ya b+ha ga wan mahA mok+Sha su ra ba ra ma sarba sid+d+hi su khaM ra mya ba ra mu khot+ta ma sid+d+hi dza:hUM baM ho:pra sid+d+hyi dya/ gnyis zhugs
59a3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni phyag byas cing/ /de yis rol cing dga' bas bskor/ /de ltar phyag byas de nas phyis/ /bskor ba gsum ni bya ba yin/ /slar yang de nas mdun 'dug nas/ /'di yang sngags pas brjod par bya/ /rgyud gzhan las ni rab grags gang/ /de
59a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid bdag de lhan cig brjod de/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /rdo rje chen po nor chen po// //ye shes chen po las chen po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu 'thungs nas/ /de
59a5(rgyud 'grel): nas snying ga zla dkyil la/ /A:yig dmar po bsam byas nas/ /de rjes byed pa'i 'od rnams kyis/ /yan lag nyid lag kun bkang ste/ /brtul zhugs can gyis de brjod bzhin/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug rjes zhugs nas/ /dpa' bos yang dag
59a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje phag mo de bzhin du/ /btsun mo yang dag byin brlabs par/ /bsams nas tiSh+Tha badzra zhes/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya/ /de nas phyi nas phreng ba de/ /lag gnyis thal sbyar la gnas pas/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor du
59a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur bya/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM pa ra ma su khA sha yA la la ti bi lA sa na mi ter+Na mA mi b+ha ga wan A:khaM pI ra hUM pra tIts+tsha ku su many+dza li nA tha ho/ /phreng ba bcing ba sogs byas nas/ /he ru ka dpal phyag byas te/ /shes rab ye
59b1(rgyud 'grel): shes dbang sogs dang/ /lung bstan pa yang thams cad du/ /rdo rje'i brtul zhugs mthar thug pa/ /mdor bsdus pa yi thams cad blang/ /'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim nyid kyis/ /rig dang lhan cig byas nas ni/ /byed 'gyur rjes su gnang byas
59b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ rang gi 'dod pas bsgoms de nas/ /rdo rje'i gar dang nyer spyod sogs/ /mchod pas yang dag mchod byas nas/ /dam tshig gsum gyi glu rnams gang/ /snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis de bzhin/ /yang dag mchod byas de nas phyis/ /de la glu
59b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bla med pa'o/ /nam mkha' las ni skyes pa'i phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /dam tshig sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de dag grub/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi
59b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub 'gyur/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa ni/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid grub bar mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin
59b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems la bdag 'grub shog /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya ldan/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyoms bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas slob ma 'jug don
59b6(rgyud 'grel): du/ mkhas pas 'di ltar mkhyen par gsol/ /bdag ming che ge zhes bya yis/ /he ru ka dpal slob dpon che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyis/ /gsungs pa'i cho ga dag gis ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i cho ga yis/ /sems can don ni
59b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bgyis/ /de la rjes gnang stsol mdzod la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas de rnams kyis rjes gnang/ /bdag gi rjes su bsam par bya/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis/ /
60a1(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod par bya/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi yab kyang nyid/ /dam tshig mchog rnams kyis sku mchog /byung dang 'byung bar
60a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams khyed kyis bsgrubs/ /bden pa 'di yis bdag mgon po/ /'dod pa khyed kyis rdzogs par mdzod/ /bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs phyi nas/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di mchod bya/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi byin
60a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs dang/ /dam tshig kyang ni dran pa yis/ /rtse bas sems can kun gyi don/ /dngos grub kun phyir mdzur du gsol/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur 'os/ /de bzhin rang gi rig dang bcas/ /sngar bshad pa yi sngags nyid kyi/ /dpal ldan
60a4(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka gzugs kyis/ /yig gsum yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang/ /rnam par bkra ba'i gos ni gyon/ /de phyir gtsug tor bgos pa can/ /gdong g.yogs ni tra sogs byin nas/ /legs par yon ni phyin pa yis//
60a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rig ma bcas byas nas/ /de yis phyag ni bya ba yin/ /thog mar re zhig shar sgo ru/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas su/ /de nas rab tu brkyang byas nas/ /gus pas 'di dag brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+thA nA yA ta ma naM nIryA? ta yA mi
60a6(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga tAk+Sho b+hyA d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM zhes bya ba'o/ /brjod nas lus ni thams cad kyis/ /de nas rab tu mdud bya'o/ /bcom ldan snying gar rab zhugs par/ /yid kyis yongs su brtag par bya/ /de bzhin du ni lho yi sgor/ /de lta'i thal sbyor snying gar
60a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ byas nas de bzhin gsang ba'i dbang/ /rin chen 'di yis brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA pU dzA b+hi She kA yAtna? naM niryA ha yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta ratna saM b+ha wA b+hI Shiny+dzA d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM zhes bya'o/ /'di ltar brjod cing dpral ba yis/ /blo dang ldan pas
60b1(rgyud 'grel): phyab bya'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan rdo rje yis/ /de la dbang bskur rab brtag bya/ /de nas nub kyi sgo ru ni/ /de bzhin thal sbyar spyi bo ru/ /byas nas 'di skad brjod bya ste/ /mchod pa'i chos ni rab bskor ba'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bar tan yA tA naM nIryA
60b2(rgyud 'grel): ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta a mi tA b+ha pra bar ta ya mAM zhes so/ /'di skad brjod bzhin kha nyid kyis/ /de nas rab tu 'dud bya'o/ /'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /de yi mthu stobs gyur brtag bya/ /de bzhin byang gi sgor 'dug nas/ /snying gar thal mo sbyar
60b3(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /dngos grub kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i/ /gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma ka ra Ne A dma naM nIryA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha sid+d+hi ku ru mAM zhes bya'o/ /'di skad brjod cing mgo bo yis/ /blo dang ldan pa'i
60b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag bya'o/ /don yod grub pa gsang ba yi/ /mchod pa'i thugs legs ldan bsam bya/ /bskyed med dngos phyir mi bskyod pa/ /bcom ldan dpa' bo 'dren pa po/ /rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas phyir/ /de nyid rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /de nas chos ni
60b5(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas pa/ /de bzhin 'od dpag med de brjod/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i phyir/ don yod grub pa zhes byar grags/ /de thams cad kyang rig byas pas/ /'on kyang 'di ltar mdor bsdus pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs mchog rnams
60b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /byin gyis brlab par bsam byas nas/ /me tog bcas lag gis bla mar/ /de yis yang ni phyag byas te/ /shar sgor mngon phyogs pas gnas nas/ /'di skad gus pas brjod par bya/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /sdom pa yang ni bdag
60b7(rgyud 'grel): la gsol/ /rdo rje'i rigs kun bsdus pa la/ /slob dpon chen po bdag gzhug mdzod/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i/ /bskal pa chen po bdag la stsol/ /dus gsum bzhugs rnams sangs rgyas kyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub go 'phang 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan nyid dang ni dpe byad dang/ /nam mkha' i 'od sogs yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /mgon po chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung
61a2(rgyud 'grel): che/ sems can kun gyi don brtson pas/ /rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon 'gyur/ /de yi sgo la mngon phyogs pas/ /de bzhin slob dpon gyis gnas te/ /gang zhig rig kun mkhyen pa gsol/ /de la rim pa 'di yin te/ /bdag gi mang 'di zhes bya
61a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni yongs bzung dang/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug cing/ /dam tshig sdom pa nod par 'tshal/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dpa' bo la/ /gus pa yis ni gsol btab pa/ /de ltar slob ma la brjod de/ /de nas
61a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang slob ma la/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dge ba/ /gsang chen yongs su bzung ba ru/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /bdag ni 'dod? par bya'o zhes/ /de ltar byas nas de nas phyis/ /rigs lnga'i dam tshig brjod par bya//
61a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /rin chen gsum gyi dam tshig bsten/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rigs dag la/ /sdom pa brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /blo gros chen po khyed kyis bzung/ /byang chub sems gang
61a6(rgyud 'grel): de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di rdo rje yi rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /nyin dang
61a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zad zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi brtag sbyin byas/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /khyod kyis dam pa'i chos bzung bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa mchog
61b1(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /rang gi de nyid so sor bzung/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus gyis/ /gzhan yang bcu bzhir bshang 'di rnams/ /phas pham pa zhes bya bar grags/ /rtsa ba'i ltud
61b2(rgyud 'grel): bar shes bya ste/ /nyin lan gsum dang mtshan lan gsum/ /nyi ma re re'i 'don par gyis/ /rdo rje'i spun rnams bshes nyid pas/ /rnal 'byor rnams la bsnyen bkur bya/ /spang zhing ngor bar mi bya ste/ /ji ltar nus pas yang dag spyad//
61b3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /'khor ba yongs su mi spang zhing/ /rtag tu myang 'das la mi dga' / /gsang ba gsum gyi lha rnams la/ /brnyas pa nyid du mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /srog chags
61b4(rgyud 'grel): bsad par mi bya zhing/ /ma byin mi blang nyid du bya/ /'dod log spyad par mi bya zhing/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra mi bya/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang/ /sems can don la rgyab mi phyogs/ /legs pa yis ni nye bar gnas/ /rnal 'byor
61b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum la bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /ngag gi las ni rnam bzhi dang/ /yid gyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ji ltar nus pa rjes su skyongs/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /khyod kyis da lta nyid nas
61b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs/ /des kyang 'di skad ces bya ste/ /slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gsol/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar du ni bdag gis gyis/ /de nyid 'di yi phyi nas ni/ /'di nyid rim pas sdom pa sbyin/ /gang la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtan
61b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams mdza' yas mu med pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ /de'i sras bdag la dgongs su gsol//
62a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di/ /dus 'di nas ni rab bzung ste/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med
62a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por bzung
62a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te bzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spang ngo/ /rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /yang dag
62a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid du gzung bgyi zhing/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung pa'i/ /pad+ma'i
62a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bgyi zhing/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus
62a6(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gi bskyed bgyi zhing/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol/ /ma bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral/ /dbugs ma
