84b6(rgyud 'grel): cad thog ma med pa nas/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i stong pa nyid du yud tsam gyis mngon par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa nyid kyi dang las/ skad cig bcom ldan 'das thugs ka'i chu skyes dang nyi ma la bzhugs
84b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i hUM gis de nyid kha dog sngon po/ rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba can dang ldan pa rten pa'i tshul du rnam pa thams cad rdzogs par blta bar bya ste/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rabs
85a1(rgyud 'grel): zur bzhi pa'i steng du/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang ze 'brur ldan ba'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ba'i bcom ldan 'das rje btsun dpal he ru ka sku mdog zar ma'i me tog sarpa lta bu zhal cig pa/
85a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa/ shes rab la mkhyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ g.yas brkyang pa/ 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan mnan pa/ mche ba gtsigs shing zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ ral ba'i cod pan dang
85a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi gtsug nor bus brgyan pa/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin pa/ mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ sum khugs su 'khyog cing/ dgyes ba'i cha byang can gyi dar dbyangs dang cod pan gyis mdzes par byas pa/ thod pa'i
85a4(rgyud 'grel): breng ba can sgeg pa la sogs pa gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'i mchog/ mi mgo rlon pa'i ngo shal gyis sku la brgyan pa/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba can/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i
85a5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ sku mdog dmar mo gzhon zhing mdzes ma lang tsho dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig ma/ spyan gsum ma/ phyag g.yas ba rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis gdug pa can thams cad la
85a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdigs pa/ phyag g.yon pa yab la mkhyud pas bdud la sogs pa'i khrag gi bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ dpral ba'i mtshams su thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ dbu skra nag po'i tshogs grol ba/ nam mkha' i na bza' bsnams pa phyag rgya
85a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang ldan ma/ mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can/ g.yas kyis byin pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yon brkyang ma/ bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can/ de lta bu dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i dga' bas brgyan pa'i bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i
85b1(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de dag ni bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o/ /d ela skyo bar gyur na/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha huM hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /de ni dbang po tha ma'i
85b2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs par bya'o/ /da ni dbang po 'bring gi ting nge 'dzin 'od gsal du 'jug pa dang ldan pa brjod par bya ste/ de yang rang gi thugs ka na gnas pa'i hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can de'i snang bas/ brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i
85b3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin can gyis khams mdza' dag 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas pa la rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas me long la dbugs bzhin du/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin na da'i bar bsrungs shing thim nas/ de yang rim gyis phra par gyur te/ rdo rje sems dpa' i
85b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin/ chos sku 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo/ /dbyer med par bzhugs pa la blta bar bya'o/ /slar yang gdul bya'i bsod nams dang/ rang gi smon lam gyi shugs kyis/ zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ de las
85b5(rgyud 'grel): sprul ba dpag tu med pa 'phros nas/ sems can gyi khams mdza' dag gi don byed par bya'o/ /ril por 'dzin pa ni rnam grangs gzhan no/ /gzhan yang dbang po rab mchog tu gyur pas/ zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /stong pa'i ngo bo
85b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba che/ /ji ltar snang bzhin bden spangs pa/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /bzung dang 'dzin pa med 'gyur zhing/ /dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te/ /stong dang mi stong las 'das pa/ /de ni bdud dang nyon mongs tshogs//  
85b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mdzad bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs shing drag /he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs/ /bla ma'i drin thob bsgom phyir dga' / /shugs kyis ye shes rab snang bas/ /phyogs bcur gsal bar
86a1(rgyud 'grel): byed par shog /rang la byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ku mAr sh+ris/ dpal na lan nga'i gtsug lag khang du/ sidkra ta'i skad du mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
86a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sam+ba ro pa de sha mu kha kar+N+Na pa ra tsind+ha ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sdom pa'i man ngag zhal nas snyan du brgyud pa yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsum
86a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dgos 'byung bla ma dam pa'i zhabs pad ze 'bru dri med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal/ /gsang sngags mthar thug snying po'i bcud phyung yid bzhin nor bu mkha' 'gro'i gsung bzhin rtogs pas 'dir gsal bkod/ /bde gshegS
86a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs la snang ba med pany+tsa pa nas rtogs pa ke ri li ru gsang bdag mnyes/ /spyod pas zil mnan lus kyi bkod pas rnal 'byor rjes bzung mdzad pa thams 'gro rnams stong par byas/ /bslab pa gsum dang brgyud par ldan pa nyams
86a5(rgyud 'grel): su myong bas 'jug tshul shes pas bla ma dam par shes/ /pen da ba rigs chad bran ltar rus sbal spu ste mo bsham bu ltar slob ma skyon lnga bral/ /mchog gi don 'dod gang gis de bsten thog mar dbang bzhis rgyud smin thabs dang shes
86a6(rgyud 'grel): rab 'brel ba nyid/ /'di don rim par brgyud pa rna bar 'phro byed de tshe sangs rgyas bstan gnas gus pas nyan par bgyis/ /sa yi cho ga lhag par gnas pa rig byed slob dpon rigs sbyor sogs kyis bum pa'i dbang bskur bya/ /
86a7(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa rgyud mdzes thos bsam nor ldan bla mar 'os pa phul la bla mas gsal stong la sogs bkur/ /nyer lnga lhag spangs rigs ldan rgyan spras zab bcas skul sogs gsum pa byin nas brtul zhugs brtan par bya/ /dga' ba
86b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum son lhan cig skyes pa rnyog pa dang bral yul du byas sogs 'bras bur shes par gyis/ /dbang bzhi dang 'brel brda yis mtshon pa shes rab bdag nyid sind+ha ra la mnyes sogs ston mos brgyan/ /slob dpon bzhi la
86b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bzhi dus bzhi byed pa bcu gnyis chos nyer dbang la mtshon du med par byos/ /dbang gis sman nas rim pa gnyis shes rnal 'byor dbang phyug zung du 'jug pa rgyal ba'i sku bsgrub phyir/ /dbang po'i rim pas dbye dang
86b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba'i rim pa shes nas 'du 'dzi med pas rgyun du 'bad pas sbyang/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gsol dang khams sogs bslab pa 'khor lo tshogs brten rgyu 'bras nyid dang phra mor brjod/ /go cha ye shes rgya gdab sku
86b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung mchod dang bzlas ba rdzogs rim phrin las phyogs dang thub pa nyid/ /bsdus pa'i sbyor ba tshad med bzhi ldan rdzus te skyes pa skad cig rnal 'byor bzlas pas bcas pa nyid/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po lhan cig skyes pa snang
86b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dbyer med rnon po'i spyod yul zung 'jug rdo rje'i sku/ /kun la khyab pa ngo bo nyid ston gsal rig mtshan nyid thub pa'i dbang po bde gshegs kun gyi gtso/ /gsum gsal bdag gis mngon sum nyid du legs par rtogs nas bsgom
86b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bzlas pa gsal por rab tu phye/ /chos dbyings skye med rgyal pa'i yum gcig rgyan dang phyogs dang rgyal ba nyid de na nam mkha' i ri mor blta/ /brtan d+dang g.yo brten dang brten pa lha yi rang bzhin rang la bcug nas sna yi rtse mor rdo rje bzlas/ /gtong
86b7(rgyud 'grel): ma byin nas dbang po 'bring pos 'od gsal bsgoms te dbang sogs lam dang dam tshig 'bras bur bsre/ /bdag 'jug dbang dang bla ma mchod byed nyams chags bskang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' brtan pa'i chog bzlas/ /rgyal po blon po dmangs kyi byed
87a1(rgyud 'grel): pas mtshams kyi kun spyod za ba la 'gro dang khrus sogs rnal 'byor bya/ /rnam rtog dang bral zla ba drug tu nges par bsams na grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas rol par gnas/ /thub pa'i bstan pa rgyas mdzad dngos grub mthar 'byin zab
87a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rgya che gnyis med dam tshig kun gyi gzhi/ /bag yod bsgom zhing brten dang gsang ba mi bsag mi 'bral bza' bsrung mchog gyur thub pas rab tu gsungs/ /bslab pa gsum dang rgyu 'bras zhen med dbang sogs 'bras bu rgyud gzhan las gsungs rang
87a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dran pas bsrung/ /sku gsum la brten ting 'dzin gsum gyis rgya cher rab gsal gzhi lam 'bras bus lta ba mtshon par gyis/ /rnal 'byor srog rtsol sangs rgyas lnga bdag g.yon dang g.yas su rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ma nges pa ste/ /mnyam par
87a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pas 'jug pa'i rlung nyid bum pa can du byas nas brtan pa'i go 'phang so sor thob/ /rlung gi sbyor med nyid mi shes pa las dang las min 'grub rig pas ni 'bras bu ster/ /bsdams pa che dang bzlas pa'i rim pa goms bas dge dang mi dge
87a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bzlog rlung rig pas ni shes/ /dbye dang phyed las chos mtshungs rgyun mtshan bsdam pa'i sbyor ba'i bskyed rim goms pas mthun pa'i rkyen dang ldan/ /gsang spyod la gnas sdug bsngal bzod pa lus gnang gsum ldan dmigs pa bzhi la
87a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i skyen bsal te/ /steng 'og bar dang 'bugs pa'i sbyor ba li khri'i tshul du sgo gsum spyad bar bya phyir nges par rol/ /rdo rje bzlas pa yig 'bru gsum la goms shing sangs rgyas lnga la kha dog so sor bslab par bya/ /'byung ba
87a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi rlung zin pas ni du ba smig rgyu me khyer mar me sbrin med nam mkha' 'byung/ /brtan pa'i rtags su zla zer nyi zer glog gi zer dang 'ja' tshon nyi zla bsres pa dngos su mthong/ /spyod lam dang ni sbyor ba mkhas pas dug sogs
87b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhom dang 'chi ba rtag par sna tshogs bsgyur/ /rtsa dang rlung dang thig le 'dres pas bde gsal mi rtog rgyun mi 'chang pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro kye/ /rim pa 'di nyid 'phel par bya phyir snang dmigs dngos po sgyu mar bsams la dben pa'i gnas su ni/
87b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan dpes spras pa'i gzugs brnyan la ni rab tu dmigs la dngos po chu zla ltar/ /bcu gnyis sgyu ma'i dpe yis mtshon te mnyam rjes la ni chos brgyad las 'das mkha' bzhin snyogs par 'gyur/ /de ltar shes pas mi bya ba
87b3(rgyud 'grel): med sngags zlos bsrung sogs mi dgos dge slong sogs la phyag mi bya/ /'di dang mtshan dus bsre zhing sbyang dang goms pas gyen du 'phangs te bde gshegs bltas la chos sogs mnyan/ /rmi lam med dus gnad dang ldan pas 'dod
87b4(rgyud 'grel): chags la sogs brgyad cu 'gags nas snang ba gsum 'das te/ /rgyun chad med pa'i 'od gsal chen pos sa bcur gyur pa lam bgrod na ni rnam shes gong du 'pho/ /sna tshogs don chen mthong nas shes pa spo ste rim pa gnyis ldan 'jug
87b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir gzhan gyis mi 'gyur ro/ /chags dang chags bral 'di ma shes par gzhan ni don med dus gsum sangs rgyas bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam/ /ro bor brgyug dang zla ba chu 'dzin dus dang 'brel ba bslab bcas sangs
87b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dgongs pa mi shes phyir/ /sgo gsum gnang kyis sbyang ba bya zhing ngal na sna rtser bltas la des shes skyes nas chen por blta/ /dang po'i las kyis yid 'ong la brten goms pas sngags las zhing dang lhan cig skyes
87b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs rtsa bsnyen bya/ /cig car mgon po bsgoms nas mdza' gnas rdo rje'i bzlas pa rtsal mkhas pas pad+ma'i skyon bzhi bsal/ /bde ba'i lam drang ye shes mtshon pa mar me 'du ba rgyu 'bras shes nas shes bya'i dkyil
88a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor blta/ /thur sel bcud nas glang chen seng ge rma bya 'dren dang bya rgod stag mo snang dmigs bde bar 'char/ /sbyar ba dang sa ma rlung dang mnyam zhing rig mas bde ba lus la spros nas rtsa 'dud dgrol bar bya/ /bde ba nyams skyes tshogs
88a2(rgyud 'grel): drug kun la ro mnyam lugs las 'byung dang bzlog pas dga' bzhi mtshon par bya/ /dga' ba gsum dang dpe don bsres nas rgyu tshogs gzung 'dzin chos nyid goms nas rtsol med 'bras bu 'char/ /ye shes gsal byed dbang gi 'bras bu rdo rje
88a3(rgyud 'grel): lus la 'khor lo mdud pa spyi bor grol ba'i gnas/ /sgo dgu 'gags nas sgo bzhi thim pa nyid kyis rnam grol ye shes lus can sgra brnyan lta bu bral/ /mig sogs stong dang bdud bzhi grol ba chos nyid la mkhas gsum pa gcig gyur ye shes rgyun chad med/ gzhi
88a4(rgyud 'grel): lam 'bras bu gcig gyur bde chen dngos po ro mnyam nyi ge bzhi don 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur/ /mthar ma skyol na nye bar spyod pa lus ldan bzhi dang nges shes rtags te ngo sprod shes par bya/ /skye shi'i bar do shes pa snga phyi gnyid dus dran mtshams 'chi ba'i
88a5(rgyud 'grel): dus dran phra rags thim nas ni/ /'od gsal chen po de ma rtogs na bla ma sogs kyi sgyel ba sus nyid mtshams rlung gsum bcings pa'i phyir/ /yon tan rdzogs pa bar do longs sku yon tan ldan de ma brtan na dug gsum las gyur pa'i/ /rtog par bcas la
88a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang dus nyams dang lha sogs sgyu ma zung du 'jug pa slob dang mi slob pa/ bdun phrag re la brgyal bar 'gyur ba de ma khegs na skye ba sna tshogs sprul skus nyid mtshams sbyar/ /bar do gsum la 'dod chags la sogs dus gsum shes pa zag med 'od
88a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal sgyu mar bsres la bsgom/ /'di don rim pas 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das rgyal gnyis med zung 'jug phyag rgya chen por 'gyur/ /dbang dang dam tshig 'brel par shes pa gdod nas dag pa rkyen gyis skur tshul nyams su blang dang
88b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs/ /bum sogs dam tshig mnyam gzhag rjes spyod mi 'bral bza' bsrung spros bcas spros med yan lag bshags bya nyid/ /dbang dus lta sogs mtshon par bya la bdud rigs ngos bzung zil gyis mnan nas bsgom dang rtags su 'brel//
88b2(rgyud 'grel): tha ma 'bring dang rab dang mchog gyur 'jug sgo shes pas sgom la sbyar te gang dang gang la sogs/ /mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dir 'dod pas dus dang 'brel bar spyod pa byas nas gol sa bcad par bya/ /bya spyod la sogs tshogs su bsgyur la
88b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las byed pa rab gnas sbyin bsreg rnam pa bzhis 'dod dgur bsgyur/ /'khor lo bzhi la sku bzhir yan lag bdun ldan rdo rje sems dpa' sgo gsum ngo sprod mtshan dpes spras/ /rgyud rnams snying phyung man ngag bcud bsdus lam gyi rim pa
88b4(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs kun thugs yid bzhin nor bu nyid/ /mi mthun phyogs las rgyal bar bya phyir 'jug pa'i tshul dang zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gsal ba'i thabs nyid do/ /lus la go gyon ngag gis g.yul sprad sems kyis mtshon bsnun sku gsum khrus
88b5(rgyud 'grel): bcud rlung dang 'khor lo bskor/ /rtsa ba drug la yan lag so dgu nad la sman dpyad bar chad bsrung 'khor gnad bral gegs bsal to/ /sa la sogs pa'i ro bzhi ngos bzung 'khor lo bzhi yis re bzhi bsnyams la zhi gnas phyogs la
88b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /thabs dang ldan pas pi wang sgra sogs rtsa rlung la ni shes rab sku gsum mthun sbyor rdzas sogs lnga/ /zin dang ma zin legs par shes nas lus kyi gnang la nyi ma zla sogs brdzis nas rdul sprugs byed/ /'byung bzhi'i rlung la lte ba
88b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs stong ra bcas nas na tsha bigs? 'don gegs 'khyims la sogs bsal/ /bcu pa'i rlung shes ting 'dzin rang grol sman pa lta bus brgyad po bsal nas rdul chu ltar spyad bya/ /dangs ma bsgrubs na skyon rnams sel phyir bdag lta'i
89a1(rgyud 'grel): bud shing bsregs nas 'od gsal chos sku bkral/ /'di don rim brgyud bla ma la brten gus pas blang phyir byin rlabs lam khyer snyan nas snyan du brgyud/ /mchog gi blo can brtse ba chen pos theg gzhan spangs la smin dang grol ba rim
89a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis la 'bad/ /snod bcud la sogs gzhal yas khang dang phung po khams sogs lha ru dag pas rgyal ba thams cad bsdu/ /rdo rje lus la bde chen gnas pa pho nya la sogs spros dang spros med 'khor lo zung du 'jug/ rim pa 'di la mos pa brtan
89a3(rgyud 'grel): pas sprul mthong zhing skyen yod dang bcas chung du yin phyir tshogs/ /skad cig bzhi yis dga' ba gsum son 'bring po'i drod de lhan cig skyes pa d+hu tI'i lam zhugs nas/ /'jig rten las 'das brgya phrag bdun po yon tan gyis spras gnas dang nye gnas
89a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu bzhi sogs la/ /dangs ma yas byon pu li sogs khyab rgyu ba mas brtan bde chen brtol nas ma chags pad+ma'i sa/ /rab bkra mtshan po phrag bdun yon tan ye shes gsal byed chos sku'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'khor lo
89a5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'i bskyed rdzogs la sogs gting dpag dka' pa gsal por rab phye snyan rgyud mkha' 'gro'i gsang/ /dri med bsags pa'i dge ba des ni sa gsum gnas pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob par shog/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro
89a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gsang tshig rdzogs so// //rtsibs kyi rgya mdud dang bcas pa mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis pu la ha rir bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra sam+ba ra maN+Dal sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal
89a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po dpa' po kun bdag nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun bdag nyid de/ /'khor lo dga' ba bzhi ru grags/ /skad cig bsnyen
89b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs ngo bo nyid/ /mi phyed nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ /zhal bzhi g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs/ /sa dang pha rol phyin dag pas/ /phyag dang phyag mtshan 'chang pa'i mchog/ de bzhin shes dang shes dag pas/ /thod dang mgo bo zla phyed 'chang/ /mi bskyod pa
89b2(rgyud 'grel): dang drag po'i 'od/ /gar gyi ro dgu'i nyams dang ldan/ /sreng dang zhes sdang rnam dag pas/ /'jigs byed u ma'i steng na bzhugs/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo'i 'dren pa la/ /lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i lte ba na/ /bde ba che
89b3(rgyud 'grel): la rnam rol pa/ /yang dag ting 'dzin rnam dag pas/ /dpal ldan bde mchog la phyag 'tshal/ /mgon por yang dag 'khyud bzhugs pa/ /zhal gcig ma la cher dmar pa/ /gri gug thod ldan bde rang bzhin/ /rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal/ /de mdun zhi ba
89b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang/ /lus dran nye bar gzhag ngo bo/ /sku mdog nag mo gri thod mtshan/ /ror gnas mkha' 'gro mar phyag 'tshal/ /g.yon du rgyas dang mchog dga' dang/ /tshor ba dran pa nyer gzhag rim/ /sku mdog ljang mo gri thod mtshan/ /de mdun zhi ba
89b5(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal/ /nub tu dga' bral dga' ba dang/ /dbang dang sems dran nyer gzhag bzhugs/ /sku mdog dmar mo gri thod mtshan/ /ror gnas dum skyes mar phyag 'tshal/ /g.yas su 'gugs dang lhan cig skyes/ /chos dran nye bar gzhag pas
89b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /sku mdog ser mo gri thod 'chang/ /ror gnas gzugs can la phyag 'tshal/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ /phyag rgya lnga yi rnam par brgyan/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang mtshungs/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bdag phyag 'tshal/ /pul+li
89b7(rgyud 'grel): mdun dang mgo bo dang/ /so dang sen mo rnam dag pas/ /thugs kyi 'khor lor thod dum dang/ /rab gtum nag mo la phyag 'tshal/ /dzA land+ha ra brtson 'grus spyi/ /skra dang spu ni rnam dag pas/ /keng rus kyis 'khyud sku mdog sngo/ /gtum mig ma la phyag
90a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /u rgyan dang ni dpyod pa dang/ /rna ba g.yas dang pags pa dri/ /keng rus chen po dang lhan cig /'od ldan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /arbu dA dang sems lhag pa/ /sha yi sams? ni rnam dag pas/ /mche ba rnam par
90a2(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs sbyor ba'i/ /sna chen ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /go dA ba ri rna g.yon dang/ /rtsa rgyas dang dbang bdag nyid de/ /lha dgra dang bcas mkha' 'gro ma/ /dpa' bo'i blo ma la phyag 'tshal/ /rA ma shwa ri rus pa dang/ /smin dbus brtson 'grus dbang po dag/
90a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med la yang dag 'khyud/ /lha mo mi'u thung la phyag 'tshal/ /de bi ko Ti mtshan? ba dang/ /mig dang dran pa rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje'i 'od kyis yang dag 'khyud/ /lang ki? dbang phyug mar phyag 'tshal/ /mA la be dang phrag pa snying/ /ting 'dzin dbang po
90a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag pa/ /lha mo rdo rje'i skur sbyor ba/ /shing grib ma la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /kA ma rU dang mtshan khung dang/ /mig dang shes rab dbang bdag nyid/ /gsung 'khor dmar po myu gu can/ /sa srungs ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o Te nu gnyis mkhris pa dang/
90a5(rgyud 'grel): dang pa'i stobs ni rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje ral pa can gyis 'khyud/ /'jigs byed chen mo la phyag 'tshal/ /tri sha ku ne lte ba'i gnas/ /glo ba brtson 'grus rnam dag pa/ /dpa' bo chen pos yang dag 'khyud/ /rlung shugs ma la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ko sa la dang
90a6(rgyud 'grel): sna rtse dang/ /dran dang rgyu ma rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis 'khyud pa/ /chang thung ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ka lingka dang kha'i phyogs dang/ /gnye ma dang ni ting 'dzin stobs/ /rab tu bzang dang snyoms 'jug pa/ /sngo ba sangs lha mo la phyag 'tshal/ /lam+b+ha ka dang mgrin gnas
90a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /grod pa dang ni shes rab stobs/ /rdo rje bzang gis 'khyud bzhugs ma/ /shin tu bzang mo la phyag 'tshal/ /kAny+tsi dang ni snying phyogs gnas/ /bshad dang ting 'dzin yan lag dag /'jigs byed chen pos yang dag 'khyud/ /rta rnam la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /hi
90b1(rgyud 'grel): mA la ya 'doms par dang/ /brtson 'grus mtshan rtse rnam dag pa/ mig mi bzang ldan mkha' 'gro ma/ /bya gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku yi 'khor lor bre ta phur/ /dkar mo bad kan mtshan ma dang/ /dga' ba rnam dag 'khor shugs ma/ /stobs chen
90b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gri ha de ba bshad lam dang/ /rnag dang chos rnams 'byed bdag nyid/ /rin chen rdo rjes yang dag 'khyud/ /dum skyes ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sau rASh+Ta brla gnyis gnas/ /khrag dang dran pa rnam dag pa/ /rta mgrin dang
90b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan mkha' 'gro ma /chad 'tshong ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /su war+N+Na dwI byin par gnas/ /rdul dang btang snyoms yan lag dang/ /nam mkha' i snying por 'khyud mdzad ma /'khor lo'i go cha mar phyag 'tshal/ /na gar sor mo tshil dang ni/ /shin tu
90b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa rnam dag pa/ /he ru ka dpal snyoms 'jug pa/ /shin tu dpa' ma la phyag 'tshal/ /sind+hu rkang pa'i bol dang ni/ /yang dag lta dang mchim sbyangs/ pad+ma ga ra dbang phyug dang ldan/ g/stobs chen ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma ro mthe
90b5(rgyud 'grel): bod steng dang ni/ /yang dag rtog pa mchil ma dag /rnam snang mdzad dang snyoms 'jug pa/ /'khor lo sgyur ma la phyag 'tshal/ /ku lu tA dang pus mor gnas/ /snabs dang yang dag dgra dag pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snyoms 'jug pa//
90b6(rgyud 'grel): brtson chen ma la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /nyi dkyil srog med la gnas pa/ /g.yon pa la sogs go rims kyis/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa 'chad/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum lhan cig skyes dga' bas/ /thugs
90b7(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag mnyes mdzad pa/ /thugs gsung sku yi mkha' 'gro ma/ /gnag dang dmar dkar la phyag 'tshal/ /shar sgor nyi ma la gnas pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma mtshungs 'od mnga' ma/ /khro mo gri gug thod pa 'chang/ /khwa gdong ma la phyag
91a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chal lo/ /g.yon sgor nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ /lA ma dang 'bra'i 'od mnga' ma/ /khro mo gri gug thod pa 'chang/ /'ug gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub sgor nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ /dus skyes ma yi 'od 'dra ma/ /khro mo gri gug thod pa 'chang/ /khyi gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo/
91a2(rgyud 'grel): lho sgor? nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ /gzugs can 'dra ba'i 'od mnga' ma/ /khro mo gri gug thod pa 'chang/ /phag gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag las dang yang dag 'tsho/ /rtsol? dang dran pa yang dag ldan/ /sgo skyong ma ni bzhi po la/ /de goms thob phyir bdag phyag
91a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /shar lho yi ni mtshams bzhugs pa/ /gnag dang ser ba'i 'ong mnga' ba/ /drag mo gri gug thod pa 'chang/ /gshin rje brtan mar phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho dang nub kyi mtshams bzhugs pa/ /ser dang dmar ba'i 'od mda' ba/ /drag mo gri gug thod pa 'chab
91a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje pho nya mo la 'dud/ /nub dang byang gi mtshams bzhugs pa/ /dmar dang ljang ba'i 'ong mnga' ba/ /drag mo gri gug thod pa 'chang/ /gshin rje mche ba mar phyag 'tshal/ /byang dang shar gyi mtshamS bzhugs pa/ /ljang dang gnag pa'i 'od mnga' pa/ /drag
91a5(rgyud 'grel): mo gri gug thod pa 'chang/ /gshin rje 'dzoms ma la phyag 'tshal/ /ma skyes pa dang skyes pa dang/ /sdig pa mi bskyed 'dzoms pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin dge ba bskyed pa dang/ /de bzhin gnas dang sbel tha byed/ /rnam shes tshogs brgyad dag pI phyir/ /'bad dang rtsol ba
91a6(rgyud 'grel): rab mdzad pa'i/ /'jig rten chos rnamS rnam mnyam phyir /sgo skyed rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /lus dang ngag dang yid ngag pa'i/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi rnam par brgyan/ /ma lus mkha' 'gro'i 'khor la/ /lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos dang long spyod sprul pa
91a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bde ba chen po rnam dag pa/ /sgrib pa'i dri sogs dgra ba'i sems/ /gang de yang dag rnam par gnas/ /ye shes 'khor lo thugs 'khor lo/ /gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo dang/ /de bzhin daM tshig 'khor lo/ /gnaS kun bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo/ /nga rgyal zhes sdang 'dod chags che
91b1(rgyud 'grel): gti mug phrag dog rnam dag pa/ /rin chen med skyong rta? bgrin? dang/ /rtag pa rta bdag rim pa yis/ /rnam shes ye shes rnam dag pa/ /dam tshig che dang 'byung bar grags/ /phung po khams kyi ngo bo nyid/ /'khor lo lnga po la phyag 'tshal/ /mkha' spyod dang mis spyod
91b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin sa 'og gnas pa dang/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag /'khor lo lnga la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag po yis/ /gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa dang/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /
91b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni khams gsum thams cad la/ /sngags dang dbyings dang chos dag gis/ /rtag tu khyab nas yang dag gnas/ /bde mchog dpal tshogs phyag 'tshal nas/ /dpal ldan bde mchog ces bya ba'i/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bstod byas pas/ /bsod nams gang thob
91b4(rgyud 'grel): de yis ni/ /'gro rnams de yi rang bzhin shog /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba maN+Di ta shU ra ka la shas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba bsod nams bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra
91b5(rgyud 'grel): sam+ba ra maN+Da la de ba ga na sto tra na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dpa' mo dang/ /dag pa'i chos
91b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dri med pa/ /khrag 'thung mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung/ /sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag spro/ /rdo rje phag mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus dang tshor dang sems dang chos/ /dran pa nye bar
91b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pa'i dngos/ /mkha' 'gro lA ma dum skyes ma/ /gzugs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das/ /phyogs kyi lha mo chen mo bzhi/ /mtshams kyi dag ni snod bzhi po/ /zhal bzhi dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sen mo so la thod dum
92a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang gdub byed/ /rab gtum mo ni mgo la gnas/ /pul+li ra mar phyag 'tshal bstod/ /keng rus chen po yang dag bzhugs/ /gtum mig ma ni skra dang spu/ /brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul spyi gtsug la/ /dzA lan d+ha rar phyag
92a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /dpa' mo bags pa dri ma dang/ /dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul keng rus can/ /'od ldan ma ni rna g.yas gnas/ /oM Di ya nar phyag 'tshal bstod/ /arbud? ni rgyab tshigs la/ /sna chen ma ni rnal 'byor ma/ /sha la mche gtsigs sems rdzu
92a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul/ /bde ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lha mo rtsa dang rgyus pa la/ /dad pa'i dbang po dpa' bo la/ /rna ba dag ni g.yon pa la/ /nye ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /brtson 'grus dbang bo nye ba'i gnas/ /'od dpag med ni rus pa la/ /mi'u
92a4(rgyud 'grel): thung ma ni smin ma'i dbus/ /mar me ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchin pa la ni dran dbang po/ /lang ka'i dbang phyug rdo rje'i 'od/ /de bi ko Ti mig gnyis la/ /nye ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin dbang po shing grib ma/ /phrag pa la ni nye ba'i gnas/
92a5(rgyud 'grel): snying ga la ni rdo rje'i sku/ /mA la bar ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas 'di dag/ mkha' la spyod pa'i rnam dag pa/ /phyogs dang mtshams su nag por zhugs/ /de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab dbang pos srungs ma/ /mchan khung la ni
92a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ste/ /myu gu can ni mig la gnas/ /kA ma ru par phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed che/ /nu ma la ni gnas pa ste/ /mkhris pa rdo rje ral pa can/ /oM Ter zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtson 'grus stobs ni rlung shugs ma/ /lte ba
92a7(rgyud 'grel): la ni gnas pa ste/ /glo ba la ni dpa' bo che/ /tri sha ku ner phyag 'tshal lo/ /dran pa'i stobs ni chang mthung ma/ /sna rtse la ni rab tu gnas/ /rgyu ma rdo rje hUM mdzad de/ /ko sar nye zhing phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin stobs ni sngo bsangs ma/ /tshan do ha ni kha
92b1(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs/ /gnye ma la ni rab tu bzang/ /ka ling ga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu bzang mo shes rab stobs/ /tshando ni mgrin pa'i dbus/ /grod pa la ni rdo rje bzang/ /lampA ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin yan lag rta rnam/ /kAny+tsir snying la gnas pa ste/ /
92b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa la ni 'jigs byed che/ /nye tshan do la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hi mA la yar mtshan ma'i rtse/ /brtson 'grus yang dag bya gdong ma/ /gsang ba'i spubs la mig mi bzang/ /nye chen do la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung gi 'khor lor yang dag gnas/ /sa spyod ting 'dzin
92b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gnas/ /kha dog dmar po phyogs mtshams na/ /yang dag bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pre ta mtshan ma 'khor lo shugs/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub lam/ /bad kan la ni stobs po che/ /'du ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gri ha bshad lam dum skyes bzhugs
92b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu sbyangs la byang chub lam/ /rnag la rin chen rdo rje ste/ /'du ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sau rASh+Ta brla gnyis la/ /nye bar gnas pa'i 'du can du/ /chos rab 'byed pa chang 'tshong ma/ /rta mgrin khrag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser gling dag ni byin pa la/ /dran pa 'khor lo'i go cha ma//
92b5(rgyud 'grel): rdul ni nam mkha' i? snying por ste/ /nye ba'i 'dul phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu dpa' mos legs par 'khyud/ /btang snyoms yang dag sor mo la/ /tshil ni he ru ka dpal te/ /dur khrod grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sind+hu rkang pa'i bol la ni/ /yang dag lta ba stobs chen ma/ /mchin pa pad+ma gar dbang
92b6(rgyud 'grel): phyug /dur khrod grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchil ma dpa' bo rnam snang mdzad/ /'khor lo sgyur pa yang dag rtog /mthe bong gnyis la nye dur khrod/ /ma nor gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ku lu tAr ni yang dag ngag/ brtson chen ma ni pus mo la/ /snabs la rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /nye
92b7(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ni sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /sa 'og spyod par gnas pa yin/ /phyogs dang mtshams na dkar por gnas/ /de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag las dang 'tsho ba dang/ /yang dag rtsol ba dran pa dag /khwa dang 'ug pa khyi dang phag/ sgom bzhi?
93a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag spong bzhi rnam dag pa/ /gshin rje brtan ma phoT? mo/ /gshin rje mche ma gshin rje 'joms/ mtshams ma bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsrung don du/ /'di brgyad kyis ni bgegs spangs so/ /bde mchog
93a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bstod pa yis/ /dge bas bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom ste/ /lha tshogs lha mo khrir gyur nas/ /bsam tshogs stobs mkhan ldan gyur cig /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la stod pa zhes bya ba kha che'i mkhas pa chen po
93a3(rgyud 'grel): bram ze rin chen rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mahA dza na dang/ mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi bsgyur/ //rgya gar skad du/ shI tsakra sam+ba ra sto traM/ bod skad du dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo sdom pa la
93a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun rtog spos bral dri ma rnam dag cing/ /mtsho ltar bde ba chen por ro gcig pa/ /nam mkha' i dang du sprin? dkar dag pa bzhin/ /rang bzhin rnam dag chos rnams mngon gyur te/ /ji ltar mkha' la 'ja''tshon shar ba bzhin/ /gnyis med bde chen
93a5(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /yid bzhin nor bu rtog med ji bzhin du/ /gdul bya mchog la sprul sku khro bo'i tshul/ /dpa' bo 'jigs byed gang dgu'i nyams dang ldan/ /sku yi rang bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ni/ /sgeg dang dpa' dang 'jigs su rung ba'i tshul/ /gsung
93a6(rgyud 'grel): gi rang bzhin yan lag drug cu ni/ /bzhad dang gshe dang rngam pa'i tshul du bstan/ /thugs kyi rang bzhin gzugs dang ting nge 'dzin/ /zhi ba sems dpa' rmad du byung ba'i tshul/ /dbang phyug chen po'i sgeg pa'i nyams bcom nas/ /gnyis med yum la
93a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud nas 'gying pag bzhugs/ /bzhon nu gdong drug dpa' ba' i nyams bcom nas/ /'jigs byed dus mtshan g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis mnan/ /khyab 'jug zhal gsum 'jigs pa'i nyams bcom nas/ /zhal bzhi mnga' zhing bcu gnyis phyag
93b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /lha chen tshangs pa rgod ba'i/ nyams bcom nas/ /g.yas pa ser po gzhad pa'i tshul du bstan/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i gshe ba'i nyams bcom nas/ /glang chen pags pas brgyan byas mche ba gtsigs/ /sgra gcan lha min nyi zla khar bcug nas/ /rngam pa'i
93b2(rgyud 'grel): nyams bcom tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams/ /brgya byin spyan mangs zhi ba'i nyams bcom nas/ /sku la spyan gsum gzi brjid ldan pa bo/ /me lha tshangs pa zhi ba'i nyams bcom nas/ /thal ba'i tshom bus sku la brgyan pa po/ /klu tshan so? sha
93b3(rgyud 'grel): rmad byung nyams bcom nas/ /mi mgo lnga bcu cig gi do shal byas/ /sku gsung thugs la sdug bsngal gsum nub pas/ /thams cad bde ba chen por thugs su chud/ /yang dag ting 'dzin rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das/ /'khor lo'i dbus na
93b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang sbyor bar bzhugs/ /chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing kar bstan/ /thabs kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /thugs rje mchog gyur de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yi yum gyur rdo rje phag mo ni/ /sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig
93b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis ma/ /bdud bzhi bcom nas bde chen thugs chud ma/ /gnyis med yum gyur de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi sogs las mdzad ye shes bzhi yi sku/ /tshad med bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi ldan ma/ /phyogs bzhi pad+ma'i dbus na bzhugs
93b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro yum bzhi mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag pa la sogs de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi /bum pa bzhi dang bdud rtsis gang pa'i snod/ /mtshams bzhir mchod pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa yi/ /thabs shes dbyer
93b7(rgyud 'grel): med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems ni skye ba med par thugs chud cing/ /mi bskyod rigs su sku mdog mthing gar bstan/ /rnam thar brgyad rtsibs thugs rtags rdo rjes brgyan/ mkha' spyod yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung gi sgra
94a1(rgyud 'grel): snyan lta bur thugs chud cing/ /'od dpag med rigs sku mdog dmar por bstan/ /rnam thar brgyad rtsibs gsung rtags pad+mas brgyan/ /sa spyod yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku ni sgyu ma lta bur thugs chud
94a2(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /rnam dag rigs su sku mdog dkar por bstan/ /rnam thar brgyad rtsibs sku rtags 'khor los brgyan/ /sa 'og yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshin rje brtan sogs khro mo chen mo brgyad/ /mi 'am ci sogs gdul phyir tha dad
94a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad pa rnams/ /dam tshig 'khor lor bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen las grub dpag med gzhal yas khang/ /byang chub mchog gi chos rnams yongs rdzogs pa/ /gtso bo bde chen
94a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi snang ba ni/ /sna tshogs brgyan dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes/ /chos rnams tshad med dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor/ /rnam par gzigs shing tha dad gdong du bstan/ /nyan thos rang rgyal 'khor lo sgyur sogs brgyad/ /phyogs
94a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams skyong zhing klu dang srin po'i gzugs/ /thugs rjes nyon mongs bsregs mdzad 'bar ba'i phreng/ /rnam snang rang bzhin thar pa'i grong khyer mchog /bde chen bzhugs gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo
94a6(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa la bstod pa/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bram ze rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mahA dzA na dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis sgyur ba'o// //
94a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsakra sam+ba ra stot+tra nA ma /bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM chos nyid dbyings las bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni/ /nyon
94b1(rgyud 'grel): mongs rnam dag ye shes sku brnyes shing/ /dus mdza' i me dpung lta bu'i klong dkyil nas/ /ri rab chu skyes nyi ma'i gdan steng na/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpa' bo chen po'i sku/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan//
94b2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mthing kha mdza' ltar dag pa'i 'od/ /gcer bu glang chen stag gi sha ma thabs can/ /zhal gdangs tshems gcig hUM gi 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /dpral ba'i khro gnyer spyan gsum glog ltar 'khyug /ral pa'i thor tshugs zla phyed rdo rje dang//
94b3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa nor bu mi bskyod rtags kyis mdzes/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang/ /rgod dang gshe dang rngam pa'i ngang tshul can/ /snying rje zhi dang rmad du byung ba'i nyams/ /gar gyi rnam 'phrul nam mkha' i khyab par ston/ /'khor lo rna cha
94b4(rgyud 'grel): mgul rgyan gdub kor dang/ /ske rags thal chen tshangs pa'i skud pa can/ /mi mgo'i do shal rdo rje dril bu 'khyud/ /dpal ldan he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med tshul gyis pa tsam ldan 'das ma yang/ /sku mdog dmar mo gcer
94b5(rgyud 'grel): bu skra grol zhing/ /phyag rgya lnga dang rdo rje thod pa 'khyud/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rang bzhin la/ /ma lus rgyal ba'i rigs rnaMs yongs su rdzogs/ /srid pa rnam dag sku yi yan lag la/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yul gyi rnam par brgyan/ /
94b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni khams kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo dang/ /rtsa yi rang bzhin dpa' mo nyi shu bzhi/ /bye ba'i grangs snyed ma lus 'khor bcas kun/ /gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang nye zhing sogs/ /sa bcu'i gnas su gnyis med dgyes par
94b7(rgyud 'grel): rol/ /bde chen longs spyod rdzogs la rnam rol zhing/ /rnam dag skye mched las kyang 'khor lo bzhi/ /lus kyi rnam dag rang bzhin gzhal yas khang/ /rnam shes brgyad las sprul pa'i dur khrod brgyad/ / dngos
95a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dngos min rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das/ /kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso/ /ma lus gcig tu 'dus pa'i skur gyur pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi 'od zer glog
95a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam mthong ba las/ /ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i yid kyis bdag bstod na/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /mgon po khyod kyis thugs rjes gzung du gsol/ /dam tshig brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /brtse
95a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thugs kyis bu bzhin dgongs nas kyang/ /bar chad bdud dpung zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas su srog dor nas/ /khyod kyi rnal 'byor rtag tu brtson pa la/ /ye shes yar ngo'i zla ltar
95a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phel ba dang/ /dngos grub tshul bzhin grub par mdzad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /mkhyen pa nyi 'od lta bur rab rgyas te/ /yon tan gzi brjid chen po bskyed du
95a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /mdza' khob kla klo'i gnas su 'khyams pa dang/ /log rtog bdud kyi bcings pa'i sems can rnams/ / khyod kyi rnam sprul mthong thos dran pas kyang/ /mgon po khyod kyis
95a6(rgyud 'grel): gdul byar bzung du gsol/ / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i stod pa slob dpon me tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// */ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa bzhugs so// //
95b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri tsakra saM pa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid dbyings las bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni/ /skal pa'i
95b2(rgyud 'grel): me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ /ri rab chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan steng du/ /'jigs byed dus mtshan brgyad bkug zhabs kyi mnan/ /sku mdog mthing nag mkha' ltar dag pa'i 'od/ /gcer bu glang chen stag gi sham thabs can/ /zhal gdangs
95b3(rgyud 'grel): mche? gtsigs hUM gyi 'brug sgra sgrog /dpral ba'i khro gnyer spyan gsum klog ltar 'gyu/ /ral pa'i thor cog zla phyed rdo rje dang/ /thod pa nor bu mi skyod dar gyis mdzes/ /dpa' ba sgeg pa rab tu 'jigs byed cing/ /rgod dang
95b4(rgyud 'grel): gshe dang rngam? pa'i dang tshul can/ /snying rje zhi dang rmad du byung ba'i nyams/ /gar gyi rnam 'phrul nam mkha' khyab par ston/ /'khor lo rna cha mgul brgyan gdub kor dang/ /ske rags thal chen tshangs pa'i skud pa can/ /mi
95b5(rgyud 'grel): mgo'i do shal rdo rje dril bu 'khyud/ /dpal ldan he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das ma yang/ /sku mdog dmar mo gcer bu skra grol zhing/ / phyag rgya lnga dang rdo rje thod pa
95b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rang bzhin la/ /ma lus rgyal ba'i rigs rnams yongs su rdzogs/ /srid pa rnam dag sku yi yan lag la/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yul gyi rnam par brgyan/ /khyod ni khams
95b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo dang/ /rtsa yi rang bzhin dpa' mo nyi shu bzhi/ /bye ba'i grangs snyed ma lus 'khor bcas kun/ /gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang nye zhing sogs/ /sa bcu'i gnas su gnyis med dgyes par rol/ /bde chen long spyod rdzogs la 
96a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam rol zhing/ /rnam dag skye mched las kyang 'khor lo bzhin lus kyi rnam dag rang bzhin gzhal yas khang/ /rnam shes brgyad las sprul pa'i dur khrod brgyad/ /dngos dang dngos min rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das/ /kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor dbang? phyug gtso/ /
96a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lus gcig tu 'dus pa'i skur gyur pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi 'od zer glog tsam mthong pa las/ /ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i yid kyis bdag bstod na/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /mgon po khyod kyi thugs rjes bzung
96a3(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /dam tshig brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /brtse ba'i thugs kyi bu bzhin dgongs nas kyang/ /bar chad bdud dpung zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas su srog dor nas/ /khyod kyi rnal 'byor rtag tu brtson pa la/ /ye shes yang ngo'i zla ltar
96a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phel ba dang/ /dngos grub tshul bzhin grub par mdzad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /mkhyen pa nyi 'od lta bur rab rgyas te/ /yon tan gzi brjid chen po bskyed du gsol/ /mdza' kho ba kla klo'i gnas su 'khyams pa dang/ /log rtog bdud
96a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcings pa'i sems can rnams/ /khyod kyi rnam sprul mthong thos dran pas kyang/ /mgon po khyod kyis gdul byar gzung du gsol/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i stod pa slob dpon me tri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
96a6(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings rnam dag dbyings las ma g.yos kyang/ /thabs kyi khro bo'i skur ston gdug pa 'dul/ /che ba'i che mchog lta yi lhar gyur pa/ /kun bzang he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag med dbang phyug sku dang gnyis med cing/ /bde mchog 'od gsal dag pa'i dkyil
96a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nas/ /rgyal bsras bcas la sogs sprin 'phro ba/ /rdo rje phag mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes sku/ /'khor 'das stong par mdzad pa'i thugs rje yis/ /gdul bya kun mkhyen sa la 'god mdzad pa'i/ /rigs lnga bde bar
96b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' lta bu thams cad thogs med cing/ /'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul lus dang ldan/ /thugs dam dbang gis bsgrub la brtser dgongs pa/ /gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i tshags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs rnam dag ye shes sku
96b2(rgyud 'grel): brnyes ba/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo ma lus gcod pa'i phyir/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro ba'i dren mdzad pa/ /rgyal gnyis rdo rje'i zhabs la dad pas 'dud/ /lha mi'i longs spyod phun tshogs thams cad dang/ /kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin chen po dang/ /gsang dang gsang rab gsang
96b3(rgyud 'grel): chen bla med kyi/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen rgya mtsho dag gis mchod/ /bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang/ /chags dang zhe sdang rnam par rmongs sems kyis/ /srid pa nyams ngar sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ /des na sdig pa thams cad rab tu bshags/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas mgon
96b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' mchog/ 'phags pa rnams kyis dge ba gang bgyis ba/ /de dag bla med byang chub 'bros thob par/ /ma lus pa la rtag tu rjes yi rang/ /rdzogs sangs rin chen rang gi sems gnas dang/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rab dral dam pa'i chos/ /sa dbang tshogs dang brtul
96b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs dge 'dun la/ /rab tu dang pas bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rgyal dang rgyal nyid legs skyes de dag la/ /kun nas kun tu bdag nyid bdag gis dbul/ /sems dpa' mchog gis bdag ni yongs bzhes shig/ dad pas bdag nyid khyed kyi 'bangs su mchi /blo bur nyon
96b6(rgyud 'grel): mongs tshogs kyis gdungs pa yis/ /bskyod pa'i skye bo mdza' dag bsgral ba'i phyir/ /dam chos bdud brtsi'i sngags rnams bshad pa ru/ /sman mchog mgon po la ni bdag gsol lo/ /mchog tu mi dge ba ni rab bcom pas/ /bdud kyi skye rgan dang 'chi las grol/ /mya
96b7(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'da' bzhed gyur pa spang bar ni/ /sman mchog mgon po la ni bdag gsol la/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gang byung ba/ skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed ltar/ de ring nyid du sems bskyed do/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge
97a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan por gzung bar gyi ya/ /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yis/ /sngon gyi bde gshegs grangs med la/ /thugs bskyed dam tshig dpag med dag 'tshang rgya bar dum btang
97a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ bdag ni deng nas byang chub par/ /lus srog ltos pa med par yang/ /bslab 'di mgon bzhin bsrung la gnas/ /ye shes thugs kyis dgongs su gsol/ /rnam rtog ye shes lngar gyur pa/ /rtag tu bsten cing spyod par bya/ /rgyal ba rigs lnga'i brtul zhugs dag/ srog
97a3(rgyud 'grel): gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dag/ rtag tu mi phyed brtul zhugs bzung/ /rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa yi/ /dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bgyi/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi sogs/ /rig sngags 'char kun mi 'da' ltar/ /deng nas bla med byang
97a4(rgyud 'grel): chub par /bdag gis tshul bzhin bsrung bar bgyi/ nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zla rer bcu phrag gnyis po dang/ /bco lnga la ni rab tu mchod/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bgyi/ /sems can la yang rgyab mi phyogs/ /'khor ba dag kyang mi spang zhing/ /mya ngan 'das
97a5(rgyud 'grel): la dgar mi 'gro/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la/ /gus pas bsnyen bkur mchod par bgyi/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la/ /brnyas pa nyid du mi bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshan cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bgyi'o/ /bdag gi dus gsum dge ba ci spyad
97a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /nam mkha' i mthas klas gyur pa'i sems can rnams/ /bla med theg pa chen po'i snod gyur nas/ /kun kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid shog/ skye zhing skye ba dag ni thams cad/ /blo ldan rigs bzang nga rgyal med pa dang/ /snying rje che ldan bla ma la dad cing/ /'khor lo bde
97a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog dam tshig la gnas shog /rdo rje dril bu la sogs rtag tu 'chang/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos ni rtogs pa dang/ /kak+ko shu kra la sogs rtag za zhing/ /mthar thug theg chen sgrub pa'i skal ldan shog/ deng nas byang chub snying por mchis par du/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs
97b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po dang/ /gsang ba'i theg pa dbyer med rmad byung dang/ /mi 'bral tshul bzhin rtag tu bsgrub par shog /sgrub mchog 'di la bar chad mi 'byung zhing/ /tshe 'di la sogs skye ba bdun bar du/ /dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo chen po yi/ /zhabs rdul bre 'bru spyi
97b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsug gnas par shog /gang tshe 'gro ba'i mgon la blta ba dang/ /phyir zhing cung zad 'dri bar 'dod na yang/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs thugs kyi bdag po ni/ /thams cad sgrib med sa ler mthong bar shog /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i khams dang mnyam pa yi/ /sems can
97b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus byang chub dgod pa'i phyir/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ji lta bar/ /bdag gi spyod pa'ang de dang 'dra bar shog/ sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal bdag la smin/ /bdag bde dge pas de kun bde thob shog/ tshe ring kun tu sgo gsum rin chen dang/ /bum bzang dpag bsam sa
97b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs lta bur shog/ mgon po kun mkhyen thugs rje'i byin brlabs dang/ /sgrub pa mchog la rtse gcig sbyangs pa yis/ /bde mchog mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub mchog thob nas/ /sems can thams cad smin pa'i mthu ldan shog /dbang dang mngon shes so sor rig pa dang/ /gzungs
97b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rtogs nas/ /nam mkha' i mdza' klas gyur pa'i sems can rnams/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs bgrod par shog/ ting 'dzin mang pos gdul bya'i rgyud mkhyen nas/ /thams cad 'dun na sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs nam mkha' khyab
97b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos bstan pas/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing sogs bgrod par shog /bde gshegs spyan sngar gnas gsum mkha' 'gro yis/ /dam bcas bsrung zhing dngos grub mchog rtsol ba'i/ /thugs dam bzhin du rtag bsrung dngos grub ni/ /rnam gsum tshe 'di nyid la stsol par
97b7(rgyud 'grel): shog/ 'chi tshe mgon dang dpa' bo mchogs kyis/ /me tog rgyal mtshan gdugs sogs thogs nas kyang/ /rol mo glu dang sgra snyan tshogs mchod nas/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khrid par shog /sgang cig de la snang ba gsum thob nas/ /gsal dang rtags snang rang gi
98a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs rtogs te/ /dur khrod la sogs rgyal nyid sa thob nas/ /tshan do la sogs sa la bgrod par shog/ shin tu rnam par dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas rnam par grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag po yi/ /sras kyi
98a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po nyid du bdag gyur cig /sa gsum mthar phyin gsum phrag gsum gnas gyur/ /shes brgyad gyur pas ye shes lngar gyur te/ /ye shes chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i/ /chos sku byang chub snying po thob par shog /chos dbyings las byung nam mkha' i mtshan
98a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'dra/ /thog ma dang ni tha ma med pa'i bdag /sems dpa' rdo rje thugs kyi bdag po ru/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bdag gyur cig /dngos grub ma lus pa ni kun gyi bdag/ dbang phyug chen po lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /stug po'i rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyis brgyal//
98a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur dam pa nyid du bdag gyur cig/ /nyon mongs rnam dag ye shes sku brnyes pas/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes su rab chags la /'dod chags me kun rang bzhin rnam dag nas/ /gsung gi dbang phyug nyid du bdag gyur cig/ nga rgyal rnam dag mnyam nyid lhun gyis
98a5(rgyud 'grel): phrug/ yon tan yid bzhin brgya tshan mkhar 'dra bas/ /gdul bya rdzogs sangs nyid du re skor ba/ /bya ba bdag rdo rje nyi mar bdag gyur cig /phrag dog dag pas bya ba grub brnyes shing/ /phrin las rgya mtshos gdul bya dpag med rnams/ /grub mchog phyag rgya che la 'god
98a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i/ /bde gshegs gdon mi za bar bdag gyur cig/ dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo'i skur grub nas/ /nam mkha' dag dang mnyam pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /'khor 'das ma lus 'dren pa'i dpal du shog
98a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags rgyas pa slob dpon b+hu ri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dza bo rje dang lots+tsha ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur pa'o// //dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen pa'i
98b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dang/ sta gon gyi cho ga dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang/ dbang bskur pa'i cho ga dang bzhi'o/ /bsnyen pa la dang po skabs dang dbyer ni/ /slob ma dad pa dang shes rab dang ldan pas maN+Dal byas te/ phyag gsum byas la me tog lan gsum dbul/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas la btsugs te
98b2(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon gyis bdag la bde mchog 'khor lo mngon par 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba stsal du gsol zhes lan gsum zhu/ 'o na bdag gis bsnyen pa bya yis/ /khyod kyis rdzas sogs shig ces gnang ba byin la/ /khro
98b3(rgyud 'grel): po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i sngags su byin la srod tho rangs rgya rtsa zlos su gzhug go /de nas bdag nyid lU yi pa'i rnal 'byor ram/ dpa' bo gcig pa bsgom pa 'am/ mngal skyes kyi yang rung bas rdo rje dang do li yi bzlas pa bya/ thun bzhi'i rnal
98b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis spyir rtsa sngags 'bum phrag gcig gam/ yang na yab yum gyi snying po 'am nye snying gang yang rung ba 'bum/ 'khor gyi lha la khri khri sum b+ha ni 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa ni grangs kyi bsnyen pa'o/ /yang na mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rmi lam du lha ma dbang?
98b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur la rag ces gnang ba 'am brdas kyang rung ngo/ /dbang med na bzlas pa dum gcig byas la yid kyis lha mngon du dmigs te gnang bar bsams la byar rung ni bdag po'i bkas so/ /de'i tshe mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma re mchag par btang par bya'o/ /de nas bskul pa'i
98b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir slob mas maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas snga ma ltar zhu ba yang bya'o/ /rdzas tshogs sam mtshogs zhes dri'o/ /kha cig ni tshogs la kha cig ni mtshogs zhes shu'o/ /de nas sdig pa bsal ba dang bsrung bar bya ba ni slob ma'i lte bar nyi ma la hUM sngon po bsams la yang de'i snying
98b7(rgyud 'grel): gar sdig pa kaM nag po las sha za'i gzugs ring pa rkang lag phra ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa bsams la hUM gis 'od kyis gyen du bul te/ sna bug g.yas nas byung ba dang/ hUM de sgo mtshams kyi lha mo brgyad du gyur nas/ de rnams kyis gri gug gis bgos
99a1(rgyud 'grel): nas zos te/ yar hUM du song nas sna bug de nyid nas slar thim par bsam/ gsung ba ni lag pa g.yon par hA byas pas/ /rdo rje rgyu phra mi bsams la de slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag nas lus rdo rjer song bar bsams/ suM b+ha ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
99a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje rgya tham yang de'i spyi bor gnas par bsam/ de nas de dag skad cig mas phyag gnyis pa'i he ru kar bsams la mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa byas te/ mdun du slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pas maN+Dal byed pa sngon du 'gro bas phyag byed bcug la
99a3(rgyud 'grel): thal mo bskyed par bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ byang chub mchog gi sems ni bdag gis bskyed/ /sems can thams
99a4(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par yis/ /'gro la phan phyir/ sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas snying ga dang/ lkog ma dang spyi bor dri'i thig le gsum byas la rdo rje reg pa sngon du 'gro
99a5(rgyud 'grel): pas hUM A:aoM zhes brjod cing rim pa bzhin du pad+ma dang 'khor lo dag la yi ge gsum po de nyid rim pa bzhin du mtshan pa/ /'og ma gnyis nya ma la/ /'khor lo la zla ba bsam par bya/ /de nas oM pu dza o a zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas yul
99a6(rgyud 'grel): nyer bzhir lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gi reg bzhin du yul de dang de'i gnas rnams su mos par bya'o/ /de nas skyes pa la ni snying ga la sogs par oM ha la sogs pa bsam zhing bud med la ni lte ba la sogs par oM baM la sogs pas byin gyis brlag
99a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas de dag la mchod pa bya ste/ me tog ni mgo bo la'o/ /spos ni shangs la'o/ /mar me ni spyan la'o/ /dri ni thugs kar ro/ /zhal zas ni zhal du dmigs te'o/ /de yang oM A:badzra puShpe hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/ /de nas tshems
99b1(rgyud 'grel): shing dor bar bya ste/ mdun du ba lang gi ko ba dus gzhi ba'i lci bsang? pas byugs la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa khyams gru? bzhi'i nang du chung pa bris pa la me tog gi tshom bu dgu bkod nas/ der slob ma shar ram byang du kha lta bas tshems shing ma yo ba mags pa
99b2(rgyud 'grel): lo 'dab kyi la kha brgyan pa can/ tsan dan gyis byugs pa la/ me tog gi phreng ba bcings la/ oM badzra danda kaShpa? bi ma la'i shud+d+he swAhA zhes bya bas gtang ba/ cho ga bzhin bcas na/ thal mo'i bar nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dod du gzhug go /'dir tshems
99b3(rgyud 'grel): shing gi mtshan ma brtag par bya ste/ shar du bltas na zha ba'i dngos grub ngo?/ /byang du bltas na rgyas pa'o/ /nub du bltas na dbang ngo/ /lhor bltas na mngon spyod do/ /gyen du bltas na rig pa 'dzin pa lha'i dngos grub po/ /thur du bltas na 'og gi dngos grub
99b4(rgyud 'grel): bo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu song na dngos grub med do zhes brtag par bya'o/ /de nas dag dag pa'i don du bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba'i dri'i chu la 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma bzlas te/ de nas oM h+rI:? bi shud+ha d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA paM ni tsa a syA bi sho d+ha ya sarba bi kalpa? a
99b5(rgyud 'grel): phan ya hUM zhes brjod pas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i khyor bar lan gsum blud par bya'o /de nas yi ge nyer gnyis pa'i sngags lan gsum zlas pa'i su sha sngas dang stan gyi phyir phyin la/ rang rang gi mi gad dang lag chad kyi skud pa sum sgril? byas pa gsum pa/
99b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis mdud pa byas te snying po'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la dbung bar gi cing bar bya'o/ /de nas chos bshad pas spro ba skyed par bya ste/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum+ba ri'i me tog bzhin/ /bsgyal ma na ? res 'ga' zhag /'byung 'gyur
99b7(rgyud 'grel): yang ni mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ gang gis mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya nga mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal ba bye ba du mar ni/ /sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba//
100a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas kyang de byang 'gyur na/ grags pa mdza' yas gsang sngags kyi/ /tshul la spyod pa smos ci dgos/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu dri med
100a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad/ /gang gis khyed rnams sras bcas pa'i/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan 'di la/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /theg pa chen po tshar
100a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /gang gis khyed rnams 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba dag gis dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa byas nas/ sum b+ha nis bsrung ba byas te/ tho rangs kyi mi lam ci mthong
100a4(rgyud 'grel): ba kho bo bzlos shig byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i mthar seng ge'i nyal thabs kyis nyal du gzhug po/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs te/ bsrung ba'i don du sum b+ha ni bzlas par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni slob ma sta gon du gnas pa'i
100a5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o// //de nas bum pa sta gon du gnas pa brjod par bya ste/ re zhig bum pa bcu 'am drug gam gnyis sam gcig kyang rung ste/ rtsa ba dang nag po la sogs pa'i skyon med pa/ gser ram dngul lam kham pa la sogs pa'i
100a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu las byas pa/ kha dog dkar por bsgyur ba rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa/ 'o ma can gyi shing gis kha brgyan pa/ rigs kyi sku mdag mthun pa'i gos kyis mgul pa dkris pa/ bsti gnas kyi chu 'o ma can gyis gang ba/ tsan dan dang ga
100a7(rgyud 'grel): bur dang/ gur gum dang/ gla rtsi dang hu lu ka ste dri lnga dang bas pa/ bdud rtsi lnga dang rin po che lnga dang/ 'bru lnga dang sman lngas gang ba'i snod steng du bzhag ste/ 'og tu pad+ma'i gdan steng du gdugs phub la/ dkyil 'khor du rim pa bzhin
100b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma re re bzlas te bzhag la lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /re zhig bum pa bcu'i lugs la ni/ rnam par rgyal ba la gcig /pad+ma'i snod bzhi dang bcas pa'i yum bzhi la re re/ thugs dang gsung dang sku dang/ dam tshig gi 'khor lo
100b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la re re ste/ de ltar na dgu'o/ /las thams cad pa dang bcu'o/ /drug gi lugs la 'khor lo lnga la re re rnam par rgyal ba dang drug go /las thams cad pa dam tshig gi 'khor bsdu'o/ /gnyis pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas so/ /las thams
100b3(rgyud 'grel): cad pa ni gtso bo la bsdu'o/ /gcig gi lugs la ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha ma lus pa gcig tu bsdu zhing las thams cad pa yang der bsdus te/ de ni khyim pa dbang bskur ba la yin gyi/ dge tshul yan chad lam yin no/ /gcig gis ma yin par rgyud las bkag
100b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /rtsa ba ni dbyibs kyi skyon no/ /nag po ni kha dog gi skyon te de dag med pa'o/ /ched kyang mchur sor nyer gcig /zheng du bcu drug/ gce'u med pa'o mgrin pa la sogs drug go /mchu la sor brgyad do/ /mgrin pa'i sgrubs la song gnyis so/ /mngon
100b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa sogs pa'i phrin las gzhan la ni tshang gzhan dang gzhan du brjod do/ /dkar por bsgyur ba ni rang bzhin gyis kha dog dkar po med pa la'o/ /rigs kyi mtshan na rnam par rgyal ba la ni chos 'byung gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lha
100b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ka pA la'i nang du chud pa'i rdo rje dang rdo rje gri gug go /rigs kyi yum bzhi la ni gri gug dad ka pA la'o/ thugs kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje dang gri gug go /gsung gi 'khor lo la pad+ma dang gri gug go /sku'i 'khor lo la 'khor lo dang gri gug go /dam tshig gi 'khor
100b7(rgyud 'grel): lo la ka pA la dang gri gug go /las thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang gri gug go /o ma can gyi shing ni tsU ta la sogs pa'o/ /rin po che sna lnga ni gser dang dngul dang mu men dang mu tig dang byi ru'o/ /nas dang gro dang til dang 'bras so ba dang ma sha ste 'bru 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga'o/ khri he sti dang kaN+Da ka ri dang a pa rA dzi ta dang/ daN Do ha pa la dang/ ha sa de ba ste sman lnga'o/ /pad+ma dang gdugs ni shog bu la byas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor ni ser po 'ba' zhig las byas pa'o/ /de yang lha dang phyag mtshan med pa'i gdan dang gzhal yas
101a2(rgyud 'grel): khang pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig gi bra'o/ /gal te nus pa med na sngar gyi tshams shing dor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa lta bu bya'o/ /de nas bum pa lhag par gnas par bya ste/ me tog la soD pa mchod pa'i yo byang sna tshogs pa dang/ gtor ma rnams sta gon
101a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ slob dpon bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms la dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdus te/ phyag gnyis pa'i ting 'dzin gyis gnas par bya'o/ /de nas skad cig mas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rin dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs par bsam mo//
101a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi yum bzhi la ni yum re dang ka pA la re re'o/ /thugs dang gsung dang sku dang dam tshig gi 'khor lo'o/ /de nas 'bar ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mdun du spyan drangs te bum pa'i lha
101a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bstim mo/ /de dag ma lus par zhu ba las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsam mo/ /de nas bum pa'i gnas lnga dag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyas reg cing/ oM badzra pad+ma a mreM ta su bi shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA wa sarba d+harmA na su bi shud+d+ha d+hamrA d+hA tu sarba na ku ru ku ru
101a6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi phreng ba dang 'brel ba'i rdo rje bum pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ lag pa g.yas pas bgrang phreng snying gar bzung nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo li ni brgya bzlas zhing/
101a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha rnams la ni nyer gcig bzla'o/ /las thams cad dpal ni suM b+ha ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyi'i mchod pa lnga dang yid las byung ba'i lha mo bcu drug dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyis kyang mchod de spos snod dang/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i lag pas/
101b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo sgyur/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga dang ldan/ /'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha' gro ma/ /rtog pa'i 'ching bag cing mdzad cing/ /'jig rten don du rab 'jug pa/ /de snyed pa la rtag phyag
101b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /zhes bya bas bstod la/ yi ge brgya pa brjod de/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas dpa' bo'i dga' ston dang/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// /de nas
101b3(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya zhing ras ris la ni dkyil 'khor mngon du dmigs te/ bdag 'jug byas nas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la phyogs bzhir slob dpon bzhi 'am bdag gcig bu yang rung ste/ bdud rtsi lnga dang
101b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i dri chus khrus byas nas/ /gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi chas su zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs nas kha byang du bltas te/ stan 'thon po la 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas yang snga ma ltar ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms te/ phyag
101b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas go rims bzhin du dbang bdun dang/ dbang gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las blang bar bya'o/ /de ni bdag 'jug pa'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug pa ni/ yol ba'i phyi
101b6(rgyud 'grel): rol du maN+Dal byed du bcug la phyag gsum byas te/ me tog snyim par bzung nas gnas pa la slob dpon gyis nang nas kastwaM b+ho zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bde chen bdag ni bskal pa bzang zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i lan no/ /de ltar lan gsum bya'o/ /dgos
101b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ci'i phyir 'jug /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi phyir ro/ /zhes slob ma'i lan no/ /de nas dung chos spyi bor bzhag ste/ khyor par chu lan gsum blud la/ sum b+ha ni bzlas pa'i ku sha'i chus bsang ba bya'o/ /de nas dbab pa'i cho ga bya ste mtsham chen bdud rtsi lnga
102a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ dur khrod ngas la byugS nas ni/ /bsdus pa'i phye ma cha gcig dang/ /byi la nag po'i bshad ba ni/ /de mnyam cha ni gcig tu bya/ /de rnams gu gul nag por sbyar/ /dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni/ /mchod yon snod du bdug pa sbyar//
102a2(rgyud 'grel): sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ /slob ma'i lus la rab bkod de/ /de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug par bsam/ /slob ma'i lag nas bzung nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma//
102a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas par bya/ /de la sku babs na ni 'phar ba la sogs pa lus kyi rdzu 'phrul 'byung ngo/ /gsung babs na ni dbang pos mi sod pa'i don rnams smra bar 'gyur ro/ /thugs babS ni na mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung
102a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo/ /ye shes babs na ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbab pa bsdus la/ lag pa spyi bor bzhag ste/ snying po'i sngags de nyid lan bdun bzlas pas bsrung ba bya'o/ /de nas go bskon bar bya'o/ /de na suM b+ha ni bzlas pa'i chus
102a5(rgyud 'grel): dbangs? pa'i sna tshogs pa'i mdog gam kha dog ser po'i dar ras kyis gdong g.yogs bcings la stod g.yogs dang smad g.yags kyang sbyin no/ /de la gdong g.yogs bcing ba'i sngags ni/ oM dwa da sha aM ga ni rod+ha ka ri Ni hUM phaT/ /de nas brtul zhugs dbog par bya ste/ 'gro ba
102a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrod pa rnams kyi brtul zhugs spyin bya de dag ni/ srog gcod mi bden gzhan nor gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin chad gi btung ba spongs/ /'khor bar rdo rje zhags pas rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag yin/ /gang dag gang gi dus byung sum nu mi
102a7(rgyud 'grel): yi bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab tu sbyin bya ste/ snogs tshogs gtso bo srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms mdzad bka' 'di khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang bar bya/ /cho lo kha na mtho'i zas dang brjod ngan 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos/ /ba lang bud med skyes rnams de yi bla ma lnga po
102b1(rgyud 'grel): la yang gnod mi bya/ /snying grogs la 'khu rje dpon de bzhin sum cu mi yi bla ma yid ches dge 'dun la'ang/ /dbang po rnams kyi chags pa zhes byas yi bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga yis/ /de ltar brtul zhugs phog nas/ de nyid gsum lan
102b2(rgyud 'grel): bdun bzlas pa'i me tog gcig lag pa'i pad+ma'i dbus su gtad la sh+rI he ru ka ya padmi he bidyA rA dzA ya d+hi ma he swAhA zhes bya bas nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis lag pa nas bkri zhing/ las kyi rdo rje phyi bzhin 'brang bas dkyil 'khor lan
102b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum skor ba byas te/ dang por rigs des par bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo nas/ slob dpon gyi bden pa bdar ba sngon du song bas me tog 'dor du gzhug go /de las bden pa bdar ba'i tshig ni/ don dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal
102b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor zhes bya ba/ /srid pa'i nyon mongs gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /srid pa'i nyes brgyad bskyod pa'i nyon mongs choms mdzod la/ /rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po'i de nyid grub pa mdzad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
102b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ 'di yi dngos grub cir gyur dang/ /rigs gang la ni sgal ldan dang/ /bsod nams ci 'dra las byung ba/ /de 'dra dkyil
102b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'di ru shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ku la bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ zhes brjod la hUM zhes brjod pas lag pa'i bar nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog 'dor du gzhug go /de nas oM de pain+d+ri? ya ud+ga TA ya swAhA/ zhes bya bas gdong g.yogs
102b7(rgyud 'grel): bkrol la dkyil 'khor dang lha'i de nyid dang me tog lhang?  ba'i gnas dang/ rigs rnams bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du bskor bas/ byang phyogs kyi sgor khyer te/ bum pa gzhan gyi dung tshos las rnam par rgyal ba'i dung chos su me tog 'dor du
103a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go /nyung zad nyung zad blugs la lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo dang srin lag gis skyes pa'i gnas lnga dag tu dung chos kyi chus sngags 'di dag gis bsangs la/ de nas ku sha'i chus khams lnga dag par bya ba'i phyir lan
103a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum du chu'i dbang bskur bar bya'o /de la sngags ni oM A a'i rI a'u lI pany+tsa skrand+ha? bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ de nas sngar bzhin gnas lnga dag tu oM a i ri u li pany+tsa ta thA ga ta bi shud d+ha swAhA zhes bya bas bsangs la/ ri mor bris pa'am 'dur
103a3(rgyud 'grel): du bskos pa'am gos kyi yang rung ste/ rgyal ba'i rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi cing? pan bskon par bya'o/ /'dis ni phung lo lnga dag pa yin la de ltar byang phyogs sku yi sa bzhir chu cod pan gnyis kyis lus dag par byed pa'i dbang yin no/ /de nas
103a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du bskor bas lho'i sgor khyer te/ shes rab pha rol phyin ma dag par bya ba'i phyir sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu dung chos kyi chus oM a A i ha hA ha:ho phreM da sha pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis bsangs la
103a5(rgyud 'grel): bser dam dngul lam dang la sogs pa yang rung ste/ dar dpyangs bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas nyi zla dag par bya ba'i phyir sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu oM sU rya tsan+d+ra bi sho d+ha ka swAhA zhes bya bas bsangs la rdo rje dril bu snying gar lan gsum
103a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnol ba mngon du 'gro bas spyi bor bzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar lho phyogs gsung gis gzhir ngag dag pa'i dbang rnam pa gnyis/ /de nas thugs rdo rje dag par bya ba'i phyir shar sgor khyer te yul dang dbang po dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sngar
103a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu oM a A e i ar Ar o aau/ /a la A la bi Sh+yen+d+ri? ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ zhes bya bas bsangs la/ spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang rna ba dang dpung pa dang lag pa dang skra rags dang/ rkang pa dag
103b1(rgyud 'grel): tu me tog gi phreng ba bcu bcings la/ lag par rdo rje'i sor gdub gtad pa ni rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang ngo/ /de nas nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dag par bya ba'i phyir snga bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu oM ha hA ya lA ra rA wa wA la lA tsa tur prahma pi h+Shipa?
103b2(rgyud 'grel): shut+te swAhA zhes bya bas bsangs la sngar gyi me tog lhung ba blangs la spyi bor bzhag ste/ me tog gar babs pa'i rigs dang mthun pa'i ming gis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de ltar brtul zhugs dang ming shar phyogs thugs kyis gzhir sbyin no/ de
103b3(rgyud 'grel): nas nub sgo ye shes sa gzhir khyer te ye shes dag par bya ba'i phyir sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu oM k+Sha d+harma tsakra pra barta ka swAhA/ zhes bya bas bsangs la rdo rje bril bu lag tu gtad de/ rnam par dag pa'i lam ston pa'i phyir rjes su gnang
103b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas phyi'i ngag dag pa sngon du song bas bum pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang khyim pa'i phyogs dang rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la ri pa bzhin du 'am tshig gis brda sprad par bya'o/ /dbang bdun gyi rjes la
103b5(rgyud 'grel): 'am skabs 'dir yang rung ste/ rigs drug gi dam tshig dang rtsa ba'i ltung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig dbog par bya'o/ /de ltar na rang don gyi dbang rnam pa bcu ste 'jig rten pa'i dbang ngo/ /'jig rten las 'das pa tha snyad pa dang/
103b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid pa'i dbye bas gnyis te/ tha snyad pa ni khyab bdag rnam pa gsum gyi dbang yin la/ mtshan nyid pa ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i ye shes nang gi byang chub kyi shing dru? hu? thob pa gang yin pa ste/ rgyas par ni bla ma'i man ngag
103b7(rgyud 'grel): las shes par bya'i/ /gang phyir dbang gi don la ni/ chen po rnams sbyar te stog 'dzin pa rnams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /kha cig gsang sngags grub don du/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par byed/ bsod nams
104a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa de las gzhan/ /gzhan dag 'jig rten gzhan don gnyer/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer bar/ /dad? pa mang du byed pa yis/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi/ /tshe 'di
104a2(rgyud 'grel): don du gnyer mi bya/ /tshe 'di don du gnyer ba la/ /'jig rten pha rol don mi 'byung/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer mis/ /tshe 'dir yang ni 'bras bu rgyas/ /zhes bya bas 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir min gyi/ 'jig
104a3(rgyud 'grel): rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir bsam pa brtan po la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'khor ba'i dgra las rnam rgyal ba/ /dpa' chen khyed bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan
104a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ mgon po chen po bdag 'tsha'o/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar
104a5(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni 'jug tu gsol/ /zhes lan gsum bzlas/ /zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid skad cig mas rang gnang gi rig ma dang/ gnas lngar byin
104a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs pa byas nas/ slob ma rnams zhal nas gzhug pa'i sbyor bas/ thig le'i rnam par zhu ba dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i mthar yum gyi lhums su spros la/ grangs ji snyed pa nge snyed kyi hUM gi rnam par bsams la
104a7(rgyud 'grel): de dag yongs su gyur pa las/ phyag gnyis pa'i he ru kar bsams to de nas de dag rdo rje'i lam nas drangs te thugs kha nas phyung la/ mdun du rang la mngon par phyogs par sna tshogs par ma'i gang na re re la 'khod do par bsam mo// /de
104b1(rgyud 'grel): nas de dag la mchod pa lngas mchod la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po la/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsangs sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /
104b2(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /de dag gis kyang gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad khyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba gtam? med de//
104b3(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa dpal ldan he ru kas/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzang pa'i/ /dpung tshan dag kyang des bcom ste/ /'jig rten 'jug pa yongs mkhyen nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yi
104b4(rgyud 'grel): blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /de nas sems kyang rmongs pa'i phyir/ /dam pa'i man ngag la brten nas/ /dbang gi de nyid gsal bar bya/ /dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas dang/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
104b5(rgyud 'grel): gur dang ni/ /de bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang/ /bde mchog la brten lung gi rkyen/ /grong khyer suM b+ha ri'i rgyal bo'i sras/ /dpal 'jigs byed lha'i zhal snga nas bstan pa/ rgyal po seng ge gdan gyi rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi dbang bskur ba'i rab
104b6(rgyud 'grel): tu bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid kyi spyan sngar/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /log par dang pa'i skye bo rnams/ /lam
104b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir dbang pa ma yin no/ /de phyir dbang bskur dam pa 'di/ /bla ma rje yi bdag la gnang/ /phyi robs gdul bya skal ldan mis/ /bla ma dam pa rtag bsten pas/ /bla ma 'di rim gyis bgrod byas te/ /mi 'gyur ye shes mchog thob shog//
105a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi She ka bid+hi kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang gi bya ba bri par bya'o/ /dang po slob mas lan gnyis lan gsum
105a2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol ba gdab pa dang/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la dbang gi yo byad thams cad 'byor ba yod dam zhes bri'o/ /bdag la thams cad yang dag par yod do zhes pa de la/ ji ltar de'i las kyi sgrib pa dang ldan pa de slob dpon gyis rab tu 'joms pa'i don
105a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de'i snying gar kaM gi yi ge zhu ba las/ las kyi sgrib pa'i rang bzhin gdug pa can ma lus pa rnam par bsam mo/ /de bzhin du de'i lte ba'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhu ba las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag gnyis pa kha dog nag po/ /mche ba gtsigs
105a4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhal gcig pa bsgoms te/ /g.yas dang g.yon na rdo rje dang zhags pa bsnams pa'i khro bo/ /de nas yang na mche ba dang g.yon sdigs mdzub can/ bdag nyid kyis rdo rje gsor ba las song nas de'i snying gar rang gis byas pa'i las kyis sgrib pa zhu ba rnam par
105a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams pa la rdo rje bsnun pa la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis kyang bsnun te/ oM bi dzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da pA paM ya sya hUM phaT swAhA/ /sngags 'dis thal ba lta bur gyur par rnam par bsams pas sdig pa 'byad do/ /de la bsrang ba bya ste/ gnod mdzes kyi sngags sam
105a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsis khyil ba'i sngags kyis lag pa g.yas pa la skud pa bcing ngo/ /de bzhin du spyi bo mgrin pa snying gar yi ge gsum bri ba 'am bsgom par bya'o/ /lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /yongs su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa 'di'i sngon du
105a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad song ba ste/ bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang/ lha lhag par gnas pa dang/ dkyil 'khor ba de'i sgrub pa mngon du byas pa'o/ /de nas ku sha gnyis bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa byin la/ slob ma seng+ge'i nyal thags
105b1(rgyud 'grel): su stan dang sdas su bya'o/ /nub gnyis pa la rmi lam yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /bzang ngan mthong ba dang/ zhi ba'i bgegs bskrad pa dang/ sbyin sreg de nas bya'o/ /de'i sngon dkyil 'khor bri ba dang bsgrub pa dang/ mchod pa chen po dang gtor ma byin nas nam phyed lus
105b2(rgyud 'grel): pa na slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i phyi rol tu bzhag la/ me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa slob dpon gyi gsung gis gdong g.yogs bcing ngo/ /khyod gang la dga' ba yin ces pa dang/ skal ba bzang po bdag bde ba chen po la dga' lags so zhes so/ /de nas slob ma'i lag
105b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nas bzung la dkyil 'khor gyi sar khrid la sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM sh+ri he ru ka padmi he bi dyA rA dza ya d+hi ma he tan+tu wI ri pra tso ta ya swAhA/ 'di ni slob ma gzhug pa'o/ /slob ma de lho phyogs kyi sgo ru bzhag la phyag gsum btsal lo/ /gsang sngags 'das oM na ma ste
105b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ na mA mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swAhA/ de nas shar phyogs sgor thal mo sbyar te lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o/ /sngags 'dis dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma mchod pa'i bdag nyid can du bya'o/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi rya At+mA DA ki ni yetSh+Thi mAM i de/ thal mo snying gar
105b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te byang gi sgor phyag bya ba gong ma bzhin no/ /sngags 'dis rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba'i bdag nyid can du bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi ra yo gI nI at+ma na taM lA ma a b+hi Sheny+tsa tu mAM/ de nas thal mo sbyar la oM rnal 'byor
105b6(rgyud 'grel): ma thams cad mchod pa'i bdag nyid can du bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gI ni at+ma khaN+Da ro ha sya pra barta ya to ma ma i de des nub kyi sgor ro/ /de nas lho phyogs kyi sgor rthal mo yan lag thams cad la bskor zhing oM dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma
105b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bdag nyid can du bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gI nI At+ma rU pi Ni karma kra ro to mAM yi te/ rab tu btud pa'i phyag bzhi bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi snang ba brtag par bya ste/ mig la 
106a1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba drang bar bya'o/ /de nas snang ba rjes su 'jug pa'i las gar grub pa bstan par bya'o/ /de nas sor bcu gnyis ba'i rtse mo la me tog can rma med pa ma gas pa drang po mya ngan med pa la sogs pa'i so shing slob mas bza' zhing shar du bltas
106a2(rgyud 'grel): te maN+Dal pags pa'i tshad las ma rtogs pa dor bar bya'o/ /byang du bltas na zhi ba'o/ /shar du bltas na rgyas pa'o/ /lhor bltas na mngon spyod de/ /nub tu bltas na dbang du bya ba'o/ /steng du bltas na rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub po/ /maN+Dal gyi phyi rol lhung na dngos
106a3(rgyud 'grel): grub chung pa'o/ /so shing sbyin pa'o/ /dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa brjod par bya'o/ /he ru ka dpal bu khyod kyi/ /snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras 'gyur na/ /de ma thag tu dral nas 'gro/ des na 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed//
106a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub ces pas sbyin no/ /der 'dir gang zhig kha cig rdo rje'i chus/ /thams cad byed pa rang nyid ma byed cig/ ma bskyangs gyur na dmyal bar lhung 'di'o/ /sngags ni oM badzra a mri ta u da ka Tha hUM zhes pas
106a5(rgyud 'grel): khyor bar 'thung du gzhug go /ji ltar khyod dam tshig dang sdem pa la sogs pa 'di rtogs nas 'dzin par 'dod pa de ltar gzung ba de la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ ye shes des khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par byed do//
106a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos ces bstan nas mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du me tog gi phreng ba dor bas gang zhig la me tog phog pas de dag gi rigs te ming gi dbang bskur ba'i don no/ /de nas mig g.yogs dgrol ba'i sngags 'dis so/ /sh+rI he ru ka raM ye
106a7(rgyud 'grel): tirya tsak+Sho ro dud+g+ha Tan tatpa ra ud+g+haT ya te sarba ak+Sho badzra tsak+Shu u ta ri/ de bzhin du sngags ni oM badzra ne tra ya ha ra ha ra pa Ta laM h+ri/ 'di brjod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'di khyod mthong ba yis/ /rigs kyis skye ba'i rnal 'byor la/ /shin tu dad par khyod kyis byos/ /sngags
106b1(rgyud 'grel): dad phyag rgyas byin brlabs nas/ /de kho na nyid dbang bskur don/ /slob ma rje btsun byed rnams la/ /slob dpon khyed kyis bdag bzung ba/ /khyed kyi bstan pa dga' ba che/ /mgon po chen po bdag gi ni/ /'dod pa byang chub chen po ni/ /theg pa mi phyed ngo bo yis/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la
106b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsel/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyi/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /des ni 'di dag gis gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis de
106b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i dam tshig sbyin no/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa'i ngo bo mi byed pa/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /blo chen khyod kyis bzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems gang
