127b3(rgyud 'grel): spro pa lha mo phag mo ste/ /zhal gyi grwa yi phyogs nas khrag 'dzags pas/ /yan lag kun la byugs pas mdzes pa dang/ /mgo bo thod dang mgo yi phreng ba dang/ /gcer bu mi yi rus pas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas pa'i byin pas bdag
127b4(rgyud 'grel): po yi/ /g.yon pa'i brla ni yongs su 'khyud/ /'khor lo kun bdag sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams sems dpa' ma/ /rtag tu khros pa phag gdong du/ /bdag gis brtag nas bshad pa'o/ /yang na bud med lta bu'i zhal/ /
127b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i gtso mo bsgom par bya/ /yang na de ni du ba'i mdog /dga' kun mtshan nyid gcig pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi/ /rdo rje phag mo bsgom par bya/ /'khor lo'i dbus rtag lha mo ni/ /gang zhig bskyod pa'i sbyor
127b6(rgyud 'grel): bas gnas/ /rdo rje phag gdong gtso mo ni/ /skyes pa lta bur byed pas gsungs/ /rdo rje phag mo lha mo che/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam ldan pa/ /gtso bo'i gzugs kyis bsgom bya ba/ /bde mchog don du rnam par
127b7(rgyud 'grel): shes/ /stag gis pags pa'i gos dang ldan/ /spyan gsum rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /sil sil zer ba'i sgra yis ni/ /brla gnyis mnyam par khyab pa'o/ /'bar ba'i phreng khyab 'jigs pa'o/ /'jigs byed chen
128a1(rgyud 'grel): po 'jigs par byed/ /lhan cig skyes rol dur khrod de/ /lhan cig skyes dga' he ru ka/ /chags byas 'khyud pa yang dag ldan/ /'o byed pas ni rtag tu gnas/ /bskyod pa chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo'i
128a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i khros pa ste/ /spyan gsum zhal ni lha ru gzigs/ /mche ba bzhi yis myu gus brgyan/ /dam pa'i don du rab tu grags/ /g.yas pa'i phyag nas gsum las rgyal sna tshogs
128a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsor bas 'jigs/ /g.yon na dngos grub zla ba ltar dkar snod ni khrag gis bkang ba bsnams/ /phyag gnyis gtso la 'khyud pas lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ldan rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /ban du ltar dmar 'od tshogs mang po
128a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i rdo rje lha mo bsam/ mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang/ /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /dga' dang bde bas mgu ba yi/ /rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /sngon po ljang gu dmar po'i sku/ /ser po 'od nyid rnal
128a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma/ /phyogs bzhir pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /lhan cig skyes dga' shin tu mdzes/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi po/ /phyi dang nang na yang dag bzhugs/ /chu dang rlung dang me chen po/ /sa yi rnam pa'i dngos por byung/ /
128a6(rgyud 'grel): byams ? pa smon lam mA ma ki /btang snyoms ye shes sgrol ma ste/ /gos dkar mo ni stobs su gsungs/ /phyag rgya mngon byung byed pa mo/ /btang snyoms spyan mar grags pa ste/ /snying rje dang ni mnyam ldan na/ /mkha' 
128a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma sogs rnam dag pa/ /bla ma'i rim las 'ongs pas bstan/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs gzugs bzang ro yis stan byas phyag na pad+ma kha TwAM ga /g.yas pa'i phyag na gri gug dang ni Da ma ru ldan bsnams shing skra grol
128b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa'o/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan cing mi mgo mchog gis thod can gcer bu gzugs can shin tu 'jigs/ /stan la g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing rnam 'gyur zhal mdzad hUM sgrogs dga' ba'i snying po'o/ /stag gi pags
128b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i na bza' dang/ /mi ro'i steng na legs par bzhugs/ /dngos grub kun ster bsam par bya/ /lho dang shar dang rgyab dang ni/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi cha ru ni/ /zhal bzhi zhal rnams nyid kyis no/ /'o byed par ni rnam par bsam/ /rgyal po
128b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni rgyal rigs nyid/ /ma dang pha dang mnyam ldan pa/ /rgyal rigs sogs bzhan blangs nas ni/ /thod pa rnams ni mtshams su bzhag /mchod pa bzhi po legs gsungs pa/ /gti mug chen po rnam dag pa/ /mchod pa'i don gyis 'khor
128b4(rgyud 'grel): lo yi/ /'khor lo bde mchog dpal las gsungs/ /rab gtu mthod pa'i dum bu ni/ /lho yi rtsibs la rnam par gnas/ /gtum mig ma dang yang dag ldan/ /keng rus chen po shar phyogs su/ /'od ldan ma dang legs sbyar ba/ /keng rus
128b5(rgyud 'grel): byang gi cha ru'o/ /sna chen ma dang yang dag ldan/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs byang du'o/ /dpa' bo bla ma yang dag ldan/ /chang la dpa' ba bden bral du/ /'od dpag med dang mi thung nyid/ /rlung gi phyogs su rtag tu bzhugs/ /rdo rje 'od ldan lha mo ni
128b6(rgyud 'grel): lang ka'i dbang phyug ma rtag tu/ /dbang ldan phyogs su legs par bzhugs/ /'di dag sems can kun don mdzad/ /me phyogs rdo rje lus dang ni/ /ljon grib ma dang yang dag ldan/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod du/ /bde mchog
128b7(rgyud 'grel): las ni 'di dag gsungs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol tu/ /rdo rje sngon po'i bren pas bskor/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug sngo/ /sangs rgyas tshogs 'phro yang dag ldan/ /sa bsrungs ma dang yang dag ldan/ /myu gu can ni lho ru
129a1(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /'jigs byed chen po dang lhan cig /rdo rje ral can shar du bzhugs/ /byang du 'jigs byed chen po dang/ /rlung gi shugs ma legs par bzhugs/ /nub tu rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/ /chang 'thung ma dang yang dag ldan/ /sngo
129a2(rgyud 'grel): bsangs lha mo legs sbyar ba/ /shin tu bzang po bden bral phyogs/ /rdo rje bzang dang shin tu bzang/ /lhan cig rlung gi phyogs su brten/ /dbang ldan phyogs kyi gnas su ni/ /rta dang shin tu 'jigs byed mdzes/ /me phyogs bya gdong ma dang ni/ /
129a3(rgyud 'grel): mig mi bzang dang yang dag ldan/ /sa spyod gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ /pad+ma'i phreng dang yang dag ldan/ /spro zhing bsdu bar byed pa po/ /rtag tu kha dog dmar por bsgom/ /lhor ni rtag tu stobs chen dang/ /'khor lo'i shugs mas mdzes
129a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dum skyes ma dang yang dag ldan/ /rin chen rdo rje shar du dgod/ /shauN+Di ni sbyor yang dag ldan/ /rta mgrin byang gi phyogs nyid na'o/ /nam mkha' i 'khor lo'i go cha ma/ /chu yi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /he ru ka dpal su bIr/ /rtag tu
129a5(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du bsgom bya/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ /stobs chen po ni rlung gi phyogs/ /'khor lo bsgyur dang gti mug cha/ /rtag tu dbang ldan du bsgom bya/ /rdo rje sems dang brtson chen mo/ /sku yi 'khor lor bsam par bya/ /phyi rol 
129a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor phreng dkar po'o/ /kha dog dkar por rnam par bsgom/ /'di ni sa 'og 'khor lo yi/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid gyur pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad phyag bzhi ste/ /g.yon na kha TwAM 'dzin pa'o/ /Da ma ru ni g.yas na 'dzin/ /ral
129a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bcings pas rnam par mdzes/ /spro zhing sdud pa'i gzugs can te/ /ro yi stan la legs par bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang yang dag ldan/ /rus pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang/ /lha mo
129b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud la mchog tu brtson/ /gcer bu'i gzugs can hUM zhes sgrogs/ /mgo yi phreng bas nye bar mdzes/ /lhan cig skyes dga' 'khor lor bcas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde
129b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces bya rnam par byung/ /rab gtum mo sogs lha mo de/ /zhal gcig gis ni mdzes pa'o/ /phyag gnyis dbu skra grol ba ste/ /gcer bu mi rus sogs pas brgyan/ /g.yon na khrag gi thod pa ste/ /g.yas na sdigs
129b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzub gri gug go /thams cad spyan gsum hUM sgrogs pa/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs su byung/ /rig ma'i rkeng par ske rags te/ /rab tu 'bad nas bsgom par bya/ /gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin can/ /gdug pa'i
129b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag gsol ba la dgyes/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo bzhi?/ /sngon du g.yon du bskor ba can/ /gang phyir 'gro kun g.yon las byung/ /des na bde mchog las ni gsungs/ /dkar po sngon po mnyam sbyor bas/ /nges par
129b5(rgyud 'grel): du ba lta bur gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni sngon por bstan/ /des na mdun du legs par bzhugs/ /khwa dang 'ug pa khyi yi gdong/ /phag gi gdong rnams de bzhin du/ /sngon po ljang gu de bzhin dmar/ /ser po'i 'od can
129b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo ru bzhugs/ /rtag tu bden bral mtshams su ni/ /gshin rje brtan ma mchog tu 'jigs/ /rlung phyogs rnam par dag bsgom pa/ /gshin rje pho nya mdzes pa'i zhal/ /dbang ldan gshin rje mche ba ma/ /g.yon pa'i sbyor bar gcig
129b7(rgyud 'grel): tu 'gro /shin tu rnam dag gshin rje 'joms/ /me yi gnas su rtag tu bsam/ /rim pa min dang rim pa yis/ /'di dag gshin tu grags pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rgyud la rim min pa/ /rnal 'byor ma las rim pa gsungs/ /lha mo'i gzugs ni
130a1(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid che/ /kha dog gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /mtshams kyi lha mo mchog 'di dag /'gro ba'i bgegs ni rnam 'dren pa/ /g.yon na kha TwAM pad+ma ste/ /g.yas na cang te'u gri gug go /'di dag sgo la sogs par
130a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /he ru ka 'khyud legs par bzhugs/ /pu dza o a go rA de mA kA o tri ko ka la kA hi pre gri sau su na si ma ku /mkhas pas mgo dang spyi gtsug sogs/ /pu la sogs pa byas bsam te/ /lhan cig skyes dags mdzes pa yi/ /'khor lo
130a3(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas spyan drang ste/ /rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta/ /gyen du pheM gi sgra sgrags shing/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams ma rnams dgug/ /mdzub mo mdang pa byas pa dang/ /gung mo sbyar bar byas nas kyang/ /mthe bo mnyam
130a4(rgyud 'grel): par ldan pa ni/ /dpral ba'i phyogs su gzung byas te/ /de ltar phyogs bskor rnal 'byor pas/ /mgu ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /lhag gnas rang gi 'khor lor bzhugs/ /rdo rje pad+ma mchag dags/ /yi ge dyA yis lte ba bskyed/ /yi ge byA las
130a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer byung/ /sngon du yan la gzhi bkod nas/ /phyis ni bde ba legs par sbyang/ /dang po'i dga' ba dpa' bo ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad lhan cig skyes dga' ste/ /legs par bde ba'i thabs su sbyor/ /mtho ris sa
130a6(rgyud 'grel): steng sogs 'jig rten/ /skad cig gis ni sku gcig gyur 'khor lo sdom las dga' kun gsungs/ /dpa' bo gnyis med yang dag ldan/ /lha rnams sems kyis rnam par snang/ /lhan cig skyes gnas 'khor lo'i dbus/ /snying rje che ldan rnal
130a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas/ /phyi nang bdag nyid mchod pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor khyab bdag legs par mchod/ /sbyin bdag la sogs ming migs pas/ /mdza' gsum sbyor bas legs par gnas/ /gang du mchod cing bstod pa der/ /rgyud rnams las ni mthong
130b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ 'di don legs par dpyad nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag nas dpa' po mchod/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchog gi rnal 'byor ma yis mgul nas 'khyud/ /sku la dpa' bo'i phreng ba legs par byas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /'khor lo la
130b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas bde mchog snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis rlabs/ /khyab bdag khyod kyis zhabs kyi pad+mar rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /ral pa la ni mi bskyod pas mdzes 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhi ru gyur cing dam pa'i don du
130b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'o/ /bdag gis bla ma'i blos gsungs pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa'i steng/ /de ni dbang bskur bar gsungs pa/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rim las 'ong/ /zur bzhi 'khor lo chen po ni/ /'dren pa rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad
130b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du/ /ral gri don yod grub pa'o/ /khwa sogs mchog gi lha mo rnams/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bsnams/ /lugs gzhan bskom par bya ba'am/ /brgyad po ro yi steng na bzhugs/ /khwa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ /gsungs pa ji
130b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de yi zhal/ /bdag gi bla ma'i rim las 'ongs/ /rgyu de yis ni bris pa yis/ /gzhan dag lha mo rnams kyi zhal/ /bud med gdong lta bu yin zer/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /lugs gnyis gang 'dod blang bar bya/ /keng
130b6(rgyud 'grel): rus chen po dang kong rus/ /rta mgrin dang ni glang sna ma/ /bya gdong ma dang rta sna sogs/ /gsungs pa ji bzhin 'di dag bsgom/ /sna tshogs sprul pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /dpa' bo la sogs rab tu grag /gsungs pa ji bzhin rnam
130b7(rgyud 'grel): rol par/ /dpal ldan bde mchog 'di dag bsgom/ /sngon du phung po byin brlabs nas/ /ji srid mchod dang bstod 'gyur ba/ /bskyed pa'i dang po'i sbyor ba ste/ /chung ngu'i sbyor bar mngon par brjod/ /ri rab la gnas sa bon rdzogs/ /dkyil 'khor la soD rnam
131a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa/ /blo yi dbye bas byas pa ni// shin tu sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/ /ye shes rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor pas rtag rnal 'byor cher/ /chen po zhes ni rab tu grags/ /rnal
131a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor lhag pa'i sbyor dbus su/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par gnas/ /chen po'i yang ni chen po ru/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor kun shes bya/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas gang/ /dpal ldan dpa' bo kun gyi gzhi/ /rang 'byung rnal
131a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor thams cad rig /dpal ldan smad 'tshong zhabs kyis ni/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs/ /de bas bla ma mnyes byas nas/ /rnal 'byor thams cad legs par brtsam/ /rgod pa dang ni du ba nyid/ /shin tu yid 'phrog pa yi gar/ /sna
131a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kun byed thams cad mkhyen/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyis mdzes/ 'di nyid las ni gang gsungs pa/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang/ /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi/ /byang chub phyogs dang go char bcas/ /go cha chen por yang dag ldan/ /thog
131a5(rgyud 'grel): mar 'di rnams rab tu bya/ /grub na yongs su spang ba dang/ /yi ge gsum gyi cho ga yis/ /grub na de la bkod bya ste/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin du/ sku gsung sbyor bas dag pa bya/ /oM ni sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /yi ge A:ni dag tu gnas/ /hUM ni sems la rnam
131a6(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa/ /byas nas chog spang bar bya/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis legs byung ba/ /sems can gzung ba'i rgyu yin no/ /yi ge gsum gyi dgod pa 'di/ /de nyid kyis ni gzugs su sbyor/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa dang/ /sku yi yi ge skye ba med/ /gsung dang thugs kyang
131a7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge med/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje rtog las byung/ /log par gzung bas zin pa'o/ /oM ni thams cad gsal byed de/ /huM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyu ru ni/ /ming bzlas pa ni legs par brtsam/ /stong pa nyid kyi sngags brjod cing/ /gnod
131b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes rgyal po de bzhin no/ /ra ba dra ba bsam byas shing/ /rdo rje sa gzhi de bzhin no/ /rlung dang me ni yang dag rdzogs/ /chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor la/ /ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma yang dag ldan/ /dpe byad brgyad cu las byung ba/ /de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
131b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /zla ba la gnas hUM las byung/ /he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /phag mo la sogs yang dag ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs sogs kyis brgyan/ /'jigs byed chen po g.yon brgyad pa/ /sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /dpa' drug rnal 'byor ma go cha/ /go cha chen po
131b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub kun mdzad dpa' bo ste/ /bde mchog mdzes pa bsgom par bya// sngon du yi ge gsum bkod de/ /bzlas pa legs par brtsam par bya/ /'di ltar dpal ldan bde mchog ni/ /bsgom pa rnal 'byor gzhan dag zer/ /dngos po gang dang gang gis ni//
131b4(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /des ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bI re shA ya huM hUM phaT/ aM mahA kalpa agni sin+na b+hA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM dza Ta ma ku To tka TA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM daMSh+Ta ka rA lo gra b+hI ShaNa mu khA ya huM hUM phaT//
131b5(rgyud 'grel): oM sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM pa ra shu pA sho dya ta shU la kha TwAM d+hA ri Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM byA g+ha dzi na a mA ra d+ha rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM mahA d+hU mtha an+ta? kA ra wa pu ShA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ka ra ka ra huM hUM phaT/ i ku ru ku ru huM 'i bU phaT/ om band+ha band+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM tra
131b6(rgyud 'grel): sa ya trA sa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM h+riM:h+rau:huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM huM hUM phaT/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM da had ha huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha b+ha kaSha huM hUM phaT/ oM pa
131b7(rgyud 'grel): sha ru b+hi ra asdza? mA lA ba lapI? ni grih+Na grih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM sapta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba ma bAta rdza ya ta rdza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaDDDya? A kaDDhya huM hUM phaT/ oM h+riM h+riM huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM huM hUM phaT/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM haM haM huM hUM ?
132a1(rgyud 'grel): oM hiM? hi? huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li huM hUM phaT/ oM si li si li huM hUM phaT/ oM tsi li tsi li huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li d+hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi li huM hUM phaT/ sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /ka ra la sogs
132a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo yi/ /dbang phyug gir grags gzhan dag zer/ /bdag gi bla ma'i lugs nyid kyis/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi sngags su bshad/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti badzra bA rA tI a pa rA dzi te trai lo kya mA te bidye shwa ri sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya ba he ma hA badzra badzrA sa ne a dzi te a pa rA dzi te wa shaM ka ri
132a3(rgyud 'grel): Ne tra b+h+rA ma Ni bi Sha Sho Sha ro Sha kro d+ha ka rA li tri ta tri kA ma nI pra b+he ha ri Ni pa rA dza ya bi dza ya dzam+b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni mo ha ni badzra bA rA hI ma hA yo gi ni kA me shwa ri kha ge tadya thA pro tang ge ha na ha na/ prA NA ki ki ni khe khi ni d+hu na d+hu na badzra ha ste/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya badzra kha TwAM ga ka pA la d+hA ri Ni
132a4(rgyud 'grel): mahA bi shi to mAM sa sa ni ma nu Sh+yAn? tra pra bri te sinda d+hye na ra shi ro mA la graM thi ta d+ha ra Ni suM b+ha ni suM b+he ta na ha na prA NAM sarba pA sha b+ha nAM/ mahA maM sats+tshe nga ni kro d+ha sU rti nga ShDa ka rA la ni mahA ma de sh+ri he ru ka /de ba shA gra ma hi Shi sa ta sa shi res ta sra b+hA hA be sha ta sa ta srA na ne dzwa li ta
132a5(rgyud 'grel): te dza sya dzA lnga? mu khi paM? ka la lo ka tsa ne badzra sha rI de badzrA sa ni mi li ta tsi li ta he he hUM hUM kha kha d+hu d+hu ru ru d+hu ru d+hu ru mu ru mu ru ya dwe te mahA yo gi ni pa ji ta sid+d+hi dreM d+haM 'dreM d+haM graM graM he he ha ha b+hI? me ha sa ha sa bI re ha ha ho ho hUM hUM treM lo kya bi nA sa ni sha ta sa ta sra koTi ti thA ga ta pa ri
132a6(rgyud 'grel): bA re hUM phaT/ sid+ha rU pa kha(rgyud 'grel): ga dza rU pe ga:trai lo kyang re sa mu dra me kha le gra sa gra sa huM hUM phaT/ bI ra dA? te hUM hUM hA hA ma hA pa shu mo hA ni yo ge shwa ri dwaM DAM ki ni lo ki ni lko kA nAm brtan si bi dye hUM phaT/ b+hu ta drA sa ni ma bI re par ma si de pi dye shwa ri phaT/ hUM hUM phaT hUM phaT swAhA// //
132a7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas bzlas sngags 'di rnams 'dod pa'i don kun legs par ster/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bar ldan/ /gang gzhan bde mchog las byung ba'o/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i ri ma nyid dang/ /sa ny+tsa re dang smad 'tshong gzhung/ /dpa' bo dang ni lha rnams ni/ /phyag gnyis
132b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig nyid du bstan/ /dzA land+ha ra dpal zhabs dang/ /kats+tsha pa te'i lugs kyis kyang/ /dpa' bo rnams dang rnal 'byor ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs dpa' bor bcas/ /sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi
132b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu grags/ /khro bo'i gzugs can hUM dang bcas/ /rab gtum ma sogs lha mo rnams/ /kha dog sna tshogs bye brag dang/ /phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig pa/ /tsarya pa yi gzhung yin no/ /yang na sems kyi rnam dag pa'i/ /gcig tu kha dog sngon por gnas/ /dpa' bo lha
132b3(rgyud 'grel): mo rnams dang ldan/ /gzhung 'di legs shes kha cig gsungs/ /sku gsung dag pa'i dbye ba yis/ /kha dog gsum du rnam par gnas/ /gang phyir 'khor lo gsum gsungs pa/ /de phyir kha dog gsum du dbye/ /lugs 'di rnams ni gang 'dod pa/ /rnal 'byor rig pas de
132b4(rgyud 'grel): bsten bya/ /phyag gnyis thog ma nas brtsams nas/ /ji srid 'bum gyi phyag dang zhal/ /phyag zhal mdza' yas dngos grub phyir/ /bsam mi khyab sbyor gyis bsam bya/ /de ltar blo bzang gis shes bya/ /spyod dang bral bas sbyar ba min/ /'di kun mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /gang
132b5(rgyud 'grel): zhig bsgom bya de 'bras bzang/ /sngon du gus pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bla mas gsungs pa blang bar bya/ /'bar ba'i phyag brgya bde mchog las/ /slob dpon kha cig gis gsungs pa/ /he ru ka 'byung rgyud las gsungs/ /bde mchog la ni gnas pa min/ /bdag gis ma
132b6(rgyud 'grel): bris pa des na/ /dpa' bo rdo rje bzod pa mdzod/ /man ngag gis ni phag mo ni/ /'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes su grags/ /bde mchog gtor ma'i las dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor dgun pa'i don gyis so/ /he ru ka 'byung rgyud du ni/ /he ru ka yi phyag na gnas/ /dpa' bo'i bdag po'i sngags
132b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs gos kyi don gyis stag gi pags pa bsnams/ /bdag gis bla ma yis bstan lhan cig skyes pa gos med rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gzugs/ /rtag tu drag po'i dung mdog dkar zhing dmar ba'i sku ni rigs drug bsdus pa'i don gyis so/ /kha dog thog ma 'dra ba'i gzugs te thog
133a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i nyi ma lta bu'i zhal te lha mo skra grol ba'o/ /lugs gnyis gyur pa dpyad nas sems la gang 'dod de dag bya/ /g.yas na rtsa gzhan khrag ste myur du 'bab ba me tog ldan pa'o/ /g.yon na khu ba ster brgya mtsho lta bu de ni dpa' bo'i rang
133a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /rkang dang rus pa rtsa dang chu dang lnga pa khu bar ldan pa 'di ni pha ru gyur/ /ma ni pags pa sha dang khrag dang snying dang me dang lhan cig ba ste gang 'di gnyis po dngos grub po/ /mgon po dpal ldan he ru ka 'di bskyed pas bskyed pa gang zhig pha dang bye brag med/ /'dir
133a3(rgyud 'grel): ni dpal ldan bde mchog ces bya ston kun gyi gzhi ste dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /de ltar shes nas de yi gzugs ni sa gsum bde ba ster ba'i de nyid rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom/ /'byung gnas sgra yi gzugs las ni/ /rnam par byung sogs gang shes pa/ /de yi don
133a4(rgyud 'grel): ni bdag gis bstan/ /rab tu 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rab 'jug dkyil 'khor sogs rnams kyis/ /phyi rol rnam pa'i mchan nyid gcig dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de dag gsungs/ /gang zhig ldog par rtag gsung ba/ /'khor lo bde
133a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog la legs gnas/ /de ni lhan cig skyes 'dri dngos/ /rtag tu snying la gnas pa'o/ /phyi nang bdag nyid mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sems la rnam dgong bstan/ /dpal ldan he ru ka rol lus la gnas par lta bstan/ /rnam dag he ru ka yi yan lag lhan
133a6(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes gnas mnyam par gzhag /phyis ni rnal 'byor pa yi rim gyis lus skyes rnam par bsgom/ /lhan cig skyes mnyam ma lus phur bu pags pa bcing bar rab tu sbyar/ /brtan zhing mkhregs pas bcings pa'i rus pa'i phreng ba dra ba'o/ /sna tshogs kyis mdzes sna tshoD
133a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas brgyan ba'i sku/ /go cha mkhregs pas dag pa de ni go cha chen por ldan/ /gang zhig dmigs dang bral ba'i rtsa ni sems can kun phan 'dod/ /lha dang lha min mi dang bcas pa 'di kun de yis khyab/ /be ram pa yi rlung ni rkang pa'i mthil du shin tu legs par gnas//
133b1(rgyud 'grel): lte bar song ba'i 'dar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'i gzi brjid can/ /lto bar dkar ba'i chu yi gzhi ni yid 'od gzugs te snying gar dbang pos rnam mdzes ser po'o/ /mgrin pa'i steng na ri bo'i mchog ni brgyad pa dang ldan ri rab ste/ /bdun bskor zla ba nyi ma dbus na 'char
133b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing nub pa'o/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma sum cu rtsa drug ldan par gyur pa'i rdo rje'i dbus/ /grub pa'i A li kA li las byung hUM sgrogs mdzad pa'i mgo /der gnas gser gyi gdan ni sna tshogs dbus/ /ming ni dang po zhes bya las ni lhan cig skyes pa dri med zla bas 'od/ /yan
133b3(rgyud 'grel): lag kun gyi mtshams su 'gro bar gyur pa'i rim pa yis/ /bskyed pa'i pad+ma'i sna'i dbus phyogs su/ /legs pas bskul bas mgo bo thog ma med par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas skyes/ /sum cu rtsa drug ro dang ldan pa mdzes par legs par gyur pa'i rtsa rnams kyis/ /
133b4(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun phyogs ni bzhad par gyur nas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i khams/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba zhes pa'i sgra yi don ni de lta bu'o/ /rgya mtsho'i chu ni shin tu rnam pa sna tshogs 'gram na ri yi dbang por ldan/ /zab cing mdzes pa'i snying po thog mar grub pa'i dur
133b5(rgyud 'grel): khrod do/ /rgyal mtshan sna tshogs 'phan dang dril bu'i ngo?  shal mdzes/ /gsum du byung ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor de ni lus yin no/ /mchog tu mdzes shing legs pa'i skud pa dang ni rnga yab kyis mtshan pa/ /dri ma med ba'i tshon ni rol pas rnam par/
133b6(rgyud 'grel): dag /bum pa la sogs gnas pa de yi dngos dang ldan pas khengs/ /lhan cig skyes gnas sems las skyes pa bris pa thal ba'o/ /pad+ma la gnas khro spangs shing/ /gtsang zhing brtson pa mnyam gzhag pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ye shes mnyam ldan pa'i/ /sems
133b7(rgyud 'grel): ni he ru ka ru gsungs/ /rgyud lnga dag gi 'bras dag ni/ /rdo rje zhes su mngon par brjod/ /dor gnas sa bon rdzogs pa ni/ /de dpal he ru ka ru brdzad?/ /sh+rI yi sgra ni gnyis med don/ /he ni rgyu dang bral ba nyid/ /ru ni gzugs dang bral ba'i don/ /ka ni gang duAng mi gnas ba'o//
134a1(rgyud 'grel): A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/ /dkar po dmar po'i rang bzhin no/ /sh+rI yig tu ni legs gnas pa/ /shin tu thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /sh+rI yi brda yis brjod pa ni/ /b+ha ga'i don du mngon par brjod/ /sems ni he ru ka nyid
134a2(rgyud 'grel): de/ /dpal ldan he ru ka zhes gsungs/ /bA ni dag lam 'das pa'i sgra/ /rA ni rdul dang bral ba nyid/ /hI ni rgyu rnams mi dmigs pa/ /phag mo'i sgra ru rab tu grags/ /ral pa'i rtsa ba zhes grags pa/ /bde ba bskyed par byed pa'o/ /sna tshogs sems
134a3(rgyud 'grel): can don mdzad phyir/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnas/ /byang chub sems ni zla bar gsungs/ /dpal ni bde chen 'khor lo sgyur/ /der gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i mthar gnas pa'o/ /dus kun yongs su rdzogs pa rgya mtsho'i lam du 'bab
134a4(rgyud 'grel): pa lta bu yi/ /lte ba'i 'gram du gnas gyur nyi ma bcu drug bstan pa bskyed pa'o/ /stong pa lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas rnams/ /gcig gi rang bzhin legs dag pa/ /sdigs mdzub legs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /byang chub sems
134a5(rgyud 'grel): las byung gyur cing/ /yan lag kun la rnam par gnas/ /de phyir rtag tu dag pa nyid/ /phyi dang nang du gnas par bstan/ /yan lag bcu gnyis las byung phyir/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan/ /zhal bzhi rnams su legs bstan pa//
134a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam thar bzhi po dag pa nyid/ /lha mo'i gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma/ /dum skyes ma dang lA ma ste/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi po/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo ba rnams skyong/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dbang po la sogs gang 'thung ba/ /de ni
134a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba zhes su bstan/ /phyag rnams kyis ni mtshan nyid ni/ /sku gsung dag phyir mdung thung ste/ /glang po gti mur rnam bar spangs/ /dgra sta zhe sdang gcod pa ste/ /lus dang ngag sems las byung ba'o/ /sems can don gyis gri gug rno/ /'phyar ba brtson
134b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grus yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /Da ma ru'i sgra ru brtag /rdo rje stong nyid mi tshig pa'i/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin phyir/ /kha TwAM yan lag la rnams gnas/ /bde ba spyod phyir thod pa dang//
134b2(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa yul gyi yon tan te/ /mgo bo tshangs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /dril bu shes rab rang bzhi no/ /yi ge lnga bcu rnams kyis ni/ /mgo bo mdzes pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i mgo yi phred/ /dngos grub kun gzhi bdag nyid can/ /mche ba bzhi dang
134b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam ldan pa/ /bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms pa po/ /zab par 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i/ /rtag tu so yi phreng ba gnyis/ /pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pa'i/ /phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa'o/ /phyogs kyi gos kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /gzugs su byung ba'i gos gang bral /A ni kun nas
134b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba kun/ /li la stong bar sbyor ba nyid/ /de nas g.yas brkyang zhabs su grags/ /he ru ka yi bye brag go /yan lag g.yon pa bskum ba zhes pa yis/ /tshig tu gsungs pa'i legs bar thob pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi kun nas 'khor lo'i tshogs ni
134b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka 'byung ba'o/ /slob dpon gzhan gyi lugs kyis zhabs g.yas bskum par 'dod/ /blo bzang gang zhig kyang ni gzhan du gar gyi rkang pa zer te bdag ni g.yon par 'dod/ /g.yon pas g.yon pa'i skye bo'i rgyan byas don kun ster bar nus/ /rgyas byed
134b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas 'tshe ba kun spangs legs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de phyir cho ga'i thams cad dge ba'i g.yon pas gzung/ /gang phyir bde mchog 'dren pas thams cad g.yon pa las byung brtsams/ /sems dang sems med 'gog pa dge ba'i lam du gang zhig brtags pa'i pad+ma la//
134b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i mdza' las byung ba mnyam zhing ro gcig pa dang mdza' yas pa'o/ /phag mo mchog tu sbyor ba las byung skyes pa gang phyir gtso bor gnas/ /de phyir g.yon pa'i gzhi yis brgyan bI brgyan pa mchog gi lha mo'i bde mchog go /zla ba nyi ma rnam dag srid par skyes pa'i rang bzhin ro dang
135a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /pad+ma mchog tu byung ba'i ri bo las byung shin tu mnyam par ldan byung khu ba'o/ /de ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes/ /sangs rgyas khams su rnam par brtag/ /nam mkha' kun tu spyod grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes mngon
135a2(rgyud 'grel): par brjod/ /des bskyed pa yi gzugs gang yin/ /gzugs can ma zhes mngon par brjod/ /gzugs su skye ba'i rim pa nyid/ /rtog par gyur pa dum skyes ma/ /gang zhig mdzas par legs brjod pa/ /mi dang bud med sogs par byung/ /mtshan nyid thaMs cad
135a3(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs pa/ /des na lA mar rab tu grags/ /bdud kun la sogs rnam par bral/ /de nas gzhal yas khang du grags/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /pad+ma sangs rgyas gzhi de'o/ /rtag tu 'dod chags dang bral zhing/ /gang du mtshan nyid
135a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sbyor pa/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan/ /de ni dpa' bo zhes su gsungs/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /der ni dbang phyug legs par thob/ /lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i dngos/ /de ni dpa' bo'i dbang phyug gyur/ /gzhom
135a5(rgyud 'grel): med dpag tu med pa dga' ba bde mchog 'khor lo de ni sde tshan mdza' / /rtag tu thur du phyogs pa 'di ni yan lag kun la yid du 'ong ba 'dzag /'dod chags la sogs rtsa dang 'dra ba 'bigs pa'i ye shes kyis zos so/ /rnam par mi rtog rang
135a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis/ /de ni kun rdzob myong ba'o/ /nam mkha' i pad+mar nam mkha' i dbus su mkha' spyod 'khor lo rol pa'i rang bzhin no/ /der gnas shin tu rnam par brtags pa mkha' spyod 'khor lor legs par grags/ /b+hu zhes pa ni pa'i dbus gnas skyes pa/ /lte ba'i pad+ma
135a7(rgyud 'grel): der gnas shin tu rnam par brtags pas sbyod 'khor la'o/ /sa 'og ces par gang bstan pad+mar byang chub ltung ba'o/ /phyi rol des pa'i yid ni sa 'og gnas pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul rnams kyis/ /he ru ka gzugs legs
135b1(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /A li kA li yang dag ldan/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas mdzes/ /a yig sprul pa'i 'khor lo ru/ /pad+ma'i nang du legs par gnas/ /lhan cig skyes pas ? pa gis/ /'jig rten gsum gyis brgyan du grags/ /oM drAM h+rI:khaM
135b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab mar ? maM pAM tAM mtshams kyi cha ru'o/ /dbus su he ru ka'i sa bon mchog gi sems ni pad+mar shin tu legs par gnas/ /chos sems pad+ma chen pa la/ /stong pa'i rdo rje rnam par gnas/ /der gnas rtag tu 'jig pa ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub
135b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yi steng du longs spyod la ni phyag 'tshal 'og tu lta ba rtag tu blta/ /A a'i lhan cig o aau mchog gi rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bor ldan/ /der gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs su ni/ /gang du mkha' 'gro ma rnams rol/ /der ni rtag pa'i dus mchod
135b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mchog tu dga' bar legs par shes/ /haM ni bde chen 'khor lo ru/ /zla ba lta bu legs pa 'dzag /bgrod dang bgrod pa ma yin pa/ /der ni mig gis mthong ba min/ /twa ri ti na gyen du grags/ /pA Shpa? phyogs su rnam par gnas/ /bi bind+ha ni dbus
135b5(rgyud 'grel): su gnas/ /bir shwa shtha? ni thur du grags/ /rgyu mthun pa dang rnam par smin/ /skyes bu de bzhin dri ma bral/ /'bras bu bzhi po 'di rnams dang/ /dga' ba rnams su rab tu grags/ /chung du 'bring po chen po dang/ /chen po yi yang chen po ste/ /sems
135b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi? dbye bas bzhi rnams su/ /mi la sogs pa rnams su rol/ /pad+mar sprul pa'i 'khor lo thams cad sems kyi skad cig nges par 'byung/ /sems kyi chas kyi rang bzhin 'dren cing rtag tu sdug bsngal sel ba rnam par smin/ /mgrin bar gnas pa'i
135b7(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka mgon mang po rtog pa thams cad dpyod pa'i rang bzhin no/ /shes dang mi shes sgri bor gnas pa nga rgyal dang bral de ni rnam pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin no/ /skad cig bzhi pa gang 'di skad cig gcig gis bskyed/ /'khor lor skad cig de ni gtso
136a1(rgyud 'grel): yin te gzhan ni mdza' yas dngos por 'gyur/ /me tog phreng dang tsandan bud med sogs/ /ji srid bltas pas bde bar gyur/ /de srid dga' bar legs par grags/ /sems can kun la legs par gnas/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas//
136a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig sems ni rnam par gnas/ /de yi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang/ /dga' ba chen po zhes su brjod/ /legs par sbyor las bral ba'i sems/ /bde ba'i mdza' ru legs par gnas/ /de bral zhes pa'i ming du gsungs/ /rnam par sel ba bskyed par grags/ /dga' dang
136a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dga' ba dang/ /dga' dang bral ba gsum pa ste/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin 'di/ /brtan g.yo kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /gang de lhan cig skyes de kun/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ces gsungs so/ /tshig med kun song zhi ba ste/ /ye shes he ru ka ru brjod/ /gzhan gdan zhes
136a4(rgyud 'grel): pa shes rab bstan/ /bdag gi gdan ni thabs yin te/ /'di dag gnyis med rang bzhin ni/ /sbyor gdan du yang rnam par gnas/ /de nyid bdag ni des bskyed pa'i/ /de spangs ba yi dngos po ni/ /lhan cig skyes shes yang dag gsungs/ /tshig lam spyod yul las 'das
136a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bdag gi de nyid rtag tu sngags/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid yang dag ldan/ /chos dang long spyod sprul pa ni/ /lus la rnam par gnas pa'o/ /dmigs pa'i dngos po sangs rgyas te/ /mi dmigs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnas gnyis mnyam par dmigs nas ni/
136a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab gnyis ni bstan pa'o/ /bstan sogs bcu ni sa rnams dang/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu mchog go /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dbye ba yis/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'di dag ste/ mgo dang spyi gtsug dang/ rna ba g.yas pa dang/ rgyab kyi tshigs
136a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rna ba g.yon pa dang/ smin ma'i dbus dang/ mig dang/ dpung pa'i rtsa ba dang/ nu ma gnyis dang/ lte ba dang/ sna'i rtse mo dang/ kha dang/ mgrin pa'i phyogs dang/ snying ga dang/ chu so dang/ mtshan dang/ bshad ba'i lam dang/ brla gnyis dang/ byin pa dang/ sor mo dang
136b1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa'i bol dang/ mthe po dang/ pus mo rnams su bdag po la sogs pa skye ba dang/ gnas pa dang rab tu thim pa zhes so/ /pul+lI? ru ni bdag bo ste/ ? land+ha rang spyod bas gnas/ /oM DyaN du ni thim pas gnas/ /bstan la sogs pa'i gnas gnas su/ /yan lag
136b2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu thim gyur pa/ /bde mchog gi ni mtshan nyid do/ /sprul pa ru ni skyes pa ste/ /longs spyod pa ru gnas pa'o/ /chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin gyis/ /thim par gyur par som nyi med/ /de ltar sku rnams cha shas kyis/ /bdag po long spyod thim pa'o/ /gnas su ji ltar de bzhin
136b3(rgyud 'grel): du/ skye ba dang ni gnas pa nyid/ /thim par gyur pa'i tim pa yis/ /rtag tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /gnas khyed pa yi sgo nas ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bskul ba'o/ /dpal ldan dzA land+ha rar ni/ /skad cig de la bde bar gyur/ /bde bar bskyed pa'i bsdus pa ni /brtan g.yo kun gyi bdag
136b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid do/ /de ltar he ru ka phag mo/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas dpa' bor ldan/ de yi phyag sogs sangs rgyas te/ /khams kyi ming ni 'byung ba'o/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnams gnyis te/ /bud med skyes pa la sogs brtag /thams cad yul du rab tu bstan/ /nam mkha' bdud rtsi'i ngo bo'o//
136b5(rgyud 'grel): de la spyod pa gang yin te/ /thams cad nam mkha' spyod par shes/ /thams cad mkha' 'gro dra ba yis/ /snying po bde mchog mchog yin te/ /'dir ni phreng med bzlas pa med/ /lhan cig skyes par kun tu gnas/ /de bas shin tu rtog bral bas/ /gus pa bskyed cing 'bad pa
136b6(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /'jigs dang 'jom pa rtag spangs nas/ /rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya/ /'dir ni mya ngan 'das dang sbyin sreg rnal 'byor bsam bya dkyil 'khor la sogs pa/ /bum pa rdul tshon thig skud cho ga lus la lhan cig skyes gnas rig par bya /gtsub shing
136b7(rgyud 'grel): gtsub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes me ni shin tu 'bar/ /rlung gis bskyod par gyur pa las/ /lte ba'i pad+ma rnam par gnas/ du ba rtag tu lha mo ste/ /legs 'bar lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i sangs rgyas dang/ /longs spyod 'khor lor gyur bsreg nas/
137a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs ni rab tu mchod byas nas/ /smin mtshams mdzod pur stong gyur nas/ /o Dya Na zhes ni bya ba yi/ /gnas kyi sgo nas 'phros nas ni/ /dzA land+ha lar rab tu zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsreg/ yid kyi shuD
137a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan lha mo ni/ /mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas snying gan bzhugs khyab/ /bdud rtsi'i tshogs ni blang byas te/ /'o ma yi ni rgyun lta bur/ /gser gyi sgo ru rab tu zhugs/ /rkan gyi dbus nas 'dzag pa ni/ /long spyod 'khor lor lrgs par gnas/ khro chu'i
137a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul 'khor bzhin du ni/ /sngon du sems ni rnam par gnas/ /tha ma med par legs par bsreg /legs par sangs rgyas mnyes pa ste/ /yang ni 'dod dang ldan gyur nas/ /lte ba'i 'khor lor rab tu gnas/ /'dir bzhugs yang ni 'gro ba dang/ /'od bar
137a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa de bzhin no/ /kun spyod mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'khor lo bde mchog las gsungs so/ /ldog pa yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /'di dag thams cad bdag gi bshad/ /gang gzhan bde ba'i dngos grub ni/ /bla ma la gus des shes bya/ /sna tshogs sngags bzlas rnal 'byor
137a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis legs mchod/ /'khor lo la gnas bla ma rdo rje dpa' bo'i tshogs dang legs pa'i rnal 'byor ma yi zhabs/ /nga rgyal bcas pas rgyud rnams kun gyi snying po'i gnas ni legs par brtags/ /phyi nas blo dang ldan pas
137a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can don 'dod rtsom pas dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi lha rnams ni/ /bri ba smad 'tshong gzhung yin no/ /he ru ka 'byung sogs las kyang/ /dzA land+ha ra sogs pa gsungs/ /'dus pa la sogs rgyud rnams kyis/ /ming de ci yi phyir na 'gal//
137a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas 'khor lo sdom dkyil 'khor/ /bde mchog don du bri bar bya/ /slob dpon gyis ni mtshan nyid bstan/ /rgyud las ji ltar bstan par 'dod/ /g.yon pa'i lag na kha TwAM ga/ gzhan na cang te'u hUM sgrogs pa/ /yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing/ /he ru ka dpal
137b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gcing la mkhas pa dang/ /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol son/ /spyi bo la skyes thod pas brgyan/ /yan lag thal bas rjes su byug /bla ma chen pos slob ma la/ /mchod pa la sogs de dag dri/ /dga' bas de ni smra bar bya/ /bdag gis thams cad tshogs par gyur/
137b2(rgyud 'grel): bza' dang btud ba la sogs pa/ /ras dang lha bshos thams cad ldan/ /dpa' bo lha mo chod pa'i don/ /bdag gis cho ga byed par nus/ /dpa' bo chen pos de nas 'dir/ /shes rab yan lag gnyis med 'dus/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo kun la rnam par gnas/ /mdun du
137b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i slob ma ni/ /bsod nams ldan zhing blo dang ldan/ /thog mar bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /de nas sa ni rnam par brtag /rgyud las bstan pa'i dkyir gnas/ /khro bo sbyor bas mnan nas kyang/ /gnod mdzes gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /'bad pas bgegs ni bskrad par bya//
137b4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma mkhas pa legs par gzung/ /bde ba'i mchog ni mnyes nus pa/ /bde mchog las gsungs bya ba ldan/ /sngon du phag mo la gus pa/ /bsod nams 'dod cing gtsang la mkhas/ /dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i pha rol son/ /dga' zhing sdug pa yang yin te/ /de dang lhan cig legs
137b5(rgyud 'grel): par brtsams/ /gtor ma sbyin sogs byin nas ni/ /he ru ka dang gnyis med gnas/ /bla ma dpa' bo legs mchod nas/ /sa gzhi dag la legs par brtsams/ /ri phug nags kyis 'khrigs pa dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du 'am/ /sngon du grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bri?
137b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /der ni lci ba ma lhung bas/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang mnyam ldan pas/ /sa de nye bar byug par bya/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /bar ma mchog dang dbugs dbyung dang/ /dri yi chu dang lhan cig pas/ /'bad pas mnyam
137b7(rgyud 'grel): par brdung bar bya/ /sa ni mnyam zhing gtsang bar bya/ /dbus dang thog ma gang bstan pa'i/ /lhag ma'i bshad pa yang dag ldan/ /bla ma dam pa las shes bya/ /des shes gang de bzhin du min/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni/ /sngags pa'i rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur/ /dbus su mthobs rgyal srid dang//
138a1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /byang du mtho bas 'chi ba'am/ /yang na nor ni zad par 'gyur/ /ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas/ /myur du rigs rnams zad par 'gyur/ dbus su dma' ba' i sa gzhi gang/ /sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par
138a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de ltar mtshan nyid bcas pa yi/ /dpa' bo'i dbang po sogs pas brtag /sa'i mtshan nyid do/ /mgul rgyan dang ni gdu bu nyid/ /rna rgyan spyi bo'i nor bu dang/ /mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /mkha' 'gro ma tshogs phyogs
138a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ru/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bzhag nas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'dzin/ /rang gi gtso la gsol pa gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyir bdag po bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad
138a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad spangs pa ste/ /kun+tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyang ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /sems can
138a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /gang zhig lag na thod pa dang/ /chang la dga' bas myos pa rnams/ /spyod pa gzugs can rnal 'byor ma/ /lha mo chen mo mnyes pa ste/ khas?
138a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam/ /de bzhin srog dang rtsa rang bzhin/ /rang lhag lha la rab phyogs pas/ /grub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bsgyur/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /bsams nas bgegs ni rab tu gzhom/ /bgegs kyi tshogs ni gzhan rnams dang//
138a7(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i tshogs ni bskrad par bya/ /rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod bya ba/ /rdo 'bar ba hUM las byung/ /aM yig mi gnyis shes nas ni/ /zla ba nyi mar rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni/ /g.yas na rdo rje yang dag ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas phyogs kun blta/ /khros
138b1(rgyud 'grel): pas sems can don la brtson/ /de ru gnas pa'i gdug pa dang/ /bdud dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang/ /de rnams bskrad pa'i don gyi phyir/ /tshig 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /gang zhigs yi bdag po rnams/ /klu dang gnod sbyin dri za sogs/ /'byung po 'byung mo mkha' 
138b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma/ /sems can don du bya bar brtson/ /myur du 'gro ba nyid du gyis/ /he ru ka yi bka' thos nas/ /myur ba nyid du bor nas ni/ /khyed rnams 'gro ba nyid du gyis/ /gal te 'gro bar mi 'gyur na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba kha TwAM gis/ /de yi mgo ni brgyar 'gas bya/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na
138b3(rgyud 'grel): grih+Na hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ /dbang ldan phyogS nas brtsams nas ni/ /g.yon du bskor ba la brtson pas/ /dpa' bo chen po khros pas bskor/ /bskal pa'i me ltar langs nas ni/ /de las byung ba'i 'od sogs kyis/ /bdud la sogs pa thams cad bsreg/
138b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar sems dpa' i rnal 'byor dag/ hUM sgra sgrags pa'igar byas te/ /mya ngan khro dang 'jigs pa med/ /de bzhin drag dang rtse ba gnyis/ /rjes su chags ldan ro 'di dag/ dang po zhal la legs par gnas/ /mi sdug pa dang ngo mtshar gang/ /'jigs dang g.yo dang de bzhin du/ /rjes su chags gnas
138b5(rgyud 'grel): ro 'di yis/ /g.yon pa'i zhal du gyur bar gsungs/ /bzhad dang dga' ba dbang phyug dang/ /gzhad pa dang ni sgeg pa nyid/ /rjes su chags nas ro nyid dang/ /de ni nub kyi zhal yin no/ /smod pa dang ni ngo mtshar nyid/ /brkam par gyur pa gang yin pa/ /dpa' bo 'jigs byed gnas 'di dag/ g.yas
138b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhal la de dag gnas/ /pad+ma rdo rje dbus su ni/ /gang zhig sems ni legs gnas shing/ /zhi ba de ni legs dag pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i gar/ /gar ni chos kyi de nyid du/ /shes pa'i gar du the tshom med/ /'jig rten la phan rgyu yi phyir/ /'jig rten chos can gar bya'o/ /glang po che
138b7(rgyud 'grel): yi pags pa dang/ /mdud dang zhags pa gri gug dang/ /Da ma ru dang kha TwAM dang/ /thod pa dang ni zhags pa dang/ /mgo bo rdo rje dril bu dang/ /mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng ba dang/ /de rnams thogs pa'i snang ba'o/ /mgul rgyan thogs shing g.yon pa dang/ /g.yas na gdu bu de
139a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /rna rgyan rna ba la bkod cing/ /g.yon gyi spyi bo nor bu dang/ /g.yas pa yis ni thal ba dang/ /mchod phyir thogs dang yang dag ldan/ /bde byed lta bu bya ba dang/ /ri mo lta bu bya ba'o/ /padmo lta bu'lag byas te/ /pad+ma lta bur gyur pa'o/ /ji srid ri mo/
139a2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu yi/ /gar ni rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ zla ba gnyis po mi 'gyur ba/ /Da ma ru ni skyed byed pa'o/ /mtshan nyid bdag gis bstan pa'o/ /yongs su ldan pas blta ba'o/ /bde mchog don ni legs mthong nas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid dang/ /gzhan yang gang dang dngos grub
139a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dkyil 'khor don dang cho ga bshad/ /de ltar bstan pa ni sem ba ra'i sgra zhes bya ba'o/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur gyis/ /he ru ka zhal 'o byed cing/ /legs pa'i phag mo gar bya'o/ /kun da zla ba dri med so/ /dmar 'od lta bu hUM bsgrogs pa/ /khros pas bgegs
139a4(rgyud 'grel): kun brlag par byed/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rol pa yis/ /sems can don ni byed la brtson/ /de dang lhan cig dpa' bo che/ /'khro lo'i sa yi dbus su gnas/ /za ba'i phyag rgya la sogs pas/ /bgegs rnams kun ni bskrad par bya/ /ji srid gar gyi bstan
139a5(rgyud 'grel): bcos las/ /snying rje'i phyag rgyal sogs pa/ /he ru ka dpal phyag rgya ste/ /de ni dngos grub kun ster ba'o/ /zhal bzhi la sogs sngags kyis ni/ /phur bur ba dra ba dang/ /ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /chog thams cad bya ba'o/ /de ltar go bgos bdag
139a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni/ /'og tu mtshon cha nges par bzhag/ 'khor lo lhan cig bdag nyid ni/ /steng du mda' ni bri ba'o/ /bdag nyid mkha' spyod dra ba ni/ /de ltar go bgos go dang ldan/ /sum cu gsum
139a7(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang mi ?/ /mdza' yi dbyangs yig las byung ba/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gzi brjid bzang/ /des na rtag tu mi phed sa/ /'bar ba'i gzugs su rnam par bsam/ /'dis ni hUM 'byung khro bo yis/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /yi ge bdun pa bzlas
139b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /rdo rje'i lta ba kun tu blta/ /sa gzhi dang/ par bltas nas ni/ /bgegs rnams kun ni rnam par spangs/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs legs par byug/ blo bzang gis ni me tog gtor/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje sa dbus legs par gnas//
139b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /mnga' bdag he ru ka bsgom bya/ /'byung gnas sgra gzugs la sogs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rnal 'byor dmigs/ /dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo che/ /dngos grub sa la brtsam par bya/ /ya sde brgyad pa'i sa bon na/ /stong pas
139b3(rgyud 'grel): steng du brgyan par bya/ /de ni lan gsum brjod byas te/ sa la reg pas sa reg gnas/ /bkug nas mdun du blta bar bya/ /mdzes ma zhes bya'i ma mo ni/ /legs pa'i gzugs can legs gzugs des/ /he ru ka la dga' bas gsol/ /mgon po bdag/
139b4(rgyud 'grel): gis ci zhig bgyi/ /rdo rje can bdag bka' stsol cig/ khyed kyi dkyil 'khor don gyis na/ /bdag gis bum pa gzung bar bya/ /ma la sogs dang yang dag ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas thod pa bzhag/ tshogs mchod pa byas nas ni/ /arg+ha byin nas lhag par gnas
139b5(rgyud 'grel): two de bi sak+Shi b+hU tra si sarba bud+d+ha nu ta yin naM/ tsadyA na ya baM khe Sh+ya btu mi pA ra mi ta pu tsa/ ma ra sai n+yaM thA b+ha ga naM shAkya sid+he na tA yi nA/ ta tha ma ra ba laM dzi twa manda laM saM laM kha ma haM/ lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /mdzes ma dag nas smra pa ni/ kye mgon po
139b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi bsod nams ni/ /dri med bsags pa bdag gis shes/ /da ltar khyod ni de phyi rol/ /thams cad khyod kyi dbang du gnas/ /gang zhig bya ba de bka' stsol/ /bdag ni de dag byed pas spro/ /zhes pa'i tshig ni smras gyur nas/ /sa der thim par gyur
139b7(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ /sngags pas de nas byas pa'o/ /sa gzhi lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga 'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu nyid kyis/ /sa ni legs par byug pa mdzes/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gnas/ /blo bzang gis ni maN+Dal
140a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sna tshogs me tog dgram pa dang/ /sbos kyi dri yis legs bsgos te/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i sbyor las byung/ /legs pa'i 'khor lo der spyan drang/ /'byung gnas sgra tshul la sogs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor sngon du dmigs nas ni//
140a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i gzugs bdag sbyor ba yis/ /gnas dang gnas su rnam par bsam/ /dpal ldan he ru ka sogs ldan/ /rnam pa kun gyi mtshan nyid gcig/ dngos grub kun gyi gzhir sbyor ba/ /bde mchog dngos grub thams cad ster/ /lam la gnas shing 'bras bur
140a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang phyug mdzes/ /yul la sogs pa gnas stan du/ /gsang ba spyan drang sgom bya ste/ /ye shes 'khor lo mnyam sbyor ba/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /ngo bo gcig pa'i legs dag pa/ /lhan cig skyes dga' shin tu mdzes//
140a4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta/ /gyen du phed gi sgra bsgrags shing/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/ mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab sbyor te/ /dpral ba'i dbus phyogs
140a5(rgyud 'grel): legs bzhag nas/ /phyag rgya mchog gis ma tshogs bskum/ /mkha' spyod la sogs mnyam ldan pa'i/ /ye shes 'khor lo shin tu mdzes/ /g.yon du bskor ba'i bye brag gis/ /bskor ba nyid kyis dgug par bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma blangs par gyur nas ni/
140a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bas de nas arg+ha byin/ /zhabs bsil nyid kyi bye brag go/ dri la sogs pas yongs bkang ba'i// //pad+ma bzhi pos legs par mchod/ /bdug spos tha dad nyid kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bdug par bya/ /ye shes dkyil
140a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor spyan drangs pa'i cho ga'o/ /gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag phur bu dra/ /A li kA li zhes brjod nas/ /rgyu sogs stong pa sngon 'gro dang/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid gsungs pa'i sbyor ldan pa'o/ /bdud rtsis tshim bde? mya ngan
140b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ lag pa'i mchod pa dbang bskur dang/ /go cha chen pos legs par bsrungs/ sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa ste/ /de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni/ /dus kun du ni legs par brtsam/ /bde ba'i stan las 'bad pa yis/ /shes rab yan lag
140b2(rgyud 'grel): stan gyi steng/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang/ /rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang/ /mgrin par brgyan byas mgo bo'i phreng/ /ska rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa/ /ral pa cod pan dar dang ni/ /bcos pa'i sgra yis rgyan du byas/ /rdo rje pad+ma kha TwAM bcas//
140b3(rgyud 'grel): Da ma ru sgra sgrogs pa dang/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma/ /go cha gsum gyis brgyan byas shing/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug nges par byas/ /sems can kyi don gyi phyir/ /bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /mgrin pa ring la
140b4(rgyud 'grel): lto ba che/ /mchu 'phyang rtsa ba rnam par spangs/ /kha dog gnag sogs spangs pa yi/ /bum pa bcu ni bya ba'o/ /de rnams nang nas mchog gcig ni/ /phag mo ru ni rab tu brtag /dgra sta zhags pa de bzhin mdud/ /khaM Twa? ga yang legs par bri/ /de steng khro bo'i
140b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang/ /pad+ma'i lo ma sogs pas brgyan/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu nyid kyis/ /bkang zhing dri yis legs par byug /'bru dang rin chen sman rnams ni/ /so sor lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /lha mo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yis/ /me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /
140b6(rgyud 'grel): ras bzang po yis mgul ba dkri?/ rnal 'byor ma tshogs gtso bo yis/ /rdo rje phag mo'i bum pa che/ /sngags pas sems can don gyi rgyur/ /lto yi sgo yi g.yon du ni/ /'khor lo'i ri mo dang nye bar/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bzhag /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bum
140b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi/ /de yi mtshan mas mdzes par bya/ /ji lta'i gnas su bzhag nas ni/ /dri drug sogs pas legs par dgang/ /bdud rtsi?  la yis legs bkang ba'i/ /tham cad pa'i mtshan mas legs par brtag/ bum pa bzhi po gzhan rnams ni/ /'bad pas mtshams su
141a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i bum pa ni/ /he ru ka yi mtshan mas mtshan/ /bi mu mar bde? legs bkang/ /bgegs kun rnam par sel bar byed/ /mchod gnas gus pas gsol btab ste/ /lho yi sgo ru legs
141a2(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag/ rtag tu rdo rjes gdug pa kun/ /myur ba nyid du sel bar byed/ /phyi rol bum pa'i mtshan ma gang/ /thams cad ji ltar gsungs bzhin bstan/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor bum pa yi/ /mtshan nyid lus las byung ba'o/ /bum pa lta ga
141a3(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /lho ru mngon phyogs sngags pa ni/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /he ru ka ma dang sbyar la/ legs chags 'jug bcas dga' zhing spro/ /bar ma mchog dang dbus dbyung dang/ /me tog spos la sogs pa yis/ /g.yon pa'i spyod
141a4(rgyud 'grel): brtag spyod pas/ /bde mchog dpa' bo mchod par bya/ /g.yon pas blangs pa'i spos dang ni/ /mi ye sha dang ldan pa yis/ /bdug par gyur nas sngags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dpal ldan he ru ka sogs nam mkha' i dkyil gyur mkha' spyod sa spyod dang/ /sa
141a5(rgyud 'grel): 'og gnas bzhugs lhan cig skyes pa'i bde dang ldan pa bstan dang tshando ha lha mo/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa de kun dus mdza' i me ltar spyod la dngos grub rgyur ni gsol ba btab/ /he ru ka dpal phag mor bcas/ /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che/
141a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kun bzhugs pa dpa' bo dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po kun brnyes shing/ /de rnams bzhugs par gyur pa rnams/ /che ge mo bdag rdo rje che/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod
141a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /brtse bas bskyed par gyur nas ni/ /nye ba nyid du mdzad du gsol/ /dri zhem me tog legs par bsregs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pan/ /blangs nas spos bdug 'khor lo dang/ /skye bo
141b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa kun 'dus pa'o/ /lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /dpa' bo lha mo dkyil 'khor bzang/ /mchod cing gsol btab de nas ni/ /phyi rol song nas slob ma bzang/ /stobs chen me tog lag na thogs/ /brtson 'grus che ldan shes

141b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gang gang gus dang ldan pa yi/ /sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs/ /gzugs bzang shin tu mdzas brtson dang/ /chang la dga' bas myos pa la/ /slob ma'i dbang bskur don gyis ni/ /kun nas de la gsol ba gdab/ /dpa' bo dpa' 
141b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i dbang shes na/ /'byung gnas la sogs rnam par bsam/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang/ /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi/ /skyes pa bud med 'di don du/ /dpal ldan bde mchog las rab bstan/ /bde mchog lta bur rdzogs nas ni//
141b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba 'debs par rnam par bsam/ /dpa' bo khyod bdag rdo rje che/ /phag mo lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la
141b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug rnams/ /pag mo dang ni he ru ka'i/ /gsang ba'i stan sogs legs par dag /gnas pa'i lugs ni bstan du gsol/ /slob ma'i gtso bo mdun byas te/ /me tog phreng 'dzin dag sems la/ /g.yon
141b7(rgyud 'grel): pas kun nas blta byas te/ /rab tu rgyas pa'i bzhin gyis smra/ /pu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin pas/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul tshag? ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang//
142a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i dpa' bo ni/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /chog bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /shes rab yan lag gnyis med chub//
142a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen pa thob/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /he ru ka dpal sogs mchog gis/ /bdud sde 'jigs pa chen po yi/ /stobs chen po ni gang gis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yi blo gros 'di
142a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis shig /byang chub bsgrub pa'i don gyi rgyur/ /go cha thams cad khyod la sbyin/ /de nas slob ma ser sna bral/ /dpa' bo chen po rnam dag pa'i/ /bla ma la gsol dga' ba des/ /sdom pa mchog ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
142a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dun dang/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rnam gzugs can/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams bye brag gis/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gang/ /rgyal ba'i sras 'di thams cad la/ /kun la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /dngos po kun gyi de nyid kyis/ /bla ma la
142a5(rgyud 'grel): ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dir ni dngos grub kun mdzad cing/ /snying rje'i ro yis khengs gyur pa/ /dpal ldan he ru ka sogs dang/ /lha mo kun gyis bdag bsrung mdzod/ /che ge mo dag dpa' bo che/ /sems can kun la phan par dga' / /ji srid byang chub snying
142a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i bar/ /dngos grub sbyin bdag bdag gyur cig /blo ldan ston pa'i khrag gis ni/ /de dag rnams la thig le bya/ /snying rje sems can don la brtson/ /de dag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /zhal gyis spyan ras gzigs zlangs te/ /mgo yi steng
142a7(rgyud 'grel): du blugs par bya/ /slob ma 'di dag thams cad ni/ /bsrung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma ni/ /'bad pas btang ste mnyam par bzhag /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang dgyes la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod byas nas/ /bud
142b1(rgyud 'grel): med bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /phag mo'i num 'tshir ba dang/ /bza' dang bca' ba la sogs pas/ /kun gyis 'khor lo bde mchog mchod/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /nang par dpa' bo chen po ni/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan pas//
142b2(rgyud 'grel): phag mor sbyor bar legs gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /khro med gtsang ma mkhas pa dang/ /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol song/ /thad pas spyi bo rab brgyan cing/ /yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang/ /sku la phyag
142b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya drug la sogs/ /rus pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa dang/ /kha TwAM ga ni lag na thogs/ /phreng ba brgya yi phyed kyis brgyan/ /he ru ka yi bdag nyid byas/ /'khor lo snying gar bsam byas te/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos shing/ /sngags dang

142b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dmyal bar de 'gro 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs rang gzugs su/ /skad cig tsam gyis legs par byung/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i thig /de bzhin du yang gang gsungs pa/ /sangs

147b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang gcer bu'i gos dang ni/ /char la dga' bas myos pa'o/ /thams cad ral pa cod pan bcas/ /spyad dang bza' ba mchog tu brtson/ /mtshams kyi cha ni gzhan rnams su/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam 'khyud cing//
147b2(rgyud 'grel): nu ma 'tshir ba la brtson pa'o/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo'i bdag po ni/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo sgyur legs gnas/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /phag mo'i zhal la'o byed pa'o/ /la la glu yis glu len cing/ /le la gar byed rnal 'byor pa/ /la
147b3(rgyud 'grel): la bzhad par btu byed/ /bza' dang spyod pa la chags pa'o/ /la la rdza yi rnga brdung dang/ /bkra shis glu ni sna tshogs kyis/ /'khor lo bde mchog bde ba yis/ /dpa' bo chen po la mchod do/ /thams cad dpa' bo drug dang ldan/ /rnal
147b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mas ni rgyan du byas/ /go cha la sogs yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor legs par gnas/ /de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shigs/ /he ru ka la spro byas nas/ /bza' dang ston mo legs
147b5(rgyud 'grel): par brtsam/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang dpa' bo dbang phyug ma la mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /dam tshig 'khor lo drug pa ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /sems kyis kha sbyor byas pa ste/ /gyen du
147b6(rgyud 'grel): lta bas bltas nas ni/ /sngon du spyan drang phyag rgyar bcas/ /sngags dang pheM sgrogs sbyor ba yis/ /mdza' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /lha rnams mnyes nas dngos grub ste/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan/ /sngon
147b7(rgyud 'grel): gi mtshan ma sogs pas brgyan/ /'jig rten mgon po snying brtse can/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs par 'gyur/ /gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub thob/ /dkyil 'khor he ru ka yi zhing/ /byin rlabs go 'phang yid 'od
148a1(rgyud 'grel): bar/ /byed pa som nyi med pa'o/ /phyi dang nang gi ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ba'i cho ga'o// //phyi dang nang gi sems kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo mchod/ /rang byung
148a2(rgyud 'grel): gi ni me tog nyid/ /pu sogs gnas na legs par bzhugs/ /de yis gdong ni bskus nas ni/ /gang yang gzhan pa'i 'khor lor gnas/ /gnyis med gnyis su med sngags kyis/ /mngon par bsngogS
148a3(rgyud 'grel): nas byin gyis brlab/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags kyis/ /sgo dang sgo ru byin gyis brlab/ /brgyad brgya mchog tu bzlas pa ni/ /mnyam bzhag sngags pa nyid kyis bya/ /A li kA li bzlas nas
148a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /phyi nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni mang po dang/ /'jigs pa'i lha mo'i lus bzang ba/ /khyim lnga yi ni lha mo mchog /byon par gyur nas mdun du bzhugs/ /sgrub pa po
148a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub ni/ /rgya chen ster bar the tshom med/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ /rtag tu de ni mchi ma 'byung/ /bdag nyid las byung zas de bzhin/ /rdo rje la ni 'go ma mi byed/ /de bzhin gcer bur gyur
148a6(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod/ /g.yon pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyis/ /'di de phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim/ /bza' dang spyad pas yang dag 'grub/ /mgrin pa legs bzung sgrub pa po/ /rang gnas song nas de mnyes shing/ /rnal 'byor
148a7(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams grub 'dod pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che rtogs sngags pa ni/ /he ru ka ni mchog tu skye/ /yang na mkha' spyod 'khor lo dang/ /sa spyod la sogs yang dag ldan/ /brtse zhing he ru kar gyur nas/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/ /dpal ldan
148b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing bskor nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /yang na bsod nams zhan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa ma grub na/ /sems can don la gcig tu brtson/ /bza' dang spyad pa brtsam pa'o/ /gzhad dang sgeg
148b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs ldan/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' ba'o/ /sna tshogs ston mos dpa' bo dang/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod par 'gyur/ /gar gyi bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /byed pa'i phyag rgyal sogs pa/ /de ni he ru ka dpal rgyal/ /dngos grub thamS cad
148b3(rgyud 'grel): rab ster ba/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg go /dpa' bo lha mo legs par mchod/ /dpal ldan bde mchog yang dag langs/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/ /zhi ba'i btung bar gyur pa'i sems/ /rtag pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo/ /
148b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i btung ba gzhan ma ni/ /chang dang sha sogs yang dag ldan/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki ni sarba b+hak+ShaM sho d+ha ya gu hya badzra Ni hUM swA hA/ /mngon par bsngags nas byin gyis brlab/ /yang na lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /bza' ba kun
148b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnal 'byor pas/ /shes nas kha zas bza' ba blo ldan rnal 'byor pa mos pas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i lto ba thab khung lte ba'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad ni/ /lte bar dga' bar 'byung ba shin tu 'jigs pa'i he ru ka'i zhal/ /nges
148b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'dab mas dkris pa chen po lha mo'i pad+ma thod par ni/ /de yi rjes su 'khor lo gsum dang sgo skyong rnams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs mang pa'i ro star dgyes pa dpal gyi bdud rtsi sogs/ /sna mchog gi bsreg rdzas kyes ni phung
148b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i bud shing rab 'bar ba/ /skad cig gyur pa kun mkhyen me yi rang bzhin la/ /sngags pa bzang pos rtag tu 'di dag der ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ /rdo rje nang gi bdag nyid nyon/ /ji ltar
149a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg rab 'grub pa/ /'bar ba chen po gzi brjid che/ /rnam par mi rtog pa ru sreg /bza' ba btung ba gang chung zad/ /de dag thams cad mkhas pas bsreg /ji ltar bstan pa'i yam shing ni/ /gzugs phung la sogs rang
149a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ngag /rnam par mi rtog pa yis bsreg/ gang zhig sems ni rang bzhin kun/ /khu ba khrag dang de bzhin sha/ bshad dang gci ba lnga pa ste/ /rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza' / /rang bzhin med pI blo ldan pas/ /de bzhin rgyal gti mug che/ /zhe sdang 'dod chags
149a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du/ /phrag dog ser sna phra ma ste/ /dam tshig bsten pa dri? ma med/ /de nyid bzang por mnyam sbyor bas/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor lhan cig skyes/ /gtor ma la sogs gang cung zad/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lor sbyin sreg bya/ /mtshan mo
149a4(rgyud 'grel): skra grol gyur pa dang/ /gcer bus phyi rol gtor ma sbyin/ /sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga yis/ /lam la gnas shing gzi brjid che/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bor ldan/ /gtor ma byin pas mnyes par 'gyur/ /sems can bsam pa dang
149a5(rgyud 'grel): mthun par/ /phyi rol gyis ni sbyin sreg bshad/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dpal las bstan pa/ /lus kyi 'khor lor sbyin sreg bya/ /gang phyir lus kyis sangs rgyas ni/ /dam tshig des ni de bsreg bya/ /rten dang brten pa pad+ma'o/ /dbus su sbyin
149a6(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya ba'o/ /sha dang bdud rtsi bza' ba ste/ /chang ni btung bar yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ /phung po'i bud shing sgrib pas brlan zhing g.yogs pa gang/ /ye shes me ni byed pa'i rlung gis bskul bas de/ /du ba
149a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung zhing me lce 'bar ba nyid kyis bsreg /khyab cing rgyal ba de ni chos kyi dbyings su mthong/ /lus kyi sbyin sreg yang dag ldan/ /phyi rol sbyin sreg gis mnyes te/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs sten/ /phyi rol sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam/
149b1(rgyud 'grel): khru ga btsam gyi thab khung gyur/ /thod pa lta bus mdzes pa'o/ /lho ru kha bltas chog yis/ /de la kha bltas bskor bas 'grub/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad ni/ /ri yi steng na legs par gnas/ /pad+mar dgra sta de bzhin zhags/ /mdung dang kha TwAM yang dag
149b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /khro bo lta bu shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje lte bar dgod pa dang/ /phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba bya/ /pad+ma lta bu'i kha ldan/ /khro bo lta bu shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje lte bar dgod pa gzang nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /cung zad kha la thod par 'dra/ /dbus su kho ba'i rdo rje bri//
149b3(rgyud 'grel): A li kA li legs par brjod/ /'byung gnas la sogs rnal 'byor rig /g.yon du sbyin sreg la sogs rdzas/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pas sbyin sreg bya/ /gnyis med la sogs rgyud chen las/ /mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yis/ /me dang he ru ka dpal so//
149b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg byas nas yon blang ngo/ /mi dang ba lang rnga mo dang/ /ce sbyang rta dang rlang po yi/ /sha ni dngos grub 'dod pa des/ /rnal 'byor rig pas sbyin sreg bya/ /gsang bar skra grol gcer bu dang/ /sngon du spyad cing bza' ba yis/ /dpal ldan bde mchog
149b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ches/ /gtor ma'i las ni legs par brtsam/ /phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// //sngags pa rnal 'byor ma lhan cig /lho ru bltas shing lho ru ni/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas slob ma la/ /cho ga yiS
149b6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di skad smra/ /bu yis nges par rab 'bad pas/ /sdom pa'i mchog rnams srung bar gyis/ /dpal ldan bde mchog las mchog med/ /lhan cig skyes pas nye bar mtshon/ /dkyil 'khor gyis ni mdun byas te/ /yang na gsungs par gyur pa ste/ /
149b7(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa thod par gnas/ /slob ma'i sdig pa sel ba ste/ /g.yon pa'i lag pas legs par blangs/ /yi ge bdun pa rjes su dran/ /he ru ka yi sbyor dmigs te/ /nga rgyal bcas pas lags par gnas/ /phag mo dang ni 'o byed pa//
150a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma kun gyi kha ru ni/ /nus pa 'phrog cing bdud med pa/ /blo bzangs kyis ni rim par gtor/ /dpa' bo drug sogs sngags kyis las/ /byas nas slob ma shin tu bsrung/ /mkha' 'gro sngags kyis bsngags pa yis/ /
150a2(rgyud 'grel): dang dbyangs bcings par bya ba'o/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /slob mas lho gnas gsol ba btab/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa yi/ /skye bo la ni dngos grub ste/ /de nas bla ma'i lag g.yon gyis/ /rtag tu slob ma bzung
150a3(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /po tang gi yi tshig gis ni/ /po tang gi yi tshig gis dri/ /slob mas kyang ni de nas tshig /pra ti pro tang gI kye khyab bdag /he ru ka yi 'ga' yang dri/ /de nas dpa' bos brjod par bya/ /oM sh+rI he ru kA ya padmi? he bi dyA rA dza ya
150a4(rgyud 'grel): d+hI ma he swAhA/ 'di ni gA ya dri'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i gtso/ /bde mchog gi ni gzhir gyur pa/ /bu khyod kyi ni blang bar gyis/ /lho sgor slob mas 'di skad brjod/ /oM na ma steM hUM/
150a5(rgyud 'grel): na mA mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA zhes so/ /mkha' spyod la sogs dbang bye bas/ /phyag gsum dag ni bya ba'o/ /thal mo spyi bor byas nas ni/ /yan lag kun gyis phyag bya'o/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni b+hya:pU dzo pas+tha na ya /At+mA
150a6(rgyud 'grel): nAM ni ryA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta bA ri yo gi n+ya rye a d+hi tishtha swa mAM/ g.yon pas thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /sning ga ru ni byas nas ni/ /yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa/ /slob mas sgo kun la phyag bya/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi nI nAM pU dza a b+hi She ka ya
150a7(rgyud 'grel): AtwA nAM ni rya tA yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi n+ya at+mA lA ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ g.yon pa'i thal mo 'phral ba ru/ /byas par gyur nas de nas yang/ /byang gi sgo ru brten nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la phyag bya'o/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gI nI b+hya/ at+mA nI niryA ta ya
150b1(rgyud 'grel): mi sarba bI ra yo gi n+ya/ pU dza pra brtan yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta pI ra yo gi n+ya at+mA khaN+Da ro ha dya pra barta ya nAM/ sngags pas de nas phyi nas sgor/ /spyi bor thal mo byas nas ni/ /sngon du gsang sngags brjod pa yis/ /dpa' bo he ru ka phyag bye/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi n+ya pU dza
150b2(rgyud 'grel): karma Ni At+tA nAM ni rya ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni AtA? rU pi n+ya rye karma ku ru nAM/ /phyag bzhi'i cho ga'o/ /lho yi sgo ru song nas ni/ /lho ru bltas nas legs par gnas/ /g.yon pas slob ma bzung nas ni/ /sdom pa'i mchog ni sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos
150b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yid 'ong/ /sdom pa brtan por gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje ste/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bya'o/ /slob dpon
150b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kis gzung bar bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'o/ /sdom pa dam tshig ces su brjod/ /rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni/ /nyi ma re re dus drug tu/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam pa zhi sbyin par bya/ phyi nang
150b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni khyod kyis bzung/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo/ /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /bdag gis brtan po so sor bzung/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /las kyi
150b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs chen rtag pa'o/ /sdom pa'i cho ga'o/ /bu kye so sor gnas par gyis/ /rigs kyi de nyid kun tu blta/ /dpa' bo lha mo legs par byung/ /he ru ka ltar shin tu mdzes/ /gang gis bskyed pa mkha' ltar stong/ /mchog gi go 'phang thob par 'gyur//
150b7(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal ye shes de/ /da yi mchog ni khyod la sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la/ /khyod kyis kyang ni smra mi bya/ /gal te smras na bu khyad kyi/ /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta de/ /dpal ldan phag mo khyod nyid kyi/ /snying la yang dag gzhug pa 'di/ /gal
151a1(rgyud 'grel): te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu yi snod/ /slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags bzlas shing/ /tshig 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu//
151a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'ong/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu 'thung zhig /oM panya a?  mri to nga ka Tha hUM/ ding phan chod khyod kyi dpal phag mo nga yin gyis/ gang nga yis smras pa de 'bad pas bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis
151a3(rgyud 'grel): nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /khyod yang ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ bu yis 'di skad smra bar gyis /dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag la byin gyis rlob la/ /dpal he ru ka la sogs pa bdag la dbab tu
151a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal/ /gos ngan khrag ni blangs nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang gu gul dang/ /byi la'i rtug pa yang dag ldan/ /bdug pa byas nas bsngags nas ni/ /thod pa nang du bzhag par bya/ /ro bsregs me yis legs par bdugs/ /khros shing bsgyings bcas
151a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ni/ /gnyis su med pas bsngags par bya/ /sngon du bstan pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /go cha yan lag de bzhin no/ /slob ma'i lus la blo ldan pas/ /yang ni 'khor lo thams cad gzhug/ lte ba'i bad gnas 'khor lo bzang/ /gsal
151a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /rkang pa'i 'og tu rlung gis bskyod/ /slob ma la ni dbab par blta/ /gnyis su med pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /g.yas brkyang stan la yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas sngon du bstan pa yi/ /bdug pa rnams kyis bdug par
151a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha mahA kro d+ha A baM sha hUM /oM sh+rI he rukA ya pedma ha ba dyA rA dza ya d+hi ma he swAhA/ zhes bya bas dpa' bo rab tu bskul la/ /de yi lag nas lag pas bzung/ /mig phye nas ni bstan par bya/ /dpal ldan phag mo da khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par
151b1(rgyud 'grel): ni brtson par mdzad/ /thams cad mig ni 'byed gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM sarba bud d+ha DA ki NI ye badzra bar+Na nE ye hUM phaT swAhA/ dad pa'i shugs kyis nga lta ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la blta bar gyis/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes/ /sngags dang
151b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /me tog gtor pa la bltas te/ /stan sogs gnas na legs par gnas/ /gang du me tog ltung ba de/ /de la dngos grub 'gyur ba'o/ /phyi rol dbab pa'i cho? ga'o/ /rnal 'byor kha cig phyi rol 'dod/ /bdag gi bla ma'i dbab
151b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lugs/ /bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs par gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga ni/ /cung zad bsgoms pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma yi lus kyis gsungs/ /lus kyi rin chen bskyod pa ni/ /skad cig gis ni
151b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin 'phar/ /rnal 'byor bzang pos 'das pa'i rigs/ /ma 'ongs pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ dbab pa'i cho ga'o// //he ru ka dang gnyis med gnas/ /dpa' bo che la bu yis ltos/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha mo bzhi/ /mchod pa bzhi dang
151b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can/ /sgo skyong la sogs rnams kyis bsrung/ /blo gros chen po dbus gnas pa'i/ /'khor lo bde mchog bde ba'i mchog /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /slob ma gus shing yid 'ong bzang/ /g.yon
151b6(rgyud 'grel): pa thal sbyar snying gar bzhag /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba/ /'gro ba skyob phyir gzi brjid can/ /rdo rje sems dpas ji ltar byin/ /de bzhin bdag la ding gsol cig /lho yi sgo ru rab zhugs nas/ /he ru ka sogs
151b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag sems la/ /seng+ge'i stan la gnas pa yi/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la 'phan sogs/ /slob ma phyag rgya lnga dang ldan/ /khaTwAM ga rten legs par gnas/ /steng du gdugs bzang lha mos bzung/ /Da ma ru ni lag na thogs/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' tshogs
152a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /bskor nas dbus su bsgyur nas ni/ /glu la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyis/ /'bad nas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /thog mar gnas pa'i dngos grub don/ /blangs nas sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /bsang sngags rig pas
152a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dang/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'khor lor gtor/ /de nas dgyes pas langs nas ni/ /dpa' bo he ru ka dpal sogs/ /dbang bskur rin chen chen po yi/ /gnyis med chu ni ster bar byed/ /he ru ka yi bka' bob nas/ /thog mar snying po
152a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa yis/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /gzhan dag tu ni bzhad gang 'gyur/ /nus pa med gyur rnal 'byor ma'i/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gyis/ /slob ma'i lus la bkang nas ni/ /dbang bskur sbyin pa bsam par bya/ /dbang bskur
152a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni bcu bzhi ni/ /sngon gyi rnal 'byor pas gang bstan/ /rgyas bar dgos pa med pa'i phyir/ /thams cad bdag gis ma bris so/ /bskyed pa rnal 'byor rgyud du'o/ /rdzogs pa rnal 'byor ma yi rim/ /bdag gis de bgros rdzogs pa yis//
152a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/ /yungs kar 'od zer du ni bstan/ /gang phyir des ni legs bskul ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rol pa 'di lta bu/ /bdag nyid tshan po bab nas ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin te/ /brtan g.yo kun gyi bdag nyid do//
152a6(rgyud 'grel): nges na thog mar dbang bskur lnga/ /bde zhing 'byor la sbyin par bya/ /'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /dbang bskur skad cig gis rdzogs so/ /gang phyir 'gro dbang ngo bo ste/ /de phyir dbang bskur sbyin mi bya/ /mi shes de nyid mi rig ste/ /de yang de nyid rang bzhin
152a7(rgyud 'grel): no/ /rdzogs pa'i ye shes bskyed pa ni/ /yang ni smra bar bya ba'o/ /thog mar chu ni sbyin par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi? sngags kyis bsngags/ /phyi nas dbu brgyan sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rim pas so/ /ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa/ /chos kyi
152b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi rang bzhin nam/ /de bzhin sog dang rtsa rang bzhin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te/ /rdo rje btsug gi nor bu thod/ /sna tshogs kun gyi bla ma dang/ /thams cad kun gyi slob dpon phyir/ /ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing/ /rgyal srid thams cad dag
152b2(rgyud 'grel): tu 'grub/ /sna tshogs rang bzhin pad+ma gcig /sna tshogs kyis mdzes de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dbang bskur bas/ /slob ma thams cad dbang bskur te/ /gsang sngags 'di nyid brjod par bya/ /oM sarba bu d+ha DA kaM nI yaM badzra bar+Na nI ye hUM phaT/ swAhA/ snying
152b3(rgyud 'grel): gar gnas pa'i thugs rdo rje/ /de rjes kyang ni dbang bskur te/ /bdag nyid he ru ka rdor che/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di brjod/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dbang bskur bas/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya/ /dpa' bo kun tu rab 'grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long?/ /rdo rje
152b4(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i lag pa yis/ /he ru ka yi sbyor bas 'khyud/ /de yi g.yas pa'i brla stengs su/ /g.yon pa'i byin pas mnan pa'o/ /oM he ru ka a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha shIr sa ma ya sngaM? /bdag po'o/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa yA mi sh+rI
152b5(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka nam? ? ab+hi She ka ta/ yang na rnal 'byor ma yi gtso/ /lha mo rgyud las thams cad du/ /de ming rnal 'byor ma lung bstan/ /de nyid rig pas sbyin par bya/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti dwaM aM? b+hi Shiny+tsa yA mi sh+rI he ru ka nyA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ gdong nas chos la
152b6(rgyud 'grel): ming med de/ /kun rdzob tu ni ming du grags/ /dam pa'i don gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /ming med ming dang ldan pa'ang med/ /shin tu rnam dag chu yin te/ /mnyam pa nyid ni dbu rgyan gyur/ /rdo rje rtag tu so sor rtog /bdag po dam tshig las byung ba'o/ /brtul
152b7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs lung bstan dbugs dbyung ba/ /dpal ldan rnam snang gtso bo'o/ /dbang bskur 'di dag yang dag ldan/ /bum pa'i dbang du rnam par bstan/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /he ru ka yi phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /he ru ka
153a1(rgyud 'grel): yi btul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba bI ra twaM sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ye tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra yA mi hi hi hi hi hUM /rdo rje brtul zhugs de byin te/ /de yi rdo rje sbyor bas bzung/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
153a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba che/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag /dril bu de nyid gzugs kyis ni/ /rnam par mkhas pas de la sbyin/ /'di de rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab dbyangs ni rjes su dran /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu
153a3(rgyud 'grel): bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis bdag /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos byas pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /dam pa'i srid pa byed pa'o/ /dpa' bo chen po chen po sbyin/ /kha TwAM ga mchog gzung par gyis
153a4(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal sku yan lag /brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid kun yan lag /bu yis rtag tu dam du ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas gzung bar gyis/ /thod pa'i phreng ba yang dag ldan/ /dbu rgyan mchag tu gzung bar gyis/ /gar dang blu dang de bzhin phrengs? dri dang bdus? pa de bzhin te//
153a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag lhan cig skyes par grags/ /'khor bar shin tu mdzes pa'o/ /me long ye shes me long dang/ /dung ni de bzhin bde ba'o/ /mig sman bde ba ces byar gsungs/ /sems can kun la rab tu bskur/ /phyi rol gyi ni bum pa 'di/ /slob dpon
153a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzhed pa'o/ /bum pa gzhan ni lhan cig skyes/ /lus la rtag tu gnas pa'o/ /ka ni byang chub ces su gsungs/ /'bar ba ldan par gang zhig gyur/ /de ni bum pa zhes su bstan/ /sems can kun la legs par gnas/ /
153a7(rgyud 'grel): bum pas legs par dbang bskur bar/ /sems can thams cad som nyi med/ /bla ma'i man ngag rim med pas/ /bum pa shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bar nus pa 'khor lo dbus su kun gyi snying po ni/ /bla ma dang ni rnal 'byor ma dang
153b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo'i 'khor lo la gus kyis/ /skye bo ngan pa'i tshogs dang gdug pa'i sems sogs spongs/ /lhan cig skyes par 'byung ba'i sems dang he ru ka yi rdo rje khyod nyid do/ /bum pas dbang bskur slob ma yi/ /nam mkha' lding gi tshul gnas la/ /snyan pa'i
153b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis smra bar bya/ /bgrod dang mi bgrod sogs mtshan nyid/ /zhi dang rgyas sogs gang cung zad/ /ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs dang/ /rnal 'byor ma yis sgrub pa gang/ /las de thams cad bsgrub phar bya/ /nad par sngar langs sems dag nyid/ /thams cad
153b3(rgyud 'grel): lus la byas nas ni/ /bgrod dang mi bgrod gang cung zad/ /kun la sbyar bas bya ba'o/ /lus kyi sdug bsngal yongs spangs nas/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa gzung/ /bde mchog gis ni byin pa bzhin/ /bu yis rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /rgyal dang stongs dang
153b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gang/ /phyogs ni gnyis ka la de bzhin/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo mchod/ /rang nyid kyis ni 'bad nas mchod/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug tshogs/ /chang la dga' bas rol par bya/ /'khor lo bde mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /bu khyod
153b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni rtag tu rol/ /dpa' bo tshogs? las rab 'bad pas/ /lag pa'i brda ni sbyin par bya/ /dpa' bo dam tshig shes nas ni/ /de dang lhan cig bza' zhing spyad/ /theg pa dman la dga' ba ni/ /bzang pos nam lang mi bya'o/ /'khor ba dag kyang mi gtang
153b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /mya ngan 'das rtag dga' mi bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo tshogs/ /gnod pa'i bsam pa mi bya'o/ /dpa' bo sbyong pa'i brtul zhugs blta/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu bzlas/ /bde mchog mnyes pas dngos grub tu/ /'gyur bar the tshom med
153b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas 'bar? pas skyong pa ni/ /dam tshig grub pa the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig bskyad pa yis/ /spyod cing mos par 'gyur ba'o/ /bskal pa mdza' yas brgya yis kyang/ /nyams par gyur pas mi 'grub bo/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /dngos grub
