202a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni legs bsdams nas/ /me ni kun nas sbar bar bya/ /g.yung drung 'khyil pa 'khor ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor phag gdong nye bar blta/ /phyag rgya gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum
202b1(rgyud 'grel): yang sgrub par bya/ skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor dag /rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang sngags bcu ba'i cho ga mchog /dkyil
202b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gru gsum nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje a ral+li las byung/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas shes bshad cing/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes kyang ngo/ /A li kA li dbye bas der/ /sde
202b3(rgyud 'grel): tshan brgyad ni rim pas bri/ /gzugs med mda' dang thub pa dang/ /bug pa drag po 'dod pa dad pa yi/ /rim pas man ngag ji bzhin du/ /re mig rnams su dgod par
202b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dang por a yig nas brtsams te/ /yi ge ha yig mthar thug par/ /g.yas bskor gyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /sdom pa rgya mtshor gsungs pa bzhin/ /tha
202b5(rgyud 'grel): steng sum 'gyur byas nas ni/ /sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan/ /b+ha ma thug steng dang tsha steng yig /spyi bor ta log steng sam brgyan/ /tsa sa'i dbus nas blangs nas
202b6(rgyud 'grel): su/ /de bzhin Da yig 'og mas brgyan/ /sha log steng ma sha steng bskyon/ /de bzhin yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /li thung 'og gi yi ge la/ /nya yi 'og mas
202b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan/ /pa steng ta log 'og mas sbyar/ /pha steng tha log gis ni dbye/ /ha dang na log dbus yig las/ /na log steng na gnas pas brgyan/ /sha yig 'og na gnas paS
203a1(rgyud 'grel): bzung/ /b+ha mthug 'og man log gi /'og ma yis ni gdan du bya/ /ha steng gnas pa'i yi ge nyid/ /ra steng ra yi steng mas sbyar/ /ta log steng na gnas pa yis/ /spyi bor sbyar ba yongs su grags/ /pha steng tha log ma yiS ni/ /rnam
203a2(rgyud 'grel): par sbyar bar brjod par bya/ /nya yi steng du na yog ste/ /sbyar pa man ngag gis shes bya/ /tsa sa'i dbus nas blangs nas ni/ /b+ha mthug 'og ma na log gis/ /'og ma yis ni gdan du bya/ /de bzhin rtsa yi steng nas blangs/ /ta yi steng na gnas pas brgyan/ /tha steng na
203a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og 'og la brgyan/ /de bzhin pha yi 'og gnas yig /d+ha pa'i dbus gnas yi ge la/ /tha log 'og mas rnam par brgyan/ /nya la'i dbus gnas yi ge la/ /na log steng mas rnam par brgyan/ /sa yi dbus gnas yi ge la/ /rI ring sa bon 'og mas dbye bar
203a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /thig le nA dar yang dag ldan/ /de yang sum 'gyur bya ba nyid/ /na yi 'og gnas ta log dbye/ /der yang sum 'gyur bya ba'o/ /sha log 'og nas sha log zhon/ /nya log gnas las dbye bar bya/ /ma wa'i dbus gnas yang dag ldan/ /dzha ma thug rgyab kyi dbyangS?
203a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan/ /bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/ /gsang sngags btu ba shes par bya/ /glegs bam las ni gzung ba'i sngags/ /yang dag blang ba byas pa yis/ /bskal ba bye ba brgyar yang ni/ /dngos grub rnams su mi 'gyur nyid/ /de nas yang dag bshad
203a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /mchod pa'i rdo rje kun 'byung ba/ /tshes bcu'i dus su bab pa na/ mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan /bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba dang/ /phyi dang gsang bar yang dag ldan/ /dri med snod ni yang dag par/ /gur kum sogs kyis byugs nas su//
203a7(rgyud 'grel): bzang po btung ba yang dag ldan/ /sind+hu ra phye ma btsags pa la/ /gser smyug gis ni sbyor ba yis /mkhas pas e waM rnam par bri/ /dbus su gsang sngags rgyal po 'di/ /bstan bcos kyis ni dbye bas bri/ /g.yung drung dge ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /'khor lo
203b1(rgyud 'grel): yin ni logs su dgod/ /me tog rnam ba sna tshogs pa/ /chu dang de bzhin thang las skyes/ /sgron ma tsA ru dam tshig ces/ /de bzhin gzhon nu ma dag mchod/ /mchod pa'i las ni khyad par du/ /gdon mi za bar bya ba ste/ /sgra grol gcer bur byas pa yis/ /sngar bshad phyogs su kha bltas nas//
203b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par gzhag pas mchod pa yis/ /dus su shin tu bsang bya ste/ /ma bsang bgegs ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin du yang dngos grub nyams/ /nad kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /dam tshig nyams las byung bar 'gyur/ /srog ni yongs su gtang ba 'am/ /'chi ba dang ni phrad
203b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang bla/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /'gro kun g.yon las 'byung ba ste/ /'jig rten gsum po brtan dang g.yo/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor g.yon pas spyad/ /rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du ngos/ /mchod pa lag pa g.yon gyis bya/ /g.yon gyis
203b4(rgyud 'grel): bstab cing bza' bar bya/ /rigs lnga kun tu spyod pas na/ /rigs gcig tu ni brtag par bya/ /bza' dang bza' min de bzhin btung/ /gtsang sme ngo tsha sdang bar bya/ /kun rtog kun las ngas grol bas/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /rnal 'byor dra pa'i sdom pa
203b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /gsang sngags rnal 'byor ma yis dngos/ /rnal 'byor ma yang gsang sngags dngos/ /gal te go 'phang mchog 'dod na/ /de dag tha dad mi bya ste/ /bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni/ /mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /de dang de yi
203b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bor 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no/ /sems ni rjes mthun rnal 'byor gyis/ /gang zhig goms par byed pa ni/ /bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos/ /bla ma de bzhin dge 'dun te/ /bla ma dpal
203b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje can/ /'dir ni bla yi rgyu yin no/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang 'dod pa yis/ /de phyir bla ma mnyes par bya/ /dgos pa bla na med pa nyid/ /dpal ldan oMD? Na gnas kyi'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba snyan nas snyan zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i rjes su gnang
204a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzhung lugs?/ /slob dpon chen po dpal orgyan gyi mi dbang in+d+ra b+hu tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal na led+dra? ba dang lots+tsha ba dge slong pradz+nyA kirtis bsgyur ba'o// //rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags de kho na nyid
204a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i rin? pa bzhugs so/ //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra yo gi niman+ta tat+tA/ nirde? sha swA d+hiSh+Tha na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor
204a3(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags gzugs rgyal ba'i dbang byug ma/ /shin tu 'jigs shing mchog ster byed/ /thig le phra mor nyer gnas pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje phag mo dpal/ /yi ge re'i de kho na nyid/ /'phral du yang dag yid ches byed/ /bgegs rnams thams
204a4(rgyud 'grel): cad brlag par byed/ /gsang sngags don ni bshad par bya/ /bu yi yi ge'i mdun du blta/ /phyag 'tshal yi ge rab gsal ba/ /chos kyis lam de bshad par bya/ /rba rlabs med cing dri ma med/ /nyi ma lta bu'i rnam pa can/ /chos kun rab tu mi gnas pa/ /?
204a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bsgom/ /chos kyi sku ni thob 'gyur ba/ /blo ldan skye ba 'di yis ni/ /de la goms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'phral du yang dag yid ches 'gyur/ /rig byed dang po g.yon du bsam/ /longs sku sbyor?
204a6(rgyud 'grel): lam legs pa ni/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung ye shes te/ /shin tu legs pa'i 'od gsal ba/ /'di ni zung 'jug shes bya ste/ /ji ltar brag cha 'dra ba yi/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob 'gyur/ /rang rig bde ba'i mchog gyur pa/ /g.yas pa ye shes rgya

207b2(rgyud 'grel): gi ni sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor nad na ma nyid gtso/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gsum gyi thig le ste/ /khyod ni sems can kun la phan par byed/ /rdo rje rnal
